GK16visa10cu:563: avijñātanāmajātikaṃ kañcit prati ayaṃ vaktuḥ praśraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:564: pṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaśca vidrāvakaḥ sa tadvākyaṃ tadvākyaśleṣeṇa ke jale yūyam ityabhiprāyakaṃ sthale evetyādi svottareṇa pratyāyayati /

GK16visa10cu:606: vākyaṃ yatra bhavetso 'yaṃ bhāṣāsama itīṣyate // VisSd_10.10 //
GK16visa10cu:611: vākyaṃ tatsamūhaḥ, sa ca saṃskṛtaprākṛtasakalabhāṣāsu ekavidhapadaghaṭita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:617: bhāṣāsu samānyekarūpāṇi padāni vidyante yatreti vyutpattiyogādanvarthanām pṛthagalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:618: eṣa ca śleṣālaṅkāraviśeṣa iti yaduktaṃ caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitaistadasaṅgatam, arthadvayābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:622: virasāsi kelikīre kimīli ! dhīre ca gandhasārasamīre !” //
GK16visa10cu:626: he āli ! mañjulamaṇimañjīre mañjulaṃ maṇiyuktaṃ mañjīraṃ yasyāḥ he tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:627: athavā mañjīre kalaśabdo gambhīro yatra tādṛśi /
GK16visa10cu:634: ityādau tu “sarasam” ityatra saṃskṛtaprākṛtayoḥ sāmye 'pi vākyagatatvābhāve vaicitryābhāvānnāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:638: sarvabhāṣāsu ekavidhaiḥ padaiḥ vākyaghaṭitatve evāyamalaṅkāraḥ tādṛśaikapadena tu vākyaghaṭane tādṛśasthale nāyamalaṅkāra ityāha---sarasaṃ kaiṇa iti /
GK16visa10cu:649: aneketyanena dvayorvā bahūnāṃ vārthānāmabhidhāne prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādabhidhayā bodhane /
GK16visa10cu:656: “kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate” iti ca nayāt vācyabhedena bhinnairapi yugapaduccāraṇenāpagatabhedaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:657: tridhā khalu śabdābhivyaktiḥ rūpator'thataḥ svarataśceti darśanāt /
GK16visa10cu:658: evaṃ ca bhinnayorapi samānaśrutyoḥ śabdayostattannyāyena uccaritayoḥ kameṇa svasyārthabodhanaṃ yatra tatra śabdasvarūpaśleṣeṇa śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:659: śabdaparivṛttisahatve tvarthaśleṣa iti niyamamaṅgīkurvatāṃ kāvyaprakāśakārādīnāṃ matamanusṛtya vyākhyānam /
GK16visa10cu:660: anye tvāhuḥ--na khalu ghaṭapaṭayoriva “vasudhāmahita purājita nirāgamanābhāvāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:663: dvayorekākāratvena tathāṅgīkāre eva eva kulālaḥ, ekākāraṃ ghacaśatamekayā sāmagyā niṣpādayet /
GK16visa10cu:666: kiṃ ca yadyubhayārthapratipādanasamīhayā vakturekadā śabdadvayodāharaṇasambhavastadā ghaṭasahastracikīrṣuḥ kulālo 'pi ekadā tat nirvāhayet /
GK16visa10cu:668: tenaikatraiva śabde nānāviṣayāṇāmarthānāṃ svaṃsvasāmagrīvaśena kameṇojjīvanamiti vādināṃ matamevāśrayitumucitam /
GK16visa10cu:669: kintvatra mate tatprathamaviruddhāyā dvitīyābhidhāyāḥ punarujjīvanamanupapannamiti dvitīyābhidhānāmnā“janasthāne bhrānta” mityādāvivātrāpi vyañjanaiva vṛttirupadiśyate /
GK16visa10cu:670: evaṃ ca dhvanitantre prakaraṇaniyamasthale tasmādeva śabdāduccāraṇādisāmagrīsahakṛtā tadvyāpārantareṇa sabhaṅgābhaṅgaśabdāntaralabhyārthapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:671: yatra tu yena dhvastetyādau prakaraṇādiniyamo nāsti tatra dvayorabhidhānasaṃśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:672: yatra ca śabdaparivartane 'pi dvyarthahānistatra śabdaśaktermūlatvena śabdaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:673: yatra ca śabdaparivarttane 'pi na tadarthakṣatistatrārthamātraṃ pratyevaṃśabdopayogādarthaśleṣatā /
GK16visa10cu:674: etanmatānusāreṇa tu śliṣṭāvarthau vidyete eṣviti matvarthoyapratyayāntatvena śliṣṭaiḥ padairityādi sautraṃ śliṣṭapadaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GK16visa10cu:677: asya sūtrasya śabdālaṅkāraprakaraṇe paṭhitatvādeva siddhaṃ padānāṃ parivṛttayasahatvam /
GK16visa10cu:678: ye tvāhuḥ “prati prasūte śabdaḥ śabdāntara“miti tadayuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:682: evaṃ ca varṇādigatatvena śleṣasya prācīnānurodhena vyavahāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:683: tathoccāraṇāṅgīkāre hi śabdayoḥ “durgālaṅghita” ityādau janasthāna ityādāvapi vyañjanānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:684: “hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati” ityādau “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām“ityādau ca yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohastasyopameyatā,
GK16visa10cu:695: prakṛtipadayostu dvivacanenaiva tathātvaṃ bodhitaṃ, vibhinnarūpavarṇadvayasya aikyarūpyaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa10cu:698: iha ca varṇādigatatvena aṣṭavidhatvaṃ śleṣasyāsamīcīnamiti caṇḍīdāsapaṇḍitarāghavānandaprabhṛtīnāṃ matam /
GK16visa10cu:704: ityatra prakaraṇābhāvāt kiṃ mahādevaḥ? utāho kaściddaridro vācya iti sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:706: “yena dhvastamanobhavena” ityādau “syānnanditā virūpākṣapādapadmaniṣevaṇāt” ityādau ca prakaraṇājñāne kimahaṃ nanditānandakaḥ syāmiti kasyacid bhaktasya vacanam ?
GK16visa10cu:707: uta kasyacid bhaktasya nanditānandināmagaṇaviśeṣatvaṃ syāditi vacanamiti sandehaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:712: ityatra puṃnapuṃsakaliṅgayoḥ śatakoṭidatāmityatra dadāti-dyatyoḥ dhātvoḥ prakṛtyoścaśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:714: “sarvasvaṃ hara sarvasva” ityatrāpi vakṣyamāṇodāharaṇer'thadvayasyāpi sandehāspadatvād vibhaktiśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:715: “dadhate 'sya parāṃ śobhāmaho madhuratābhṛtaḥ” ityādau ca kiṃ madhuratāṃ bibhratīti madhuratābhṛto bahavo janāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:716: uta madhuratayā bhṛtaḥ kaścid varttata iti bahuvacanaikavacanayoḥ śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:718: dadhata ityatrāpi ca pakṣe dhādhātorbahuvacanaṃ pakṣe ca dadhadhātorekavacanaṃ śliṣṭaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:719: tadevamabhidhādūyasaṃvedyapratyayoktitaḥ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṣṭavidhaśleṣasya sambhavamavicāryya prācīnādhikṣepakāribhirupajīvyaiḥ sahālaṃ bahunā vivādena /
GK16visa10cu:720: nanvevaṃ “yena dhvasta” ityādāvapi yasyārthasya prathamaṃ buddhyārohaḥ sa vācyo 'stu aparastu vyaṅgyo 'stu kiṃ tatrāpi śleṣālaṅkārakalpanairiti cennaivam /
GK16visa10cu:722: “hṛdijñeṣu ca vakṣyati'; ityādau ca nirddhāritatvāt vṛttidvayakalpanasadbhāve saṃgatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:723: yattu caṇaḍīdāsapaṇḍitairuktaṃ “vyathāṃ dvayeṣāmapi medinībhṛtām” ityādau ubhayābhidhānaṃ cetīti “sandhyāvandanavelāyāṃ mukto 'hamiti manyate /
GK16visa10cu:729: “abalā acalā vā syuḥ“ityādau “āśīḥ paramparāṃvandyām” ityādau ca doṣasthale sandehavaśena vivakṣitaikārthānirddhāraṇādativyagratayā'svādaṃ prati prātikūlyam /
GK16visa10cu:731: ataeva pūrvatra mahākaveḥ skhalanamanyatra vahvarthapadanirvāhe prayuktasādhanaṃ sārvalaukikameva /
GK16visa10cu:736: evaṃ “vaurivaṃśadavānala” ityādau vaṃśaśabdāt vyañjanayā baudhitasya veṇurūpārthasyaikānvayarūpeṇārthena “gaurvāhīka';
GK16visa10cu:740: sa ca gavārtho mukhya iti tatra gauṇī lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa10cu:741: iha ca veṇurūpārtho vyaṅgya iti kathaṃ mukhyārthabādhajīvitā lakṣaṇeti cet ? atraivaṃ saṅgatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:742_0: yathā khalu “jātirekapadārtha” iti vādināṃ mate prācīnairasmābhiśca ihaiva dvitīyaparicchede
GK16visa10cu:742_1: saṅketitārthanirūpaṇe pradarśitena nayena jātimātrabodhanād abhidhāyāṃ viratāyāṃ
GK16visa10cu:742_2: vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagantavyayā vyakte rūpyamāṇānvayabodhe lakṣaṇā tathehāpi vyaṅgyatvenāha---tsaya
GK16visa10cu:762: vidhau vidhātari pratikūlatāmupagate bahusādhanatā bahūpāyatvaṃ viphalatvameti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:764: patiṣyataḥ dinabharttuḥ avalambanāya rakṣaṇāya karasahastraṃ raśmisahastrameva karasahastraṃ hastahasastraṃ nābhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:765: vidhau candre tasyaiva tatpratikūlatvānna tu vidhātuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:782: ubhayatraiva sarva iti kira iti ca /
GK16visa10cu:783: atra ca sarva ityatra pratyayaśleṣaṃ vinā vacanaśleṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:784: “doṣayuktaḥ padādartha'; ityatra tu vacanaśleṣaṃ vinā pratyayaśleṣa evetyataḥ pṛthak śleṣadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:786: artha ityanvaye tu ktapratyaye ubhayatra ekavacanam /
GK16visa10cu:788: (lo, u) sarva eva ityatra sarvaśabdo bahuvacanāntaḥ, ekavacanāntaśca /
GK16visa10cu:789: tena sudhākiraḥ ityasya bahuvacanāntasya viśeṣaṇatve vikṣepārthāt kṛdhātoḥ kkipapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:799: tanvyā vikasantī netranīlābje stanadvayī ca tava modaṃ sadā dattām /
GK16visa10cu:813: lasat taralahāriṇīti padaṃ netranīlābjaviśeṣaṇatve dvivacanāntaṃ stanadvayyāstvekavacanāntaṃ strīliṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:816: “ayaṃ sarvāṇi śāstrāṇi hṛdi jñeṣu ca vakṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:818: atra “vakṣyati” iti vahi-vacyoḥ, “sāmarthyakṛt” iti kṛntati-karotyoḥ prakṛtyoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:829: sāmardhyakṛt cāmitrasambandhitve chedanārthaḥ kṛntati iti dhātoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:831: vibhaktyabhede 'pi prakṛtimātrasya bhedāt prakṛtiśleṣa eva ityata āha--prakṛtyoriti /
GK16visa10cu:834: atra padabhaṅge vibhaktisamāsayorapi vailakṣaṇyātpadaśleṣaḥ, na tu prakṛtiśleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:840: atra prakṛtiśleṣatvaṃ nirasyati atra padabhaṅge iti /
GK16visa10cu:842: yadyapi nyūnādhiketyādilakṣaṇavaśādeva prakṛtiśleṣato bhedasiddhistathāpi prakārāntareṇāpi tatsiddhirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:850: iha tu vibhakteḥ pṛthvādiśabdeṣu pṛthukādiśabdeṣu ca bhinnatayā padadoṣa eva /
GK16visa10cu:863: tathā ca vanevṛddhānāṃ vṛddhamṛgaṇāṃ kamalānāṃ ca sadṛśe tasyā locane /
GK16visa10cu:865: bhūriśilīmukheranekabāṇaiḥ karaṇabhūtaiḥ lubdhakairvyādhaiḥ karttṛbharākulībhāvaṃ nītā vanavṛddhāḥ mṛgāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:866: lubdhairmadhulubdhairbhūriśilīmukhairanekamadhukarairākulībhāvaṃ nītāni vane jale vṛddhāni kamalāni ca /
GK16visa10cu:886: śivabhaktastaṃ prati dasyośca putrādikaṃ prati coktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:889: nayasya nīteḥ upakārantarasya sāmmukhyaṃ sambhavo yasmāt tādṛśaṃ tanuvarttanaṃ śarīrasthitam āyāsi agacchasi prāproṣīti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:896: he hara śambho ! tvaṃ sarvasya lokasya sarvasvaṃ, tvaṃ kimabhūtaḥ ?
GK16visa10cu:898: āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanordehasya varttanaṃ vṛttimupakārasāmmukhyaṃ naya prāpaya /
GK16visa10cu:902: upakārāt sāmmukhyaṃ naya upakāraṃ mā kurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:903: varttanaṃ vṛttim āyāsi āyāsayuktaṃ tanu vistāraya /
GK16visa10cu:908: asya ca bhedasya pratyayaśleṣeṇāpi gatārthatve pratyayāntarāsādhyasubantatiṅantagatatvena vicchittiviśeṣāśrayaṇātpṛthaguktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:912: atra āyāsi iti vinā sarvatra luptasuptiṅantatve 'pi āyāsi ityatra luptāluptadvayāntatve 'pi ca padayoraikarūpyaṃ darśayati---atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:915: svatulyatvena pratyayāntaram asādhyam abodhyaṃ yayoḥ tādṛśau yau suptiṅau tadantargatatvenāsya śleṣasya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:921: hara bahusaraṇaṃ taṃ cittamāhemavasara ume sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:925: saṃskṛtapakṣe---he mahade he utsavadātri ! he ume pārvati ! āgamasya vedasya āharaṇe vaśīkaraṇe me mama taṃ prasiddhaṃ samāsaṅgam ava rakṣa /
GK16visa10cu:927: samāsaṅgaṃ kīdṛśaṃ surasandhaṃ surāṇāṃ sandhaṃ sambandhikārakaṃ, mama suratvaprāpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:928: tathā taṃ prasiddhaṃ cittamoham avasare 'parthānmaraṇarūpe sahasā hara nāśayaḥ kīdṛśaṃ cittamohaṃ bahusaraṇaṃ nānāvidhakāryyaviṣayam /
GK16visa10cu:930: prākṛtapakṣe--- mama dehi rasaṃ dharmeṃ tamovaśāmāśāṃ gamāgamād hara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:931: haravadhu śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā //
GK16visa10cu:933: tadarthaśca--he haravadhu ! mama dharme rasaṃ dehi /
GK16visa10cu:939: saṃskṛtapakṣe---mahade utsavade ! ume ! pārvati ! me mama āgamāharaṇe āgamānāmākalane taṃ samāsaṅgam āsaktim ava sthirīkurviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:941: āgamādhyāsasya svargahetutvād bahu bahulaṃ saraṇaṃ prasāro yasya evaṃbhūtaṃ cittamohaṃ manoniṣṭham ajñānam,
GK16visa10cu:946: “mahyaṃ dehi rasaṃ dharme tamovaśāmāśaṃ gamāgamādvara naḥ /
GK16visa10cu:947: haravadhu ! śaraṇaṃ tvaṃ cittamoho 'pasaratu me sahasā” //
GK16visa10cu:948: gamāgamo vidyate yatra tasmāt mamāgamāt saṃsārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:955: apratimānaṃ kṣamate sa gaṇikānāṃ na rañjayitum //
GK16visa10cu:968: (lo, au) evaṃ varṇādigatatvenāṣṭavidhaṃ śleṣamuktvā punaḥ prakārāntareṇa trividhamāhṛ---punariti /
GK16visa10cu:984: “yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:985: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarā /
GK16visa10cu:993: tvāṃ sarvadā sa umādhavaḥ sarvado mādhavaśca pāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:995: abhavena anutpattinā yena anaḥ śakaṭaṃ dhvastaṃ nityaśarīrasya tasyaṃ rūpāntareṇāvirbhāvamātraṃ, natūtpattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:998: ekatraiva nityaśarīre ākārabhedapradarśanamātraṃ, na tu śarīrabheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:999: yaśca udvṛttasya durvṛttasya bhujaṅgasya aghāsurasya hantā /
GK16visa10cu:1000: ravasya nānātmakabrahmaṇo layo līnatā yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1001: agaṃ govarddhanaṃ, kūrmavarāhamūrttyā ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1002: śaśimathaḥ rāhoḥ śirohara iti stutyaṃ nāma yasyāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1005: umādhavapakṣe---dhvastamanobhavena dhvasto dalito manobhavo kāmo yasmāt /
GK16visa10cu:1006: yena balijito viṣṇoḥ kāyaḥ purasya tripurāsurasya nāśakāstrīkṛtaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1008: yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgarūpo hāraḥ valayaśca kaṅkaṇaḥ yasya tādṛśaḥ, gaṅgāṃ ca yo maulau adhārayat /
GK16visa10cu:1010: hara iti stutyaṃ nāma cāmarā āhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1016: balijit viṣṇuḥ, tasya kāyaḥ purā daityārthamastrīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1017: udvṛttā ativarttulākārā bhujaṅgā eva hārā valayāśca yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1020: andhakadaityasya kṣayo nāśaḥ, tatkaraḥ sarvadā umādhavaḥ gaurīpatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1023: ātmana eva kāyaḥ purā pūrvam amṛtāharaṇakāle 'suramohanārthaṃ strīrūpaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1024: udvṛttaḥ uddhato bhujaṅgaḥ kāliyaḥ taṃ hantīti /
GK16visa10cu:1026: agaṃ parvataṃ govarddhanākhyaṃ gāṃ pṛthvīṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:1027: śasinaṃ mathnāti iti śaśimadrāhuḥ tasya śiroharaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1028: andhakānām andhakavaṃśīyānāṃ kṣayo nivāso dvārakāpurasambhandhī tatkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1041: sabhaṅgaḥ varṇavyūheṣu bhaṅgena yutaḥ, tadbhāvātmakena bhinnapadena vā sahitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1048: yathā-- “sārasavattā vihatā na bakā vilasanti carati no kaṅkaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1050: iti atra hi rājapakṣe sā, iti, kam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1051: saraḥ pakṣe netītyatra tu sā nāsti /
GK16visa10cu:1053: yathā kāṣṭhayorbhinnayorapyupāyavaśena jaḍīkṛtayorekatā tathābhinnayoḥ padayoḥ śabdayorekatra varṇavyūhe sanniveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1060: yathā ekasminneva vṛnte phaladvayaṃ tathā ekasminneva śabder'thadvayasaṃsargaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1062: yo hi yadāśritaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:1069: kevalaṃ vibhinnatvena pratīyamānayorapi atyantasannidhānarūpa eva jatukāṣṭhayoriva śleṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1073: tāvataiva kathamarthālaṅkāratvam ityatrāha---yo hi yadāśraya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1078: yathā loke bhujāśrito bhujasthālaṅkāraḥ kaṇṭhaśritaḥ kaṇṭhasya tathāsau śabdāśrita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1080: loke āśrayāśrayibhāvena eva vyapadeśaḥ, yathā rājapuruṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1084: tathāhi--atra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ śabdārthagatatvena vyavasthiteranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvena niyam iti /
GK16visa10cu:1091: arthaśaktimūlatve tu arthagatatvena doṣādīnāṃ tu śabdārthanvayādyavidhānaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:1092: tathā ca nānārthābhaṅgaśabdasyāpi śleṣeṇānvayavyatirekānuvidhānāta tatrāpi śabdaśleṣatvameva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1094: (lo, u) siddhāntamāha---tad uktaprakāraṃ pūrveṣāṃ matam, anye 'bhiyuktā na manyante na svīkurvanti /
GK16visa10cu:1096: atra alaṅkāraprastāve yeṣāṃ dvandvārthānāṃ śabdānāṃ paryyāntareṇa pratipādane 'pi na kṣatista evārthagatāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1097: yeṣāṃna tu tathā te śabdagatā eveti niyamanāt prācīnairalaṅkārakārairiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1099: na ca “andhakakṣaya” ityādau śabdābhedaḥ, “arthabhedena śabdabhedaḥ” iti darśanāt /
GK16visa10cu:1103: mataviśeṣe tu yatra nānārthasthale 'pi śabdabhedastathā ca tatrāpi śliṣṭānekaśabdakṛtaḥ śabdālaṅkārastanmate nirbādha eveti tanmataṃ darśayati---na cāndhaka iti /
GK16visa10cu:1108: na ca tatkathaṃ nānārthakaśabdāḥ śrūyante iti vācyam--ekaprayatnoccāryyatvadoṣeṇa bhedāgrahāt /
GK16visa10cu:1110: (lo, ū) naca tanniyamanamātreṇābhaṅgasya śabdaśleṣatvaṃ, śabdabhedādapi ityāha--naceti /
GK16visa10cu:1115: visadṛśaśabdadvayasya bandhe cevaṃvidhasya vaicitryābhāvād vaicitryasyaiva cālaṅkāratvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1120: nanu sabhaṅgaśleṣasthaler'thabhedāt tvadabhimatasvarabhedadṛṣṭāntena abhaṅgānekaśabdānāmarthabhedāt svarabheda eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1121: tathā ca svarabhedavailakṣaṇyagrahe kathaṃ bhedagrahaḥ syādator'thabhedasya śabdabhedavyāptiraprayojikaiva ityata ekaprayatnena nānāśabdoccāraṇamityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1123: nanu andhakādyakhaṇḍaśabdasya mukhyatve kiṃ pramāṇamityata āhavisadṛśaśabdadvayasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:1124: nahi hariṇaśabdasthale tadarthakendrādiśabdaprayoge hari naumītyatreva viṣṇivandrau naumītyatrāpi śleṣarūpavaicitryānanubhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1132: ye 'pyāhuryo yadāśretaḥ sa tadalaṅkāra iti tanmate 'pyatra vaucitryasya śabdaniṣṭhatvācchabdālaṅkāratvamityāha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1142: rasādirūpasyārthasya tadabhivayañjakasya vibhāvādirūpasyārthasya vānusandhānamastyeveti tepi kathaṃ śabdālaṅkāramadhye yuṣmābhirapi gaṇyanta iti /
GK16visa10cu:1144: śabdasyābhinnaprayatnoccāryatvenārthālaṅkāratve “pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau” ityādau śabdabhede 'pyarthālaṅkāratvaṃ tathāpi prasajyata ityubhayatrāpi śabdālaṅkāratvameva /
GK16visa10cu:1157: yatra tu śabdaparivarttane 'pi na śleṣatvakhaṇḍanā, tatra--
GK16visa10cu:1165: aho tulāyā mānatulāyāḥ koṭeragrabhāgasya khalasya ca susadṛśī vṛttiryataḥ stokenetyādi /
GK16visa10cu:1169: (lo, ḷ) tat kva nu punararthaśleṣa ityāha---yatra hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1178_0: idānīṃ śleṣasya alaṅkārāntarāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayābhāvād alaṅkārāntarasya ca śleṣāsaṅkīrṇaviṣayasattvāt
GK16visa10cu:1178_1: sāmānyamalaṅkārāntaramapavādatvena bādhitvā śleṣa evālaṅkāraḥ alaṅkārāntaraṃ tu tat
GK16visa10cu:1181: alaṅkārāntaraviṣayiṇī pratibhā tasyā evotpattihetutvamasya śleṣasya tadviṣayabodhakatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1187: eṣa ca niyamādalaṅkāraṇāṃ vicchittimādāyaiva sambhavatītyetadviṣaye vidyamānānāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādha iti ye manyante teṣāṃ pakṣamupanyasya dūṣayati--asya ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1190: teṣāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ bādhakatvādavakāśāntarābhāvena tahyapadeśaṃ bādhitvā mukhyatvena vyapadeṣṭuṃ yogyatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1200: tatra samāsoktyaprastutapraśaṃsāsaṅkīrṇasya śleṣasya taddvayabādhakaprasaktireva nāsti ityāha---samāsektīti /
GK16visa10cu:1206: aprastutakathanena prastutavyañjanaṃ cāprastutapraśaṃsā; sā ca kvacit ślṣasaṅkīrṇāpi bhavati /
GK16visa10cu:1207: yathā--- “satataṃ yā madhyasthā kathayati yaṣṭiḥ pratiṣṭitāsīti /
GK16visa10cu:1216: (lo, ai) itthamiti vakṣyamāṇasya buddhisthitayāṃ idamā parāmarśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1220: yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgād galitaṃ na lakṣitam” //
GK16visa10cu:1222_0: “eṇālaṃ sambhrameṇa tyaja gavaya ! bhayaṃ sairibha ! svairamāssva kṣaubhaṃ mā yāstarakṣo
GK16visa10cu:1222_1: ! vihara giridarīṃ svecchayaivācyabhalla ! pārindraḥ pāradṛśvā nikhilavanabhuvaḥ
GK16visa10cu:1225: anabhidheyatayā abhidhāyāḥ prakṛtabodhanena viramād asya śleṣasya /
GK16visa10cu:1227: “vidvanmānasahaṃsa--” ityādau śleṣagarbhe rūpake 'pi mānasaśabdasya cittasarorūpobhayārthatve 'pi rūpakeṇa śleṣo bādhyate /
GK16visa10cu:1228: sarorūpasyaivārthasya viśrāntidhāmatayā prādhānyāt, śleṣe hyarthadvayasyāpi samakakṣatvam /
GK16visa10cu:1232: viduṣāṃ mana eva mānasaṃ sarastatra haṃseti rājñaḥ sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:1234: viśrāntidhāmatā paryyantikapratītiviṣayatā, haṃsāśrayatvena na tadrūpakasyaiva tathātvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1236: yathā “pṛthukārttasvarapātram” ityatra sadanadvayaviśeṣaṇayoḥ śliṣṭārthayoḥ viśrāntistadāha---śleṣe hīti /
GK16visa10cu:1241: ataevātra “rājanārāyaṇaṃ lakṣmīḥ samāliṅgati nirbharam” ityatra rājño nārāyaṇatvocitalakṣmīsamāliṅganaṃ varṇyate /
GK16visa10cu:1242: tathā “mukhacandra prakāśate” ityatra mukhaṃ candrarūpatāmāpadyata ityuparacitacandradharmasya tatra varṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:1243: samakakṣatvaṃ na khalu rūpakavad ekasya gauṇatānyasya prādhānyam /
GK16visa10cu:1245: yathā---“hṛdijñeṣu vakṣyati” ityādau vahanavacanayoḥ tathā “pṛthukārtasvara” ityādau pṛthukādīnām /
GK16visa10cu:1247: “sannihitabālāndhakārā bhāsvanmūrtiśca” ityādau virodhābhāse 'pi viruddhārthasya pratibhātamātrasya prarohābhāvānna śleṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1257_1: iti bādhasyāpi upasthitimātreṇa eva virodhābhāsālaṅkāratā śleṣasya tu śliṣṭārthasyānvaye
GK16visa10cu:1261: bhāsvataḥ kāntimato 'pīvā sūryyamūrttau andhakārasya sannidhānābhāvād virodhābhāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1268: evaṃ punarurakteti---na hi bhujaṅgakuṇḍaliśabdayoḥ ekārthatvabodhaḥ paryntikaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1276: itthamuktasthaleṣu śleṣālaṅkāraṃ bādhitvā te te alaṅkārā evetyuktvā alaṅkārāntarasyaiva bādhakaḥ śleṣa iti tadabhipretaṃ vaktumāha---yena dhvastamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1278: svecchopajātetyādau dapike sakalakalamityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityagre 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1279: tena yena dhvastamityādau mādhavomādhavayordvayorapi prākaraṇikayoḥ yena dhvastetyādyekadharmānvayarūpastulyayogitālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1284: nītānāmityādau tu aprākaraṇikayoreva vanavṛddharakamalayoḥ nītānīmityādi pūrvārddhekte karmānvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1290: “svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
GK16visa10cu:1298: prasūnaviśikho 'lpabuddhiḥ prabhuśca svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi svecchayā sarvalokopari prāptādhikāro 'pi dehīti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1300: tathāpi mārgaṇaśataiḥ asaṃkhyabāṇaiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1301: uktarūpaḥ prabhustu lokeṣu dehīti dadasveti vacanaṃ na yāti na prāptoti /
GK16visa10cu:1303: mārgaṇaśataiḥ paradhanānveṣaṇarūpamārgaṇaśataiḥ arthāt īdṛśapadātiśataiḥ duḥ khaṃ dadāti /
GK16visa10cu:1304: dehītyanuktvāpi padatidvārā sarvasaṃva hṛtvā duḥ khaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1305: adhikārasattvāddehītyuktvāpi sarvasvaṃ grahītuṃ sāmarthyasattve 'pi alpabuddhitvāttathā na karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1306: evaṃ prasūnaviśikhaḥ svadattamohād akāṇḍe 'kasmājjīvanamapi samākṣipati harati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1307: atra prākaraṇi ka uktarūpaḥ prabhuraprākaraṇikaḥ prasūnaviśikhaḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1313: svecchayā upajāta āśritaḥ viṣayaḥ bhogaḥ yasya /
GK16visa10cu:1314: vaktuṃ na yātīti na tatra svārthanivedanaṃ vaktuṃ śakya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1316: iti mārgaṇaśataiḥ yācanaśataiḥ pradānābhāvāt punaḥ punaḥ kṛtaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1321: vaktuṃ na yātīdṛśaḥ samprati me kāma iti /
GK16visa10cu:1327_0: ityādau copamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi śleṣasyaitadviṣayaparihāreṇāsaṃbhavād eṣāṃ ca śaleṣaviṣayaparihāreṇāpi
GK16visa10cu:1327_1: sthiteretadviṣaye śleṣasya prādhānyena camatkāritvapratīteśca śleṣeṇaiva vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1332: tatra parasparavyabhicārasattvena dvayorapyalaṅkāratvaṃ draḍhayannubhayasattveṣu viṣayeṣu śleṣasyaivaucityamityāha---śleṣasyaitad ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1333: pratikūlatāmupagate hi vidhau ityādiṣu etadviṣayaparihāreṇa śleṣasya śleṣarahitatulyayogitādīpakopamānāntu śleṣaparihāreṇa sthitirbahuṣvevodāharaṇeṣu draṣṭavyā /
GK16visa10cu:1343: (lo, i) sakalakalaṃ kolāhaladhvanisahitaṃ, sakalābhaiḥ kalābhiryuktaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:1344: eṣāṃ tulyayogitādīnāṃ trayāṇāmalaṅkāraṇāṃ prābalyena camatkāritvaṃ kavinā vdyarthaśabdasya vaicitryabodhopāyatvenopādānāt /
GK16visa10cu:1348: atra ca mādhavomādhavayorekasya vācyatvaniyame parasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:1355: śabdayostantratāṅgīkāreṇa dvayorvācaytvaniyamaḥ samanantaroktaprakāreṇa dhvanitantravādimate caikasya vācyatvamitarasya vyaṅgyatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1367: śleṣasyālaṅkārāntaraviviktaviṣayāsattve eva tasyāpavādakatvaṃ, tadeva tu na /
GK16visa10cu:1370: atra yena dhvastamityādau iti samīcīnaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1378_0: tathā ca vaktrā yadyekamevārthaṃ prakramyedaṃ padyamuktaṃ syāttadānyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena
GK16visa10cu:1378_1: tulyayogitāyā atra prasaktyabhāvenāyameva tulyayogitālaṅkāraviviktaḥ śleṣasya viṣayaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1379: naca tathāpi vyaṅgyopamālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa evāyaṃ śleṣa iti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1380_1: kevalaṃ tatrālaṅkāravyapadeśo brāhmaṇaśramaṇanyāyena vācyatādaśāyāmalaṅkāratvamādāya gauṇa eva /
GK16visa10cu:1382: nanu mādhavomādhavayoḥ dvayārapi tulyavibhaktiviṣayatvena prākarāṇakatvamevetyato dvayārvācyatvenātra tulyayogitaivetyata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1391: evaṃ ca yena dhvastetyādau nītānāmityādau ca yattulyayogitā---pradarśanaṃ prākkṛtaṃtatparakīyamapapradarśanamātraṃ kṛtamiti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1392: vastutastu taddvaye śleṣa eva tulyayogitārahita iti sādhitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1397: pracakame pallavarāgatāmrā prabhā pataṅgasya muneśca dhenuḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:1398: ityādau tulyayogitāyāmekasyaiva nilayagamanopakramarūpadharmasya saurabhīprabhayordharmiṇoḥ sambaddhatayā pratyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1399: iha tu śleṣeṣu punaranekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāṃ mādhavomādhavaprabhṛtīnāṃ yena dhvastamanobhavenetyādirūpapṛthagdharmasambaddhatayā pratyaya ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1404: yadyapi tulyayogitāyāmapi dvayorna prakṛtāprakṛtatvaṃ tathāpi tad vivakṣā,
GK16visa10cu:1408: pūrṇopamāyā nirviṣayatvāpatteḥ “kamalamiva mukhaṃ manojñametat” ityādyasti pūrṇopamāyā viṣaya iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1409: na, yadi “sakala-” ityādau śabdaśleṣatayā nopamā tatkimaparāddhaṃ “manojñam” ityādāvarthaśleṣeṇa /
GK16visa10cu:1416_0: tathā sakalakalamityādau ca yadupamāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi apavādatvena śleṣasyaiva
GK16visa10cu:1416_1: prādhānyena vyapadeśo bhavituṃ yukta ityuktaṃ tatropamaivālaṅkāro na śleṣa iti pratipādayati---sakalakalamityādau ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1419: saiva utpattiheturjñānotpattiheturyasya; śleṣastādṛśo na, upamājñānajñāpyo na śleṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1421: atra śleṣa eva tvalaṅkāra iti netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1422: tathā ca śliṣṭadharmasādharmyā upamā evālaṅkāra ityuktamanena /
GK16visa10cu:1424: upamānopameya sādhāraṇadharme vādicaturṇām upādāne hi pūrṇopamā /
GK16visa10cu:1431: tadvān viṣaya eva pūrṇopamāyā viṣayaḥ syādityāśaṅkate---kamalamiveti /
GK16visa10cu:1432: atra hi na śleṣo manojñatvaguṇakathanarūpakriyayoreva sādharmyād na tu śliṣṭaśabdasya iti /
GK16visa10cu:1435_0: yadi sakalakalamityatropamāṃ bādhitvā śleṣa eva śabdālaṅkārastadā kamalamiva mukhamityādāvapyupamāṃ
GK16visa10cu:1435_1: bādhitvā arthaśleṣālaṅkāre prasajati tena kimaparāddhaṃ manojñatvādidharmāṇāmubhayatrānvayarūpaśliṣṭatvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1436: ivaśabdasadbhāvādupamāyā eva tatrānubhavikatve tu sakalakalamityādāvapi śabdasādharmyodanubhūyamānopamaivetyabhiprāyeṇātra rudraṭoktamapi pramāṇayati---sphuṭamartheti /
GK16visa10cu:1437: ihāpi śabdālaṅkāramadhye 'pi “tavādhera ca rāgo 'bhūd rambhoru ! hṛdaye ca me” ityatra śabdāsādharmyāt samuccayālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1441: pūrṇopamāprakaraṇe lakṣyamāṇārthaśleṣeṇa kamala mivetyādau manojñatvadharmasya kamalamukharūpapratisambandhibhedāṅgīkāraprayojitena kimaparāddham /
GK16visa10cu:1442: tulyenāparādhena śabdaśleṣaviṣaye pūrṇopamāmanaṅgīkṛtya etad viṣaye kiṃ tasyāḥ parigraho 'bhimato yuṣmākaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:1447: iha śabdālaṅkāramadhye guṇasāmyaṃ, kamalamityādi, kriyāsāmyaṃ candra iva mukhaṃ śobhate ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:1449: nanu guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivopamāprayojakatā yuktā, tatra sādharmyasya vāstavatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1450: śabdasāmyasya tu na tathā, tatra sādharmyasyāvāstavatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1451: tataśca pūrṇopamāyā anyathānupapattyā guṇakriyāsāmyasyaivārthaśleṣaviṣayatayāḥ parityāge pūrṇopamāviṣayatā yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:1460: na tu sakalakalamityādau śabdasādharmyasya ityatra upamāprayojakatvamityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1462: śabdasya sādharmyaṃ ca vācakatāsambandhena iti yadvṛttitvāditibhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1464: (lo, ṛ) tatra guṇakriyāsāmye vāstavatvāt svābhāvikatvāt avāstavatvāt atāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1469: tadā kathaṃ “vidvanmānasa--” ityādāvādhārabhūte cittādau sarovarādyāropo rājādehasādyāhopaprayojakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1473_0: yadi hi vācakatāsambandhasya vṛttiniyāmakatvābhāvena śabdarūpasādharmyasya avāstavatvānnālaṅkāraprayojakatvaṃ
GK16visa10cu:1473_1: tadā paramparitarūpake eva śabdavācyatvena sāmyena tadarthayorabhedāropātmakarūpaṃ
GK16visa10cu:1476: ayamarthaḥ-yadi śabdasāmyasya sakalakalamityādau nopamāprayojakatā kathaṃ tarhi “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājño haṃsāropasya mānasāsādhāraṇaprayojakatā ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1482: (vi, ṅa) nanu sādharmyaṃ tāvat samāno dharmastasyāvāstavatve tadanupapannam /
GK16visa10cu:1483: vidvanmānasetyādau tvabhedāropa āhāryye 'vāstavatve 'pi śliṣṭaśabdarūpadoṣeṇa sambhavatyeva ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1494: ityupamāyā evāṅgitvena vyapadeśo jyāyān “pradhānena hi byapadeśā bhavanti” iti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1495: nanu śabdālaṅkāraviṣaye 'ṅgāṅgibhāvasaṅkaro nāṅgīkriyate tatkathamatra śleṣopamayoraṅgāṅgabhāvaḥ saṅkara iti cet ?
GK16visa10cu:1500: (vi, ca) nanu tatraiva śabdabodhyatvarūpasādṛśyāttatropamāpadaṃ gauṇamevetyata āhakiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:1508: tathā ca śliṣṭapadārthānusandhānena sāmyapratītau tato 'ṅginyupamā pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:1521: śleṣādestvarthānusādhānāt sāpekṣatvena parasparāpekṣāsambhavāt kathaṃ vā na svīkriyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1532: itthaṃ sakalakalamityatropamaiva na śleṣa iti sādhite śleṣādhīnavastudhvanāvapi na śleṣālaṅkāra ityāha---satpakṣā iti /
GK16visa10cu:1534: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrāḥ kṛṣṇavarṇacañcūcaraṇā haṃsaviśeṣāḥ śaratkālavaśāt medinīpṛṣṭe nipantītyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1536: āśā prasādhanaṃ dikṣu gamanaṃ, caurādikasya sādhergatyarthatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:1539: tatra dhārttarāṣṭrā dhṛtarāṣṭrāputrā duryyodhanādayaḥ prasādhitāśāḥ śāsitadiṅmaṇḍalāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1541: satpakṣāḥ prakṛṣṭasahāyāḥ kālavaśād yamavaśāt madhuragiraḥ kāntavācaḥ medinīṣṭe nipatanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1549: atra śaradvarṇanayā prakaraṇena dhārtarāṣṭrādiśabdānāṃ haṃsādyarthābhidhāne niyamanādduryodhanādirūpor'thaḥ śabdaśaktimūlo vastudhvaniḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1550: iha ca prakṛtaprabandhābhidheyasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvādupamānopameyabhāvo na vivakṣita iti nopamādhvanirna vā śleṣa iti sarvamavadātam /
GK16visa10cu:1553: (vi, ja) atra copamādhvanitvaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraśca na prasajyata ityāha---iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:1554: prakṛtaprabandho veṇīsaṃhāranāṭakaṃ tadabhidheyasya tatpratipādyasya kurūṇāṃ maraṇarūpasya dvitīyārthasya sūcyatayaiva vyaṅgyatayetyarthaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:1561: sakalakalamityādau ca śleṣaghaṭita upamālaṅkāra evetyādikaṃ viśaditamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1564: sūcyatayaiva vivakṣitatvāt yaduktamatraiva nāṭakalakṣaṇāvasare “sūcayed vastubījaṃ vā mukhyapātramathāpivā“iti upameyopamānabhāvo haṃsādīnāṃ duryodhanādibhaiḥ sahetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1570: samprati rasānupakārakamapi kavibhisteṣu teṣu śaktipradarśanārthamupanibaddhatvātprācyairalaṅkāramadhye lakṣitaṃ citraṃ nirūpayati---padmeti /
GK16visa10cu:1571: asya cālaṅkāratāyāṃ tathāvidhanaipuṇyādisaṃskāravaśena vismayāveśo yathākathañcid bījam /
GK16visa10cu:1574: asya ca tathāvidhilipisanniveśaviśeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyināmapi varṇānāṃ tathāvidhaśrotrākāśasamavāyavi śeṣavaśena camatkāravidhāyibhirvarṇerabhedenopacārācchabdālaṅkāratvam /
GK16visa10cu:1578: atra varṇasmārakalipīnāṃ sanniveśasyaiva padmādyākārakatvāllipīnāṃ cāśabdatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvamasyānupapannamityāśaṅky samādhatte---tathāvidhaśrotreti /
GK16visa10cu:1579: tathāvidhalipismāryyavarṇasya yaḥ śrotrarūpa ākāśe samavāyaviśeṣaḥ tadvaśena camatkārādhāyibhirvarṇaiḥ saha lipeḥ abhedopacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1580: tādṛśasamavāyasya varṇānubhavajanakatvaṃ tajjanitasaṃskāreṇa lipito varṇasmaraṇaṃ tataścamatkāra ityetatparamparayā śrotrākāśasamavāyasya camatkārajanakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:1587: atra hiśabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvamātreṇa śabdalaṅkāratvāṅgīkāre 'nuprasāntaḥ- pātitvameva syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1591: māttadhūrtatamāvāsā sā vāmā me 'stu mā ramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1596: māttadhūrttatamā vāsā sā vāmā me 'stu māramā” //
GK16visa10cu:1599: kīdṛśī cārurucā viśiṣṭā ataeva māsuṣamā, lakṣmītulyaparamāśobhā /
GK16visa10cu:1605: pūrvatrānvitasyāpi āvṛttyā paścādapyanvayena sā vāmā me māramā kāmalakṣmīrastu /
GK16visa10cu:1606: āvṛttivaśena sā vāmā ityasya paścādapyanvayena tasya vā parakīyapadatvādapi tatparatvād me ityādeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1617: karṇikāyāmādyavarṇaṃ likhitvā dale dvau dvau varṇau lekhyau /
GK16visa10cu:1620: (lo, ā) mārameti---māyā lakṣmyā ramaṇāt māramo viṣṇustasya asusamā praṇasamā /
GK16visa10cu:1623: ātto gṛhīto dhūrttatamasyāvāso yathā evaṃbhūtā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1624: tathābhūtā sā prasiddhā ramā lakṣmīrme vāmā, vakāmāstviti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1626: karṇikāyām “mā” śabdaṃ vinyasya “ramā” ityasyākṣaradvayaṃ tatra digdale liśitvā,
GK16visa10cu:1629: iti akṣaradvayaṃ vidigdalena praveśya “cāru” ityakṣarābhyāmitaradigradalena nirgamapraveśau /
GK16visa10cu:1631: iti akṣaradvaṃya dattvā tadanantaradigdale “dhūrtta” ityakṣaradvayena praviśya punaḥ karṇikākṣarāt prabhṛti tenaiva nirgamya “tamā” ityakṣaradvayena,
GK16visa10cu:1635: taditaradigdale “me 'stu” ityakṣaradvayena nirgatya punaḥ prāk nirgamya digdale “māra” ityakṣaradvayena praviśya karṇikātāṃ gate “mā” ityatra viśrāntiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1639: “sānandaṃ devadaityadvijabhujagamukhaiḥ praṇibhiḥ sevyamānā nāśaṃ tāpaṃ nayantī śaradi śaśikalāṃ śyāmayantī svabhāsā /
GK16visa10cu:1640: sā sakhyaḥ sādharāre sakalajagadadhīśena saṃyuktahārā sā dhvastāśeṣapātā salilanidhisutā santaṃ pātu yuṣmān” //
GK16visa10cu:1651: nālaṅkāro na rasaprakarṣako 'laṅkāra iti, kintu uktyaṅkāra evetyāha---uktivaicitryamātramiti /
GK16visa10cu:1652: tathā ca vaicitryamalaṅkāra iti alaṅkārasāmānyalakṣaṇākrāntatvād uktyalaṅkāra eva sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1653: sā cyutadattetyāditriprakārā kriyā guptyādikā ca bhavatītyāha---vyutadatteti /
GK16visa10cu:1665: atra yathāśruter'thasambhavepi anupayuktakathanarūpatvena cyutadattākṣaratve eva tātparyyāt /
GK16visa10cu:1666: prahelikātvaṃ tatra yathāśrute 'partho yathā---kokilāḥ śālavṛkṣe kūjanti /
GK16visa10cu:1668: nipīḍitā kuraṅgākṣī vadanena kiṃ karotu iti /
GK16visa10cu:1672: ebhiruddīpakairmadanena nipīḍitā satī kuraṅgākṣī kiṃ karotviti /
GK16visa10cu:1680: tasmai gāṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca sarvāṇyābharaṇāni ca” //
GK16visa10cu:1690: iti atra mayūraṃ jayati ityatra luptaḥ karttā /
GK16visa10cu:1691: siddhānte tu mayusturaṅgavadano giriśaṅgasthitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ rañjayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1696: siddhānte tu vāḥ jalaṃ puruṣo 'yamayati yāti /
GK16visa10cu:1697: akṣaralopaguptiḥ viruddhapradarśanaṃ ca yathā--- “mukundenāmunā nūnaṃ śubhreṇa varavarṇini /
GK16visa10cu:1699: ” atra mukundena śbhreṇa hasitenāsitena iti viruddhadharmavattvam /
GK16visa10cu:1701: siddhānte tu mukundapadasya mukārarāhityāt kundena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1702: tathā ca tena kundavaiśiṣṭyena yad hasitaṃ tena rājamānāsītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1704: athāvasaraprāpteṣvarthālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamūleṣu lakṣitavyeṣu teṣāmapyupajīvyatvena prādhānyāt prathamamupamāmāha--
GK16visa10cu:1709: upamārūpakotprekṣādayo bahavo 'laṅkārāḥ sādṛśyamūlā anyālaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā camatkārādhikyāt prathamaṃ te lakṣitumucitāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1719: sāmyaṃ vācyamavaidharmyaṃ vākyaikya upamā dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.14 //
GK16visa10cu:1724: dvayorupameyopamānayoḥ sāmyaṃ vākyaikye vācyaṃ sad upamā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1739: atra ca sāmyamityasya samāno dharma iti nār'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1742: kintūpameyopamānayoḥ sāmānyasādṛśyarūpasya dharmasya tayoranuyogitapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva atra sāmyapadārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1743: yandra iva mukhamityatra candrapratiyogisādṛśyavanmukhamiti bodhe sādṛśyasya pratiyogitāyāścandre 'nupayogitāyāśca mukhe pratīteḥ sādṛśyasambandha evopametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1744: etaeva sādharmyamupamābhede itikāvyaprakāśoktalakṣaṇe samānena dharmeṇa sambandha upamā ityeva tatra vyākhyātam /
GK16visa10cu:1746: iti tatra likhanāt sādṛśyapratiyogitākhyaḥ sambandha eva tanmate upamānānuyogitākhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1747: granthakṛnmate tu upamānopameyagataṃ sanbandhaṃ bodhayantītyagre likhanāt pratiyogitānuyogitākhyasambandhadvayamevopamā /
GK16visa10cu:1748: kāvyaprakāśe ca tādṛśapratiyogitāyā ivādyavyayapadavācyatvena upamāyāśca śrautītvaṃ tulyādyanavyayapadavācyatvena tasyā ārthotvam /
GK16visa10cu:1750: prakṛtagranthakṛttuḥ ivādayaḥ śrutamātrā eva śīghramupamāṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve śrotī upamā /
GK16visa10cu:1751: tulyādayo 'navyayaśabdāstu praṇidhānena vilambādeva upamāṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve ārthoti vakṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:1754: yadi cānvitābhidhānavādāvalambena vācyatvasvīkārastathāpi ivāderupamānasya vānupādāne yā luptopamā tatra tādṛśasambandhasyāvācyatvāttatrāvyāptiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1755: ataeva kāvyaprakāśe tādṛśasambandharūpāyā upamāyā vācyatvaghaṭitaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na kṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:1759: ataeva rūpakādau sādharmyasya vyaṅgyatvādeva tatra vācyapadena tadvyāvṛttirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:1760: ivāderupamānasyānupādāne tvadhyāhṛtādivāderupamānavācakapadācca tallābho, na vyañjanayeti tattvam /
GK16visa10cu:1762: tadanabhyupagame tu ivādyupādāne tulyādyupādāne vā saṃsargamaryyādayaiva tallābha iti /
GK16visa10cu:1769: sā pūrṇā yadi sāmānyadharma aupamyavāci ca /
GK16visa10cu:1778: (vi, da) sā ca pūrṇā luptā ceti dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:1789: sāmānyadharma ityasya vivṛttiḥ sādhāraṇadharma iti dvayorupamānopameyayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1798: ārtho tulyasamānādyāstulyārtho tatra vā vatiḥ // VisSd_10.16 //
GK16visa10cu:1799: yathevavādayaḥ śabdā upamānānantaraprayuktatulyādipadasādhāraṇā api śrutimātreṇopamānopameyagatasādṛśyalakṣaṇasambandhaṃ bodhayantīti tatsadbhāve śrautyupamā /
GK16visa10cu:1804: iyaṃ pūrṇopamā sarvaprakāraiva śrautrī ārtho cetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1814: tasya tulyādipadānāmapi vācyatvāt śīghrapratīyamānatvena ivādito 'viśeṣeṇa śrautyārthovibhāgānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1817: tatra tasyeveti vatividhāyakaṃ pāṇinisūtram . tatraiva tasyeva ityarthakaṃ ṣaṣṭhyantāt saptamyantād vā ivārthe vatirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1820: nanu mukhaṃ candratulyamityādyākāreṇa upamānānantare yāni prayuktāni tulyasadṛśāni padāni tatsādhāraṇāstatprāyāḥ yadyapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1822: ayamāśayaḥ---mukhaṃ kamalamiva ityādeḥ śabdasya prayogādeva mukhamupameyaṃ kamalaṃ copamānamiti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1823: na tvevaṃ tulyādipadopādāna iti samanantarameva vakṣyati--evamiti /
GK16visa10cu:1825: yata ivaśabdasyopādāne śrautī, atastadarthavihitasya vaterupādāne 'pi saiva yukteti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1829: “kamalaṃ mukhaṃ ca tulyam” ityādāvabhayatrāpi viśrāmyantītyarthānusandhānādeva sāmyaṃ pratipādayantīti tatsadbhāve ārtho /
GK16visa10cu:1837_1: upameyopamānaniṣṭhapratiyogyanuyogirūpāyā upamāyā api pratisandhānagamyatvāt tatsadbhāve ārthotyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1839: kamalaṃ mukhasyeti---nacātra mukhamupamānaṃ kamalamupameyamevaiti kathamupamāne viśrāntiriti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1841: tulyārthe 'pi vatividhāyakaṃ “tena tulyam” iti pāṇineraparaṃ sūtram /
GK16visa10cu:1844: (lo, ḷ) upameye ityādibhiḥ saptamyantaiḥ viśrāmyantīti kriyāyāḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1855: hṛdayaṃ madayati vadanaṃ tava śaradinduryathā bāle !” //
GK16visa10cu:1859: (vi, pa) tatra pūrṇāyāḥ ṣaḍvidhatvaṃ darśayati--dve iti /
GK16visa10cu:1871: kumbhāvivetyatra “ivena nityasamāso vibhaktyalopaḥ pūrvapadaprakṛtisvaratvaṃ ca” iti nityasamāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1875: cakitamṛgalocanābhyāṃ sadṛśī capale ca locane tasyāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:1879: atra sudhayā tulya ityarthe tṛlyārthe vatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1886: luptā sāmānyadharmāderekasya yadi vā dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.17 //
GK16visa10cu:1894: sāpi yathāsambhavaṃ śrautī ārtho ca bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1901: pūrṇāvaddharmalope sā vinā śrautīṃ tu taddhite // VisSd_10.18 //
GK16visa10cu:1902: sā luptopamā dharmasya sādhāraṇaguṇakriyārūpasya lope pūrṇāvaditi pūrvoktarītyā ṣaṭprakārā,
GK16visa10cu:1903: kiṃ tvatra taddhite śrautyā asambhavāt pañcaprakārā /
GK16visa10cu:1926: vācaḥ sudhā ivetyatra madhuratvaṃ dharmo luptaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1936: karmakartrorṇamuli ca syādevaṃ pañcadhā punaḥ // VisSd_10.19 //
GK16visa10cu:1940: dvivedhe ityasya kyaci ityatraivānvayo na tu kyaṅaītyatrāpi /
GK16visa10cu:1949: antaḥ purīyasi raṇeṣu, sutīyasi tvaṃ pauraṃ janaṃ tava sadā ramaṇīyate śrīḥ /
GK16visa10cu:1950: dṛṣṭaḥ priyābhiramṛtadyutidarśamindra- sañcāramatra bhuvi sañcarasi kṣitīśa !” //
GK16visa10cu:1958: atra strehaviṣayatvaṃ dharmo luptaḥ anayorādhārakarmaṇoḥ kyac /
GK16visa10cu:1987_0: atra kyaṅaditraye tadarthācārasya ṇamuldvaye ca dhātvarthadarśanasañjārayośca sādhāraṇadharmāṇāṃ
GK16visa10cu:1987_1: sattvād dharmaluptodāharaṇāni etāni na sambhavantītyataḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā upamāpratipādake
GK16visa10cu:1991: nanu kyaṅādiṣu samyagaupamyapratītirnāsti pratyayatvenāsvatantratvād ivādiprayogābhāvācceti na vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:1997: nanu tādṛśārthe vidhānasattve 'pi ivādivanna tebhyaḥ svata aupamyapratītiḥ;
GK16visa10cu:1999: ataḥ kyajādayaḥ svata aupamyapratipādakatvābhāvānna svata aupamyapratipādakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2000: tathā ca tatsattve 'pi vivakṣitaḥ svata aupamyapratipādakalopo nāstītyāśaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16visa10cu:2001: nanu tairaupamyaṃ svataḥ pratyāyyate eva; kintu tādṛśārthasya prakṛtyarthānvitatvamātraṃ niyataṃ,
GK16visa10cu:2002: teṣāṃ tādṛśārthakatve tu tadvivarakevaśabdaprayoga eva nāsiti /
GK16visa10cu:2004: tathā ca kyajādaya ivādivanna svata aupamyapratipādakāḥ ityāpātata eveyaṃ vicārasahāpyāśaṅkā /
GK16visa10cu:2005: tatraṃ svatastu avivakṣaiva na sambhavatīti samādhatte---neti /
GK16visa10cu:2012: kyaṅādīnāṃ tu dyotakatvam; ivādīnāmapi vācakatve niścayābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2023_0: vinigamakābhāve 'pi svatantramukhyatayā yadi kasyacitpratyayasya vācakatvaṃ kasyacitpratyayasya
GK16visa10cu:2023_1: vyañjakatvamucyate tadā ivādayo 'pi na vācakāḥ syuruktimātreṇaiva pramāṇakhaṇḍane
GK16visa10cu:2025: vācakatve vā “samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakam” “prakṛtipratyayau svasvārthabodhakau” iti ca matadvaye 'pi vatyādikyaṅādyoḥ sāmyameveti /
GK16visa10cu:2029_1: vā vācakatvamiṣyate tadā mamāpi kyajādīnāmapi matabhadena svato 'svato vā vācakatvaṃ
GK16visa10cu:2030: tava yathā vācakatvaṃ mamāpi tathā vācakatvamiti sāmyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2046: kyaṅādīnāṃ tu dyotakatvamaṅgīkriyate ityata āha--- vācakatve vā iti /
GK16visa10cu:2047: samuditaṃ prakṛtipratyayābhyāṃ militaṃ, tat svarūpaṃ padam /
GK16visa10cu:2050: ayamāśayaḥ- yadi vatyādīnāṃ vācakatvāṅgīkāraḥ tadā kyaṅādīnāmapi vācakatvam /

GK16visa10cu:2668_0: alaukiko 'nyalokavilakṣaṇo yo mahāloko mahādṛṣṭipātaḥ sa eva mahāloko mahājyotistena
GK16visa10cu:2668_1: prakāśitaṃ jagattrayam arthān muktāmaṇḍitaṃ yena he tādṛśa ! atra hi rājñi muktāropo
GK16visa10cu:2677: ityatra lokatrayātmakatvamityādi rūpaṇaṃ pātālamityādi rūpaṇaṃ hetuḥ //
GK16visa10cu:2682: atra trailokyasya maṇḍapatvāropo haribāhūnāṃ stambhatvārope nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2685: (vi, ga) aśliṣṭaṃ kevalamāha---pāntu vo jaladaśyāmā iti /
GK16visa10cu:2696: “tatra ca rājabhujādīnāṃ rāhutvādyāropo rājamaṇḍalādīnāṃ candramaṇḍalatvādyārope nimittam” iti kecit /
GK16visa10cu:2706: eṣu caturṣu rūpakayornimittanaimittakabhāva uktaviparīta eveti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati---eṣviti /
GK16visa10cu:2711: aṅgino yadi sāṅgasya rūpaṇaṃ sāṅgameva tat // VisSd_10.30 //
GK16visa10cu:2717: yo rūpyate tasya dharmā api yadi rūpyante tadā sāṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2735: rāvaṇarūpeṇāvagraheṇa vṛṣṭivighātena klāntaṃ marudrūpaṃ śasyaṃ vāgrūpāmṛtena sa kṛṣṇo viṣṇurmegho śasyamabhivṛṣya abhiṣicya tirodadhe /
GK16visa10cu:2748: iha hi mukhe paṅkajatvarūpaṇānantaraṃ punā raṅgatvarūpaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2754: ekadeśe viśeṣeṇa śābdatayā sphuṭatvena virttituṃ śīlamasya rūpakasyetyekadeśavivarti /
GK16visa10cu:2760: atra lāvaṇyādau madhutvādyāropaḥ śābdaḥ, mukhasya padmatvāropa ārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2761: na ceyamekadeśavivartinyupamā vikasvaratvadharmasyāropyamāṇe padme mukhyatayā vartamānāt mukhe vopacaritatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2768: lāvaṇyarūpairmadhubhiḥ pūrṇaṃ vikasvaraṃ cāsyā āsyaṃ lokalocanarūpāṇāṃ rolambānāṃ bhramarāṇāṃ kadambaiḥ kairna pīyate /
GK16visa10cu:2775: nacetyādi lāvaṇyaṃ madhu iva ityādyupamānasambhavāt tadvaśena mukhe 'pi padmopamāpratīteḥ ityāśaṅkārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2777: vikasvaratvaṃ puṣpadharma evetyastaddharmaṇi puṣpe eva mukhyatayā sākṣāt sambandhena varttamānatvāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2778: mukhe ceti padmatulye mukhe svāśrayasādṛśyasambandhenetyevaṃ paramparāsambandharūpādupacārādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2784: viṣayiṇaḥ padmarūpeṇa rūpavattāpādane tasya vikasvarākhyadharmaparigrahaḥ sādhakaṃ prāmāṇam /
GK16visa10cu:2785: etacca saṃkaranirūpaṇaprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatīti neha tanyate /
GK16visa10cu:2787: niraṅgaṃ kevalasyaiva rūpaṇaṃ tadapi dvidhā // VisSd_10.32 //
GK16visa10cu:2807: “dāse kṛtāgasi bhavatyucitaḥ prabhūṇāṃ pādaprahāra iti sundari ! nātra dūye /
GK16visa10cu:2808: udyatkaṭhorapulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrai- ryadbhidyate mṛdu padaṃ nanu sā vyathā me” //
GK16visa10cu:2816: dāse, svādhīnajane, kṛtāgasi kṛtāparādhe, prabhūṇāṃ sevyānām /
GK16visa10cu:2819: atra kevalamiti niravayavarūpaṃ samānāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā ekatraiva nirūpaṇaṇānibandhanāt,
GK16visa10cu:2830: (lo, i) tena tena prakāreṇa aṣṭau, anyathā punarvakṣyamāṇā api bhedāḥ sambhavantītyāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2835: atrārthaḥ kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvāropaḥ khaḍge sauvidallatvārope nimittam /
GK16visa10cu:2840: khaḍgaḥ kṣmeti---khaḍga eva strītvenānāropitāyāḥ kṣamāyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ sauvidallaḥ antaḥ purasthanapuṃsakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2847: iti atra hi prasūnabāṇādeḥ rājatvādyāropaḥ candrasya sitātapatrādyāropahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2848: yadi caikasya vācyasya rūpyasya sādhakānyanekānyanyāni rūpakāṇyeva mālā ityabhiprāyaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:2849: tadā “rākāyā nabhasaścandraḥ puṇḍarīkaṃ śaśasya ca” ityudāhāryyam /
GK16visa10cu:2850: atra hi śaśini rūpyamāṇe puṇḍarīke vācye rākāyāḥ padahastalakṣmītvaṃ gaganasya saroratvaṃ śaśasya bhramaratvaṃ cārthasādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:2856: iha ca kṣmāyāṃ mahiṣītvarūpaṇaṃ vinā khaḍgasya sauvidallatvarūpaṇaṃ nopapadyate /
GK16visa10cu:2861: “asti svastyayanaṃ śriyaḥ sucaritaṃ drāghīyasaḥ śreyasaḥ saundaryyasya rasāyanaṃ niravadheḥ śīlasya līlāyitam /
GK16visa10cu:2862: vidyānāmadhidaivataṃ nirupadheḥ śauryyasya visphūrjitaṃ śrībhānustrikaliṅgamaṅgalapadaṃ gaṅgānvaye bhūpatiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2863: atra śrīprabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇiviśeṣatvarūpaṇam ārthaṃ svastyayanarūpaṇe hetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2865: dṛśyante kvacidāropyāḥ śliṣṭāḥ sāṅge 'pi rūpake // VisSd_10.33 //
GK16visa10cu:2871: (lo, u) kvacidekadeśe āropyā āropaviṣayavācake pade vyaṅgyatayā nirdiṣṭāḥ
GK16visa10cu:2876: samastavastuviṣayaṃ yathā--atraiva “vicumbati-” ityādau “cucumbe haridabalāmukhamindunāyakena” iti pāṭhe /
GK16visa10cu:2880: ayaṃ sudhāṃśuḥ amareśadiśaḥ prācyāḥ, mukhaṃ vicumbati /
GK16visa10cu:2882: udāmahīdhararūpasya stanasyāgre karaṃ raśmimeva karaṃ pāṇiṃ nidhāya,
GK16visa10cu:2883: stanāgre kīdṛśe galitaṃ tama. paṭalarūpamaṃśukaṃ yatna tādṛśe /
GK16visa10cu:2888: dvitīyasyodāharaṇaṃ spaṣṭam ” cucumbe haridabalāmukhamindunāyakena” iti pāṭhe /
GK16visa10cu:2894: atra hi “bhūbṛdāvalidambholiḥ--” ityādau rājādau parvatatvādyāropa vinā varṇanīyasya rājāderdambholitādirūpaṇaṃ sarvathaiva sādṛśyābhāvādasaṅgatam /
GK16visa10cu:2896: rājādeḥ sūryādinā sādṛśyasya tejasvitādihetukasya saṃbhavāditi na vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:2900: iha tu mahīdharādeḥ stanādinā sādṛśyaṃ pīnotuṅgatvādinā suvyaktameveti na śliṣṭaparamparitam /
GK16visa10cu:2906: paramparitaṃ yad rūpakaṃ tadeva mukhyarūpakasādhakaṃ natu sādṛśyaṃ tatsādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:2907: yatra tu sādṛśyādapi mukhyarūpakaṃ siddhyati na tatra paramparitarūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:2924: evaṃ ca “bhramimarati ” mityādau viṣaṃ jalameva viṣamityāropo jalade prasiddhasādṛśyabhujagasyārope nimittamiti śliṣṭaparamparitameva /
GK16visa10cu:2925_0: atra “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādau rājādau haṃsatvāropo mānase mānasatvārope heturiti
GK16visa10cu:2925_1: manyamānā āhuḥ--“neha viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatā “vidvanmānasahaṃsa” ityādāviva jalade bhujagāropahetukā,
GK16visa10cu:2926: kintu etatpadyāvasthitavaidyaśāstraprasiddhabhramādimaraṇāntāṣṭavidhagaralakāryyaviśeṣotthāpiteti dvyarthatāyāstādātmyāropaṇaṃ vinā prasiddheriha śleṣālaṅkāra eveti /
GK16visa10cu:2928: jalade bhujagasādṛśyasya sakalakalaṃ puramityādāviva viṣaśabdasya dvyarthatāṃ vinānupapatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2929: kiñca jaladabhujagajaṃ viṣaṃ jalamiti na ghaṭate /
GK16visa10cu:2931: tasmād viṣameva viṣamiti rūpaṇamākṣipyaiva vācyarūpaṇaṃ saṃgacchate /
GK16visa10cu:2932: naca śleṣamātneṇāstu vācyarūpaṇopapattiriti yuktaṃ, śleṣeṇa tādātmyāpratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2936: indutviṣo yudhi haṭhena tavārikīrtti- rānīya yatra ramate taruṇapratāpaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:2937: iha ekadeśavarttini rūpake kṣitibhṛd rājā eva kṣitibhṛt parvata iti śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:2938: tātrālaṅkārikacaṇḍidāsapaṇḍitādayaḥ rājani parvatatvāropaṇaṃ nistriṃśasya tamālavanatvāropaṇe heturiti śliṣṭaparimparitamādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:2943: apitu haṭhakāmukakāryye 'pīti pratāpakīrttyornāyikanāyikātvopakaraṇatvād iha prakṛtasūtroktaṃ śliṣṭaikadeśarūpyaṃ sāvayavaikadeśavivartirūpakameva bhāvituṃ yuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:2945: kiñca śliṣṭaparamparite vidvanmānasahaṃsetyādau rājño haṃsatvaṃ mānasasya mānasatvāropaṇasādṛśyaṃ vināsiddham /
GK16visa10cu:2946: iha tu nistriṃśasya tamālavanāntatvaṃ nīlimādināpi prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:2950: kevalaṃ mānasādipadeṣu ākṣipyamāṇaṃ sarovarādyartharūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ haṃsatvādisādhakamātram /
GK16visa10cu:2951: ataevātra kṣaṇadānibhetyasyāpi padasya rātrikālākṣepeṇa aniḥ śeṣaṃ bhātīti tamaso bahulībhāvāt haṭharamaṇopayogiteti prācyānāmapi vyākhyā /
GK16visa10cu:2952: tadevaṃ kṣitibhṛta ityādi sarveṣāṃ rūpyamāṇānāṃ haṭharamaṇopakaraṇatvād yathoktameva jyāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2954: āntarnimagnacarapuṣpaśaro 'tipātā-- tkiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo nayadīkṣaṇāgniḥ //
GK16visa10cu:2955: ityatra nayanāgneḥ taruṇatvasya prauḍhatvarūpamarthamādāya prathamamabhidhāyā viśrāmād vyañjanayaiva yuvarūpor'thaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:2956: iha tu kṣitibhṛta ityādau bahūnāṃ rūpaṇāt pratāpasya taruṇatvarūpaṇaṃ śābdam /
GK16visa10cu:2960: haṭhādānīya ramata ityatra kāryyasāmye 'pi na samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2961: yadi hi kāryyaleśasāmyaṃ vā samāśritya samāsoktiraṅgīkāryyā tadekadeśavivartirūpakasya viṣayāpahāra eva syāt,
GK16visa10cu:2963: yatra vācā rūpaṇaṃ nāsti dyāmāliliṅgetyādi samāsoktyudāharaṇavat kāryyasāmyabāhulyasamvalitatvam,
GK16visa10cu:2965: ābhātītyādau ca vācyarūpaṇānāṃ bahutvena kāryyādisāmyaṃ svalpatayā tatsahāyyamevācarati iti /
GK16visa10cu:2967: anayośca samāsoktyekadeśavivartirūpakayoraparamapi yuktijātamihaiva samāsoktiprastāve suvyaktaṃ bhaviṣyatītyalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:2976: “rājamaṇḍalarāhave” ityādiṣu sarvatra samāsa eva tasya darśitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:2981: tathā cātra bhrūlatayā hetunā madhupaśreṇīṃ vidhirvidadhe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2982: bhrūlatāṃ vidhātuṃ madhupaśreṇīṃ vidadhe iti paryyavasitor'thaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2986: vidadha ityādau tava bhrūlatā madhupaśreṇī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:2990: yaireṣāpi durāśayā kaliyuge rājāvalī sevitā teṣāṃ śūlini bhaktimātrasulabhe sevā kiyatkauśalam” //
GK16visa10cu:2997: atra kaliyuge yairdurāśayā eṣā rājāvalī nṛpaśreṇī sevitā bhaktimātrasulabhe śūlini teṣāṃ sevā kiyat kauśalam /
GK16visa10cu:3002: sucaritarūpaṃ yadālekhyaṃ vastu, tasya dyurūpā gaganarūpā bhittirāśrayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3014: atra ca keṣāñcidrūpakāṇāṃ śabdaśleṣamūlatve 'pi rūpakaviśeṣatvādarthālaṅkāramavye gaṇanam /
GK16visa10cu:3018: nanu padmodayetyādau paramparitādeḥ śabdānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvātkathaṃ vār'thālaṅkāramadhye gaṇanamityata āha---atreti /
GK16visa10cu:3028: ime netre rātrindivamadhikaśobhe kuvalaye tanurlāvaṇyānāṃ jaladhiravagāhe sukhataraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3036: evamuttaratra sudhādhārāyā ādhāro 'dharaścirakālasthameva pariṇataṃ pakkaṃ bimbam /
GK16visa10cu:3040: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3044: (lo, a) adhikārūḍhaṃ vaiśiṣṭyaṃ viśeṣa ārthādāropyamāṇādāropaviṣayasya yatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3045: avagāhe sukhatara ityatra lavaṇedadhirmakarataraṅgalavaṇādisadbhāvādavagāhakānāṃ sukhāvaho na bhavatītyāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3049: kāmasya puṣpavyatiriktamastraṃ bālyātparaṃ sātha vayaḥ prapede” //
GK16visa10cu:3051: na khalu sambharaṇapuṣpe maṇḍanāstrayoḥ kāraṇe, kintu tatsvarūpe /
GK16visa10cu:3054: tatkāryyasya śarīraśobhākaraṇasya madanoddīpanasya ca prastutvena kenacid anusandhīyamānatvābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3060: ityādivad atiśayoktireva bhavituṃ yukteti māmakaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3076: (lo, ā) viṣaya āropaviṣayaḥ, tadātmatayā, tadrūpatayā natu rūpakavat taduparañjakatvamātreṇa /
GK16visa10cu:3077: evaṃ cāsya viṣayātmatvena, prakṛte kāryyopayogitvena rūpakād vyavacchedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3078: rūpake vidyamānāyā api tādātmyapratīterna paryyantaṃ gantumākāṅkṣā ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3079: pariṇāmālaṅkārasya tathābhūto rūpyamāṇo vidyate yad etaddviprakāraṃ pariṇāmaṃ nāma nirvakti /
GK16visa10cu:3084: natu sato dharmiṇo vai pūrvarūpaparityāgena rūpāntarāpatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3095: atra smite āropyamāṇamupāyanaṃ vāstavasmitatayaiva pariṇataṃ, taccānuṣṭhīyamānasambhāvanopayogi /
GK16visa10cu:3098: atrā'śleṣe āropyamāṇaḥ paṇo vāstavaśleṣatayaiva pariṇataḥ anuṣṭhīyamānadyūtopayogī /
GK16visa10cu:3106: iha tūpāyanoderviṣayeṇa tādātmyaṃ prakṛte ca nāyakasaṃbhāvanādāvupayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3107: ata eva rūpake āropyasyāvacchedakatvamātreṇānvayaḥ, atra tu tādātmyena /
GK16visa10cu:3110: (vi, na) rūpake āropyamāṇasyānuṣṭhīyamānārthopayogo nāstīti darśayati---rūpake iti /
GK16visa10cu:3118: upāyanena sambhāvanasya paṇena dyūtasya ca nirvāhāt /
GK16visa10cu:3131: tādātmyaṃ tatra niveśaḥ smitādeḥ upāyanatvamasti tadviśeṣakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3134: “dāse kṛtāgasi-” ityādau rūpakameva, na tu pariṇāmaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3139: (vi, pa) dāse kṛtāgasītyādiślokīyarūpake tu pariṇāmāprasaktiṃ darśayati---dāse iti /
GK16visa10cu:3140: nanvatra kathaṃ rūpakamevetyuktaṃ sūkṣmāgratvena kaṭhoratvena ca pulakāṅkurāṇāṃ kaṇṭakabhedasya vāstavatvādevetyāha---āropyamāṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:3142: atra yadyapi pulakasya kaṇṭakāropaviṣayatvameva kaṇṭakatvenāropyamāṇatvaṃ yathāpi pādabhedakāryyakatve 'nāropyamāṇasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3143: tathāca tatkāryyanirvāhakatvaṃ yatastasyāropyamāṇamatastasya kaṇṭakatvamapi na vāstavam /
GK16visa10cu:3152: ityatrāpi gurudakṣiṇāyāḥ suratinaipuṇyena pariṇāmāt pariṇaāmālaṅkāra eveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:3162: yatra himālaye auṣadhaya eva rajanyāṃ vanecarāṇāṃ vanitāsakhānāṃ suratapradīpā bhavanti ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3169: naca suratameva śābdaṃ prakṛtaṃ nāndhakāranāśaḥ; tasyāśābdatvāditi vācyam ?
GK16visa10cu:3177: pratibhayā utthito 'nyasyāprastutārthakoṭeḥ prastute vastuni yaḥ saṃśayaḥ sa sandehālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3184: evaṃca saṃśaya ityetāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryāpte prakṛte anyasyeti vacanaṃ “madhyaṃ tava ” ityādi vṛttyudāhariṣyamāṇavyavacchedārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3188: evañca kavivarṇitasyāpi “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” iti saṃśayasya nālaṅkāratā /
GK16visa10cu:3192: yatra saṃśaya eva paryavasānaṃ sa śuddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3194: “kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabhahodbhinnā navā vallarī velāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3195: udrāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsaviśrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3199: iyaṃ nāyikā kiṃ lāvaṇyataroḥ navā vallarī ! lāvaṇyarūpatarvāśritā navā latetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3200: kīdṛśī rasabharodbhinnā śṛṅgararasa eva rasojalaṃ tenodbhinno jalasekena latodbhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:3201: kiṃvā velayā nīreṇa procchalitasya ucchalitasya lāvaṇyarūpasya vārāṃnidheḥ samudrasyalaharikā taraṅgaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3203: kiṃ vā śṛṅgāriṇo devasya kandarpasya arthāt śṛṅgārārthamuddamotkalikānatāṃ gāḍhotkaṇṭhāvatāṃ janānāṃ sthāne upadeśasya arthāt śṛṅgāropadeśsya sākṣād vaṣṭiṇalambanabhūtā yaṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3205: devasya kīdṛśasya svasamayasya vasantasya upanyāsena viśrammiṇo viśvastasya mamedānīmupadeśo yogya ityaveṃ viśvāsavata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3215: tathāhi---yasyāḥ kasyā api vidyāyā upadeṣṭāraḥ capalacittanivāraṇāya tāḍanārthaṃ yaṣṭimādadate iti lokaprasiddhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3217: yatrādāvante ca saṃśaya eva madhye niścayaḥ sa niścayamadhyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3219: “ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ saptabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sarvāḥ prasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
GK16visa10cu:3220: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti punaḥ samālokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3222: (lo, ṛ) sarvā diśo na prasarati, kintūrdhvameva jvalatīti prasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:3230: ājau yuddhe tvāṃ samālokya pratibhaṭāḥ pratikūlavīrā ityevaṃ vitarkān vidadhati kurvānti /
GK16visa10cu:3235: ayaṃ tu sarvadikprasārī, ato na kṛśānurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3241: yatrādau saṃśayo 'nte ca niścayaḥ sa niścayāntaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3252: kīdṛśaiḥ bakasahavāsināṃ parokṣaiḥ--bakā hi matsyaniścayārthaṃ dhyāyinastatsahavāsinastataḥ śikṣitadhyānāsteṣāmapi parokṣaiḥ apratyakṣaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3255: apratibhotthāpite tu “sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā” ityādisaṃśaye nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3263: asti nāstīti saṃdehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate” //
GK16visa10cu:3268: sandehaḥ kasya citte na bhāsate ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3269: tatrātiśayoktiḥ iti vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ pañcavidhāyā atiśayokterbhede 'pyabhedāroparūpaprabheda evātretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3279: bhrāntiścittadharmaviśeṣo vidyate yatra bhramaprakāre sa bhrāntimān ityanvarthanāmālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3282: “mugdhā dugdhadhiyā gavāṃ vidadhate kumbhānagho vallavāḥ karṇe kairavaśaṅkayā kuvalayaṃ kurvanti kāntā api /
GK16visa10cu:3283: karkandhūphasamuccinoti śabarī muktāphalāśaṅkayā sāndrā candramaso na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃ candrikā” //
GK16visa10cu:3289: candramasaḥ sāndrā candrikā kasya janasya cittavibhramaṃ na kurute ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3291: ballavāḥ gopāḥ mugdhā bhrāntāḥ santaḥ dugdhadhiyā gavāmadhaḥ kumbhān vidadhate dugdhamādātumityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3312: saṅge saiva tathaikā tribhuvanamapi tanmayaṃ virahe” //
GK16visa10cu:3320: na cātrāpi tribhuvane tatsādṛśyabhramāttadbhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3322: tathāca saṅgamād virahasyādhikyād vyatirekālaṅkāraḥ evāyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3323: evaṃ ca lobhādinā bhrame 'pi na bhrāntimān /
GK16visa10cu:3336: ekasyānekadhollekho yaḥ sa ullekha ucyate // VisSd_10.37 //
GK16visa10cu:3347: “priya iti gopavadhūbhiḥ śiśuriti vṛddhairadhīśa iti devaiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3356: “āpo hi nārāḥ” tadayanaḥ tatstho nārāyaṇaḥ jalaśāyī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3358: atraikasyāpi bhagavatastattadguṇayogādanekadhollekhe gopavadhūprabhṛtīnāṃ rucyādayo yathāyogaṃ prayojakāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3369: tathāca tādṛśarucimanto grahītāro bhinnā iti darśitam /
GK16visa10cu:3377: ekasminnarthe anusandhānena manoniveśena sādhita ābhāsaḥ jñānaṃ buddhirapi yathārucyādi---bhedāt bhidyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3384: evaṃ ca priya ityādau bhagavataḥ priyatve gopavadhūnāṃ rucyāditritayamapi prayojakam /
GK16visa10cu:3388: atra bhagavataḥ priyatvādīnāṃ vāstavatvād grahītṛbhedācca na mālārūpakam, na ca bhrāntimān /
GK16visa10cu:3391: na ceha bhagavati gopavadhūprabhṛtibhiḥ priyatvādyadhyavasīyate priyatvāderbhagavati tatkāle tāttvikatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3394: (vi, ka) atra mālārūpakaprasāktiṃ nirasyati---atra bhagavata iti /
GK16visa10cu:3397: yadyapi vāstavatvena rūpakāprasaktau mālārūpakaprasaktirapi tata eva nirastā tathāpi grahītṛbhedapradarśanaṃ mālāpariṇāmaprasaktivāraṇasūcanārtham /
GK16visa10cu:3407: kintu priyatvādyadhyavasīyate iti kvacit prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3408: sa cādhyavasīyata ityatra nirasyate ityevaṃ lakṣaṇayā samarthanīyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3413: bhagavatastatkāle tāttvikatvād grītṛbhedācceti hetordvayamapi mālārūpakabhrāntimatordvayorapi vivekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3417: grotṛbhedasya ca dvayorapi sambhave 'pi apavādatvena ullekhākhyabhinnālaṅkārasya na prayojakatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3422: uktodāharaṇe ca śiśutvādīnāṃ niyamanābhiprāyātpriyatvādīnāṃ bhinnatvādhyavasāya ityatiśayoktirasti,
GK16visa10cu:3427: alaṅkārāntarasaṅkarāt tadbhaṅgimūla eva niyamenāyamalaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ taddarśayati---keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:3433: tathāca yūni deve śiśubhinne 'pi niyamataḥ śiśvabhedāropād bhede 'pyabhedāropārūpātiśayoktirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:3434: atra ca niyamapradarśanaṃ teṣāṃ tathātvena bhāvanātiśayapradarśanārthameva,
GK16visa10cu:3438: tathā ca bhinnārthādhyavasāya ityatra bhinnatvavatyadhyavasāya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3440: tathā ca asvāmini deve svāmitvāropa eva svāmyabhedāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3444: nanvevamatiśayoktisattve sa evātrāṅkāro 'stu nollekha ityata āha---tatsadbhaṇepīti /
GK16visa10cu:3454: “api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartate iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:3456: iha tu vātikānāṃ śrīkaṇṭhajanapadavarṇane bhrāntikṛta evāmbaravivarādyāropa iti /
GK16visa10cu:3460: śrīkaṇṭhanāmā rājaviśeṣaḥ tasya nagaraṃ śaraṇāgataiḥ śatruto bhītaiḥ vajrapañjaramityabodhītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3463: nacāsambandhe sambandhāroparūpātiśayoktireveyamiti vācyam, svasādṛśyamūlakatva eva tadavasarāt /
GK16visa10cu:3470: gaurvāhīka ityādivad gauṇīlakṣaṇamūleti nātrārthaḥ, rūpake lakṣaṇābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3472: āropādhikaraṇasya praṅnirdeśe rūpakaṃ yathā---ayaṃ candra ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:3473: “āropasya prāṅnirdeśe tu gauṇī lakṣaṇā, yathā gaurvāhīka ityatra /
GK16visa10cu:3477: tatra mūlakatvapradarśanaṃ ca tatpūrvake pariṇāmālaṅkāre tathātvābhāvapradarśanāya /
GK16visa10cu:3482: lakṣyamāṇo jñāyamāno ya āropasya guṇo dharma āropādhikaraṇasya tadyogenetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3484: gaurvāhīka ityādau gauṇīlakṣaṇāsthale tu lakṣaṇayeti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3486: saṃpratipattiryatra śabde prayoktṛpratipatroḥ sa śabdo gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3493: ayamarthaḥ--bhagavataḥ śiśutvādibhedeṣu satsvapi gopavadhūbhiḥ priya ityevāyaṃ gṛhyate na śiśuriti /
GK16visa10cu:3494: yathā priyatvādau satyapi vṛddhaiḥ śiśurityeva gṛhyate /
GK16visa10cu:3496: yadi tvayaṃ pratyetṛbhedena bhede 'tiśayoktisadbhāva eva syāttadātiśayoktiprakāraviśeṣa eva syāt naca tathā,
GK16visa10cu:3508: mugdhā dugdhadhiyetyādau mithyājñānasya kavipratibhāhṛtatvena kavinā ballavādiniṣṭhatvena satyatvenopanibaddhatvād rūpakādītyādiśabdenāpahnutyādisaṃgrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3511: tathāpi kathaṃ tatrāropasya bhedapratītipuraḥ saratvamityatrācāryyasammatiṃ śārīramīmāṃsābhāṣyaṃ śrīmadācāryyaśaṅkarabhagavatpādakṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:3512: paraśabdo 'gnirmāṇavaka ityādau māṇavakādiśabdaḥ paratra māṇavakādau tanmate lakṣyamāṇo guṇastekṣṇayapiṅgalādiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3517: bhrāntikṛta eva prācyānāṃ mate bhrāntikṛtatvābhāve punā rūpakamasti iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3518: atra bhrāntimato 'laṅkāratve 'pi nālaṅkārāntaravicchittimūlatvaṃ hīyata iti prakṛte na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3520: atraiva ca “capovanamiti munibhiḥ kāmāyatanamiti veśyābhiḥ” ityādau pariṇāmālaṅkārayogaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3523: śrīkaṇṭhajanapade tapovanatvādyāropasya munyādeḥ prakṛte tapaḥ prabhṛtāvupayogāt /
GK16visa10cu:3525: munyādīnāṃ tu tapovanādibhinnarūpasya tadrūpatāpratīteriha bhrāntimāniti ye /
GK16visa10cu:3526: apyāhuḥ teṣāmayamāśayaḥ--- śrīkaṇṭhajanapade ekadeśasya tapovanāditvepyavayavāvayavinorabhedātsamudāyasya tathātvapratītiriha na tāttvikīti na pariṇām iti /
GK16visa10cu:3527_1: vicchittiviśeṣasya sambhavāt tatprayojitasya ullekhālaṅkārasyāpalāpo na śakyakriya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3537: naca tapovanatvasya kathaṃ tatra vāstavatvamiti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3543: “gururvacasi, pṛthururasi, arjuno yaśasi-” ityādiṣu cāsya rūpakādvivikto viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:3559: yadi tu tvaṃ bhavānityanayorekatarasya nirdeśastadārūpakameva, rūpakātiśayoktyoretanmātra bhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:3561_0: naca durgālaṅghitavigraha ityādivadupamādhvanirayamiti vācyam tatra viśeṣyasya śliṣṭomāvallabhapadasyevātra
GK16visa10cu:3563: (lo, ū) evaṃ grītṛbhede udāhṛtya viṣayabhede udāharati---gambhīryyeṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:3567: arjuno dhavalaḥ, pakṣe kārttavīryyaḥ, pārtho vā /
GK16visa10cu:3568: nacātraśabdaśaktimūlo dhvaniḥ, naca rūpakam upadeṣṭṛtvādīnāṃ bṛhasyatitvāditvenādhyavasānāt /
GK16visa10cu:3583: naca niṣidhyeti katvānirdeśādapahnavapūrvakatvameva labhyate kathaṃ dvaividhyamiti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:3589: nāyaṃ śaśī kuṇḍalitaḥ phaṇīndro nāsau kalaṅkaḥ śayito murāriḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3607: nāyaṃ lāñchanaḥ kintu yathoktadhūma iti niṣedhapratītiḥ paścāt kaitavapadena /
GK16visa10cu:3610: atra kaitavapadena kapaṭārthena na prakaṭalāñchanamiti pratīterapahnava ārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3632: utkaṇṭhitāsi tarale ! nahi nahi sakhi ! picchilaḥ panthāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:3633: atra “apatitayā” ityatra patiṃ vinetyuktvā paścātpatanābhāvena ityanyathā kṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:3641: atra vāridhārāṇāṃ kālasya kāmoddīpakatvena patiśūnyatayā sthityaśakyatvaṃ gopanīyamarthamuktvā tad boddhyāḥ saṃkhyāḥ praśrānantaraṃ tadanyathayatinahi nahīti /
GK16visa10cu:3642: varṣākāle pathaḥ picchilatvena patitabhinnatayā ityuktavākyaśleṣaṇa anyathā kṛtaṃ tadāhātreti /
GK16visa10cu:3645: “iha puro 'nilakampitavigrahā milati kā na vanaspatinā latā /
GK16visa10cu:3646: smarasi kiṃ sakhi ! kāntaratotsavaṃ nahi ghanāgamarītirudāhṛtā” //
GK16visa10cu:3650: iha deśe puraḥ sammukhe kā latā /
GK16visa10cu:3651_1: saṃkhyā tatpratītyā smarasītyādipraśre kṛte vaktrī vācyārtheneva tadanyathayati---nahi ghanāgameti /
GK16visa10cu:3653: vakroktau parokteranyathākāraḥ, iha tu svauktereveti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3661: viśrāmyāmi kṣaṇaṃ tasmād vayasye ! tava sannidhau //
GK16visa10cu:3662: “ityatra jalāharaṇasya pathi upanāyakasambhagajanyaḥ śramo vaktryā prathamamanukto 'pi sakhipratītibhiyā nigūhitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3665: (lo, e) apatitayā na vidyate patiryasyāḥ sā apatiḥ tasyā bhāvastattā patanarahitayetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3677: yathā mama--“vadanamidaṃ na sarojaṃ nayane nendīvare ete /
GK16visa10cu:3678: iva savidhe mugdhadṛśo bhramara ! mudā kiṃ paribhramasi” //
GK16visa10cu:3680: “hṛdi visalatāhāro nāyaṃ bhujaṅgamanāyakaḥ kuvalayadalaśreṇī kaṇṭhe na sā garaladyutiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3681: malayajarajo nedaṃ bhasma priyārahite mayi prahara na harabhrāntyānaṅga ! krudhā kimu dhāvasi” //
GK16visa10cu:3685: apahnutau prakṛtaniṣedhena anyasthāpanam, iha tu tadvaiparītyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3687: he madhukara iha mugdhadṛśaḥ savidhe mudhā na paribhrāmya /
GK16visa10cu:3694: ayamapi paṭudhārasāro na vāṇaparamparā, kanakanikaṣasnigdhā vidyutpriyā na mamorvaśī /
GK16visa10cu:3701: na hyayaṃ niścayāntaḥ saṃdehaḥ, tatra saṃśayaniścayayorekāśrayatvenāvasthānāt /
GK16visa10cu:3703: kiñca na bhramarāderapi saṃśayaḥ ekakoṭyadhike jñāne, tathā samīpāgamanāsaṃbhāvat /
GK16visa10cu:3704: tarhi bhrāntimānastu, astu nāma bhramārāder bhrāntiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3705: na ceha tasyāścamatkāravidhāyitvam, api tu tathāvidhanāyakādyuktereveti sahṛdayasaṃvedyam /
GK16visa10cu:3706: kiñcāvivakṣite 'piṃ bhramarādeḥ patanādau bhrāntau vā nāyikācāṭvādirūpeṇaiva saṃbhavati tathāvidhoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3713: nanu niścayāntasandehe tadaikyaṃ na vivakṣitamityata āha---ekakoṭyanadhike jñāne ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3714: taj jñānaṃ ca ekakoṭau utkaṭatvena tadvṛtitakoṭereva niścaye ca bhavati,
GK16visa10cu:3718: nāyikāsukhotkarṣasya dvitīyaśloke vakturvipralambhotkarṣasya ca pratipādanādeva camatkārāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3720: mugdhā dugdhadhiyā” ityādau api candrotkarṣapratipādanādeva camatkāra iti tulyamityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:3722: atra tu bhramarasya natu bhramādhīnapātakriyeti samādhānasambhave 'pi tādṛśakriyābhāve 'pi bhrāntimadalaṅkārādityupapattṝn pratyāha /
GK16visa10cu:3726: tathāca bhrāntimadalaṅkārasaṅkīrṇa eva niścayālaṅkāra iti svīkṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:3730: śuktikāyāṃ rajatadhiyā patati puruṣe śuktikeyaṃ na rajatamiti kasyāciduktirnāyamalaṅkāro vaicitryābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:3733: (vi, ṇa) aprasaktamapi rūpakadhvanitvaṃ spaṣṭatvāya niṣidhyati--naca rūpaketi /
GK16visa10cu:3738: na kevalamayamalaṅkāraḥ kintu--- “daśaraśmiśatopamadyutiṃ yaśasā dikṣu daśasvapi śrutam /
GK16visa10cu:3741: ekaṃ viṣṇuṃ dve tadīye ca netre trīṃstān devān doścatuṣkaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pañceśāsyānyagnibhūṣarāmukhāni saptārciṣkaṃ naumi sāṣṭāṅgapātam //
GK16visa10cu:3743: anye 'pi vaicitryāvahā alaṅkāra anuktā api svayamūhyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3744: prayāśaḥ sarveṣāmeva alaṅkāraṇāmāhāryyāropabuddhiviṣayatve evālaṅkāratvaṃ natu vāstavatve ityata āha---śuktikāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:3746: (lo, au) ekāśrayatvenāvasthānāt saṃśayitureva niścetṛtvādyathā---kiṃ tāvat sarasītyādau /
GK16visa10cu:3749: ādiśabdena hṛdi bisalatāhāra ityādau prahārādeḥ saṃgrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3752: tasyāḥ yathākathañcid aṅgīkṛtāyā bhrāntestathāvidhāyāḥ “tava vadanaṃ sarojasadṛśameva';
GK16visa10cu:3755: bhramarādeḥ patanādisadbhāve tadabhāve 'pi vā bhrāntijñānasya teṣāṃ hṛdayagrāhyatve bhrāntimadalaṅkāro vaktuṃ yuktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3774: arthād asambhavī yor'thaḥ tadātmanā tatsvarūpeṇa sambhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:3777: vācyā pratīyamānā sā prathamaṃ dvividhā matā // VisSd_10.40 //
GK16visa10cu:3779: jātiguṇaḥ kriyā dravyaṃ yadutprekṣyaṃ dvayorapi // VisSd_10.41 //
GK16visa10cu:3792: tena jātyādicatuṣkotprekṣā vācyā adhyāhriyamāṇā ca ityaṣṭadhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3794: bhāvasya jātyādibhāvacatuṣkasya pratyekamabhāvābhimānato 'bhāvotprekṣaṇādapi tadaṣṭadhā tasyā utprekṣāyāḥ aṣṭadhā aṣṭaprakārabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3796: evaṃ ca jātyādibhāvotprekṣāṣṭakaṃ tadabhāvotprekṣāṣṭakaṃ ceti ṣoḍaśaprakārāḥ ṣoḍaśatvānuktāvapi paryyavasitāḥ,
GK16visa10cu:3798: nimittasya utprekṣāyā hetorguṇakriyāsvarūpatvāt tāḥ ṣoḍaśavidhāḥ utprekṣāḥ punardvātriṃśadvidhatāṃ yāntītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3799: te vācyapratīyamānatvabhedādaṣṭau jātyādibhāvotprekṣā aṣṭau ca tadabhāvotprekṣāśca iti ṣoḍaśaiva guṇakriyāhetuvattvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3828: kuraṅgakadṛśaḥ ūruḥ smarasya sapatākaḥ kanakamayo nijayastambha iva bhātītyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:3855: prasavapadasya kṛdantatvena nāmatvaprāptyā tadartho na kriyetyato guṇa eva /

GK16visa10cu:3913: (vi, ba) eṣu hetūnāṃ kriyātvaguṇatve svayameva avadhātvye /

GK16visa10cu:3958: nāyakasyānekanāyikānurāgāt kṛśībhavantyāstatpanyā avasthāṃ tasmin avedayantyāstatsakhyā uktiriyam /

GK16visa10cu:3966: tanvaṅgayā ityatra tu na tathetyāha---iha tu iti /

GK16visa10cu:3981: yatra tu kāvyadhvanitvaheturvyaṅgyatā na tatrālaṅkāratā yukteti /
GK16visa10cu:3982: evaṃ yatkaiścit mahilāsahastretyādi pratīyamānotprekṣāyāmudāhṛtaṃ tadayuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:3984: atra vācyotprekṣāyāḥ ṣoḍaśasu bhedeṣu madhye viśeṣamāha--
GK16visa10cu:3988: jātyādicatuṣkasya taccatukābhāvasya ca utprakṣā vācyā aṣṭavidhāḥ tadaṣṭakasyaiva guṇakriyāhetukatvād dvaividhyena ṣoḍaśatvam /
GK16visa10cu:3992: vinā dravyaṃ tridhā sarvāḥ svarūpaphalahetugāḥ // VisSd_10.43 //
GK16visa10cu:3997_0: jātyādicatuṣkasya bhāvābhāvarūpatvena dvaiguṇyaṃ pratyekaṃ ca guṇakriyāhetukatvena
GK16visa10cu:3997_1: dvaiguṇyāccaturvidhatvamiti vācyotprekṣāyā yattat ṣoḍaśavidhatvamuktaṃ tatra dravyotprekṣācatuṣkaṃ
GK16visa10cu:4000: utprekṣitasya vastunaḥ kasyāpi phalatvena hetutvoktau tatsvarūpaviṣayā utprekṣāsvarūpotprekṣā /

GK16visa10cu:4007_1: ca jātyādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ye dvādaśa bhedāsteṣāṃ pratyekaṃ svarūpaphalahetugatatvena
GK16visa10cu:4008: dravyasya svarūpotprekṣaṇameva sambhavatīti catvāra iti militvā catvāliṃśadbhedāḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4037_0: itthaṃ svarūpotprekṣāyā dravye 'pi sambhavādādipadagrāhyābhyāṃ saha jātyādicaturṣveva
GK16visa10cu:4037_1: darśayitvā phalotprekṣāṃ hetūtprekṣāñca dravyaṃ vihāya jātyāditriṣu darśayituṃ kriyāgāminīṃ
GK16visa10cu:4038: rāmāstau rāmakṣiptaḥ āśugo 'pi rāvaṇasya hṛdayaṃ bhittvā uragebhyaḥ priyamākhyātumiva bhuvaṃ viveśa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4047: “saiṣā sthalī yatra vicinvatā tvāṃ bhraṣṭaṃ mayā nūpuramekamurvyām /

GK16visa10cu:4067: jātyuprekṣāyāḥ phalagāmitvaṃ yathā-- “kāmukasya ratau vāmā kandarpaśarapīḍitā /

GK16visa10cu:4079: yadvā nūpumaunitvahetuścaladdravyasaṃyogābhāva evaṃduḥ khatādātmyena adhyavasitaḥ tatra ca pakṣe 'tiśayoktivad viṣayasya gamyamānatā etaccāgre sphuṭībhaviṣyati /

GK16visa10cu:4090: teṣu catvāriṃśatsaṃkhyākeṣu bhedeṣu madhye ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāste utprekṣānimittasyopādānānupādānābhyāṃ dvātriṃśadbhedā iti militvā ṣaṭpañcāśadbhedā vācyotprekṣāyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4091: tatra nimittasyopādānaṃ yathā pūrvodāhṛte “snātīva” ityutprekṣāyaṃ nimittaṃ pātakitvamupāttam /

GK16visa10cu:4098: ye svarūpagāyāḥ ṣoḍaśa bhedāḥ jātigāminyo jātyā catastro,
GK16visa10cu:4104: naca nimittānu pādāne kathaṃ taddvaividhyaghaṭitaṃ ṣoḍaśatvam aṣṭatvasyaivaucityāditi vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:4131: tathā ca phalagāmitvahetugāmitvadvaividhyād dvātriṃśatprakārā iti vakṣyate /

GK16visa10cu:4144: tadanupādāne tu lajjāhetvadarśanāllajjotprekṣā pramātrā boddhā niścetumaśakyaivetyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4174: uktyanuktyoḥ prastutasya pratyekaṃ tā api dvidhā /
GK16visa10cu:4191: anuktau yathā mama prabhāvatyāma--“pradyumnaḥ--iva hi samprati digantaramācchādayatā timirapaṭalena--
GK16visa10cu:4206: atra tamaso lepanasya vyāpanarūpo viṣayo nopāttaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4209: kecittu--“alapanakartṛbhaūtamapi tamo lepanakartṛtvenotprekṣitaṃ vyāpanaṃ ca nimittam,
GK16visa10cu:4224: saṃyogaviśeṣasyeva hi vyāptināmnāretiśayasthāganasāmyena rūpasambhāvanā utprekṣābhedaḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:4226: sa ca yadi svarūpotprekṣāyāmeva syāttadā ko doṣa ityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16visa10cu:4230: “varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ” ityatra ca dhārārūpeṇādhaḥ saṃyoga ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4235: naca viṣayasya gamyamānatvaṃ yuktam, tasyotprekṣādhāratvena prastutasyābhidhātumucitatvāt /

GK16visa10cu:4253: hutapāvakadhūmakaluṣākṣyāḥ sudṛśo 'ṅge mānamavakāśamaprāpya lāvaṇyavāripūra iva aśrucchalena vigalatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4266: atra guṇavattve śleṣaḥ kambugrīvādhivāsādiveti hetūtprekṣāyā hetuḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4275: atra tantorvāstavatvānna tatprāptihetūtprekṣā sambhavatītyato guṇapadaśleṣāj jyotirviśeṣaprāptihetūtprekṣā ityataḥ śleṣanirvāhyā iyamutprekṣā /
GK16visa10cu:4283: (lo, u) jānīmahe iti manye ityādayo 'pyutprekṣāvācakā jñeyā ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4287: vikrīya kaivalyamamuṣya mūlyaṃ varāṭasaṃkhyāṃ kimiyaṃ karoti” //
GK16visa10cu:4293: paryavasāne tu jaladhitīre śaivālasthiteḥ sambhāvanānupapattau sambhāvanotthāpanamityutprekṣā /

GK16visa10cu:4307: ityanenaivopamāparyavasānasambhave utkūlatvakathanamanupayuktamata utkūlitaśaivalābhā iveti paryavasāne utprekṣetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4320: evaṃ virahavarṇane--“keyūrāyitamaṅgadaiḥ--” ityatra “vikāsinīlotpalatisma karṇe mṛgāyatākṣyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣaḥ” ityādau ca jñeyam /
GK16visa10cu:4334: bhrāntimadalaṅkāre “mugghā dugdhadhiyā--” ityādau bhrāntānāṃ ballavādīnāṃ viṣayasya candrikāderjñānameva nāsti,

GK16visa10cu:4345: “na kasya kurute cittabhramaṃcandrikā” ityuktitaścandrikātvena jñānamastītyata āha---tadupanibandhasyeti /

GK16visa10cu:4358: atiśayoktau viṣayiṇaḥ pratītasya parvavāsane 'satyatā pratīyate, iha tu pratītikāla eveti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4361: (vi, ṭa) tarhi sandehālaṅkārābheda ityata āha---sandeha iti /

GK16visa10cu:4370: kintūtprekṣā utkaṭakoṭikasandeha rūpā, atiśayoktistu niścayarūpeti bhedaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4390: ityatra yattarvādau timirākrāntatā rañjanādirūpeṇa saṃdihyata iti saṃdehālaṅkāra iti kecidāhuḥ,

GK16visa10cu:4395: tasyāścātra sphuṭatayā sadbhāvāt nuśabdena cevaśabdavattasyādyotanādutprekṣaiveyaṃ bhavituṃ yuktā,
GK16visa10cu:4404: nanu prativiśeṣyaṃ sandehā eva bahavaḥ syurityatra utprekṣāprāpakahetuviśeṣaścāstītyāha---vyāpanāderiti /
GK16visa10cu:4408: anye tu sandehālaṅkāraviśeṣa ityāhuḥ, taddarśayati---anye tviti /
GK16visa10cu:4429: “yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ vitanute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā /
GK16visa10cu:4438: jaladalavasya jaladakhaṇḍasya jaladakhaṇḍasya sādṛśyarūpāṃ līlāṃ vitanute tad vastu,

GK16visa10cu:4487: viṣayanigaraṇaṃ cotprekṣāyāṃ viṣayasyādhaḥ karaṇamātreṇa, ihāpi mukhaṃ dvitīyaścandra ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:4490: (vi, tha) siddhatva ityasya vyāvṛttiṃ darśayati---tasya ceti /

GK16visa10cu:4497: ” ityatra garbhabahirbhāvarūpaprasavakoṭyā utkaṭāyā anutkaṭāyā guṇānubandhakoṭyā uktāyā eva niṣedhavyañjanā /

GK16visa10cu:4652: viṣaye viṣayiṇo 'bhedenādhyavasāyo hi bhavatkṛtalakṣaṇārthaḥ, viṣayaviṣayibhāvaśca bhedaghaṭitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4654: ityatra tatraiva tadbhedārope bhedaghaṭitaviṣayaviṣayibhāvābhāvādavyāptiriti keṣāñciduktiṃ darśayati---keśapāśādigata iti /

GK16visa10cu:4760: atra prastutāyāḥ suniścalāyāḥ prakṛteraprastutāyāśca yoṣita ekānugamanakriyāsambandhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4761: “dūraṃ samāgatavati tvayi jīvanāthe bhinnā manobhavaśareṇa tapasvinī sā /

GK16visa10cu:4768: tapasvinī duḥ khānvitā sā tava priyā vāsagṛhagamanaṃ, tvatprāptisambhāvanayā /
GK16visa10cu:4772: atra ca guṇakriyayorādimadhyāvasānasadbhāvena traividhyaṃ na lakṣitam,
GK16visa10cu:4779: “rahei mihireṇa ṇahaṃ raseṇa kavviṃ sareṇa jovvaṇaaṃ /
GK16visa10cu:4785: eko 'pi dharmaḥ sāmānyo yatra nirdiśyate pṛthak /
GK16visa10cu:4791: tayoreko 'pi sāmānyo dharmaḥ pṛthakśabdabhedena yatrālaṅkāre nirdiśyate sā prativastūpametyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4793: bodhyatā ca kvacicchabdadvayena śaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ kvaciccopameyagatasya śabdaśaktyā dhramāntare tadvaidharmyeṇa vyañjanayā /
GK16visa10cu:4797: evaṃ ca pratinirdiṣṭena vākyārthena vākyārthasya upamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanena vākyārthasyopamāsādṛśyaṃ yasyāmityanvarthā pratīvastūpamā /

GK16visa10cu:4804: itaḥ stutiḥ kā khalu candrikāyā yadabdhimapyuttaralīkaroti” //
GK16visa10cu:4805: atra samākarṣaṇamuttaralīkaraṇaṃ ca kriyaikaiva paunaruktyanirāsāya bhinnavācakatayā nirdiṣṭā /
GK16visa10cu:4811: atra damayantī upameyā candrikā upamānaṃ tayordhorākarṣaṇameko dharmaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4841: vaidharmyeṇa yatheti---upameye nirdiṣṭadharmaviparītād dharmyantare nirdiṣṭāddharmād vyañjanayā labhyenopamānaniṣṭhasādharmyeṇa ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:4844_1: nirdiṣṭo ratyanaipuṇyarūpaḥ tato vyañjanayā upamāneṣu avantīstrīṣu svakarmacāturyyaṃ
GK16visa10cu:4855: pratibimbanamubhayatra nirdiṣṭābhyāṃ parasparasamānābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmekasya tasya vyañjanamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4856: sadharmaḥ prasiddha evaṃ vivakṣita ityaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:4857: prativastūpamāyāṃ tūpameyanirdiṣṭo dharmo vācya eva upamānanirdiṣṭaśabdasya lakṣaṇayā kvacicchaktyā vā sa bodhya iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4869: atra karṇe madhudhārāvamananetrahāraṇe dharmai bhinnau prītijanakatayā parasparasamānau /
GK16visa10cu:4882: upameyopamānagatābhyāṃ tābhyāṃ svasvapriyadarśane svārthaprāptitvameko dharmaḥ vyajyate /
GK16visa10cu:4883: naca vaidharmyavyaṅgyaprativastūpamāto 'syā ko bheda iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:4884: tatra vaidharmyaṃ dharmāntaraniṣṭham, atra tūpamānaniṣṭhaṃ tathā ca tatra vaidharmyeṇaiva vyañjanā /
GK16visa10cu:4885: atra tu ubhayaniṣṭhābhyāṃ sādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ vyañjaneti bhedāt /
GK16visa10cu:4892: yatra tu samānadharmapratipādakaśabdābhyāmeko dharmo vyañjanāṃ vinaiva pratipādyate tatra pratibimbābhāvāt prativastūpamaiveti /
GK16visa10cu:4897: atra “manaḥ kuto naḥ” ityasya “kāṅkṣati vallimanyām” ityasya caikarūpatayaiva varyavasānātprativastūpamaiva /

GK16visa10cu:4903: atra hi paranāyikā upameyā anyā bahvyaśca upamānāni tāsāṃ manoviṣayatvākāṅkṣāviṣayatvayorhetupraśraikadharmaviṣayatayā ekatvāroparūpaparyyavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:4909: ityasya paryyavasāne nānyāṃ kāntāṃ kāṅkṣāmi ityetadarthatvād iha dṛṣṭānte tu punaḥ bimbapratibimbabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4938: “ko 'tra bhūmivalaye janān mudhā tāpayan sucirameti sampadam /

GK16visa10cu:4945: vedayan jñāpayan dinena caramācalaṃ tato nabhomadhyādāsasādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:4955: atra karttṛtvānvayo janakatvānvayaḥ svastigamanena tādṛśavadasyānumitirūpasya janakatvāt /

GK16visa10cu:4971: asyāḥ kuṭilaḥ kaṭākṣavikṣepaḥ kuvalayamālāyā lalitaṃ vinyāsaṃ kalayati tadhāti /
GK16visa10cu:4973: kaṭākṣavikṣepādīnāṃ kartṝṇāṃ lalitādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ dharmatayā dharmiṇorapyatra prativimbānubimbaṃ darśayati;
GK16visa10cu:4990: tava prayāṇe yātrāyāṃ satyāṃ vairimṛgīdṛśāṃ padbhyāṃ rājahaṃsagatirmuktā drutapalāyamānatvāt . ānanena ca śaśidyutirmuktā mlānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:4997: (lo, ā) kalpyata ityataḥ pūrvaṃ prathamamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5002: “idaṃ kilāvyājamanoharaṃ vapustapaḥ klapaṃ sādhayituṃ ya icchati /

GK16visa10cu:5008: manoharamidaṃ vapuryo munistapaḥ kṣamaṃ sādhayitum icchati dhruvaṃ niścitaṃ sa munirnolotpalapatradhārayā komalayā kaṭhināṃ śamīlatāṃ chettuṃ vyavasyatītyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:5033: “munestatra manobhede durlabhe surakāṅkṣite kaṭākṣā evameṇākṣyāḥ prayayuḥ smarabāṇatām /
GK16visa10cu:5039: atra bhavabhogalobhena janmano vyarthatānayanaṃ kācamūlyena cintāmaṇivikraya iveti paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5083: evaṃ “so 'pi tvadānanarucaṃ vijahati candraḥ” ityatra “prayāṇe tava rājendra” ityudāharaṇavannidarśanaiva,
GK16visa10cu:5086: evaṃ “sambhavan vastusambandha upamāparikalpakaḥ nidarśane“ti lakṣaṇe copamāśabdaḥ sādṛśyamātrārtho na tūpamālaṅkārārthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5096: he puruṣa ! tvaṃ bhogavitāne bhogasamūhe ceto vidadhad vṛṣadaṃśakasya mārjārasya mukhe śukaṃ kṣipasi /
