GK16visa10cu:5098: ataḥ śukasya tatra kṣepa iva bhoge cetovidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5115: ” iti śloke 'smākaṃ stanamaṇḍale sutarāṃ luṭhanamucitamityeva hi paryavasānam /
GK16visa10cu:5132: upameyasyopamānādādhikyaṃ nyūnatāthavā varṇyate sa vyatirekālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5135: kvacittu eka utke 'nukte hetau punaḥ tridheti kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:5153: pratyekaṃ samudāyena vānuktau trividha iti catuvidhe 'pyasminnupamānopameyatvasya nivedanaṃ śabdena arthena ākṣepeṇa ceti dvādaśaprakāro 'pi śleṣe,
GK16visa10cu:5155: upamānānnyūnatāyāmapyanayaiva bhaṅgyā caturviṃśatiprakārateti militvā aṣṭacatvāriṃśatprakāro vyatirekaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5172: tad dvādaśakasya śleṣāśleṣayoḥ sambhavaṃ kārikoktādapiśabdād darśayati---śleṣe 'pīti /
GK16visa10cu:5180: kalaṅkī vidhuryathā tasyā mukhaṃ tathā na, kintu tatodhikam /
GK16visa10cu:5194: “tasyā mukhaṃ na vidhuryathe'; tyevaṃ karaṇam ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5218: tatra hetudvayasya pratyekaṃ samudāyānupādāne śābdaupamye yathā---“candramukhyāḥ kuraṅgākṣyā nābjavad bhaṅgurā guṇā';
GK16visa10cu:5224: “asau candramukhī bālā nābjatulayaguṇā kila'; iti ubhayānupādāne /
GK16visa10cu:5228: “asau candramukhī bālā nābjatulyaguṇā kila'; iti ubhayānupādāne /
GK16visa10cu:5229: ākṣiptaupamye yathā---“atigāḍhāguṇāstasyāḥ padmasya bhaṅgurā guṇā'; ityubhayopādāne,
GK16visa10cu:5231: “paṅkajaṃ guṇavajjigye guṇavatyā tayā dhruvam'; iti ubhayānanupādāne /
GK16visa10cu:5236: virama prasīda sundari ! yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu” //
GK16visa10cu:5238: tenātra “upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ” iti keṣāṃcillakṣaṇe “viparyaye vetipadamanarthakam” iti yatkecidāhuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5256: tathā cāsthairyasyāpakarṣakahetutvena upameyasya nyūnatvaṃ candrasyaivādhikyamiti mayā vāyakhyāyate,
GK16visa10cu:5263: nanūddeśyārthasyādhikyameva vivakṣitaṃ prakṛte ca māninyāṃ yauvanāsthairyyaṃ pradarśayitumuddeśyaṃ tadādhikyaṃ copameyādhikyamevetyata āha---astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:5274: “calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ spṛśasi bahuśo vepathumatī rahasyākhyāyīva svanasi mṛdu karṇāntikacaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5275: karaṃ vyādhunvatyāḥ pibasi ratisarvasvamadharaṃ vayaṃ tattvānveṣānmadhukara hatāstvaṃ khalu kṛtī” //
GK16visa10cu:5278: iti māghe copamānabhūtatayā madhukararajasoḥ kṛtipadavarapadābhyāmevādhikyasyoktatvāt kāvyaprakāśasya matamatrānupādeyameva /
GK16visa10cu:5280: (lo, ai) hanūmadādyairityādi damayantī prati devadūtasya nalasya vacanam /
GK16visa10cu:5281: dviṣāṃ hasairdūtatvaṃ parityajya svayaṃ nāyakatvapratigrahāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5283: sahārthasya balādekaṃ yatra syādvācakaṃ dvayoḥ // VisSd_10.54 //
GK16visa10cu:5302: naca bhedādhyavasāyasyaiva atiśayoktitvena sā kathaṃ tanmūleti vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5311: atra tṛtīyāntapadārthe 'dharadale prathamāntapadārthe priye ca rāgavānitipadam abhedena svārthabodhakam;
GK16visa10cu:5322: kiñcātrodāharaṇe abhedādhyavasāyo 'pi kāryyakāraṇaikakālīnatāsaṃpṛktaḥ adharadalasya rāgabhajanānantarameva priyasya ragadarśanāt;
GK16visa10cu:5325: yaduktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ--“eko 'pi dharma āropamāśritya sahārthabalādanyadharmaṇyapi sambaddhaścettadā sahoktiriti, tadasaṅgatam /
GK16visa10cu:5335: atrollāsādīnāṃ saṃbandhibhedādeva bhedaḥ, na tu śliṣṭatayā /
GK16visa10cu:5349: agamat saha tailabindunā nanu dīpārciriva kṣitestalam” //
GK16visa10cu:5353: gurusammohaviluptacetanā sā indumatī narādhipena ajena samameva kṣitestalaṃ pṛṣṭham agamat /
GK16visa10cu:5355: atra narādhipo 'pi kṣitestalamagamaditi sahārthasya samaṃ padabalād bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5356: indumatīpātaḥ kāraṇaṃ narādhipapātaḥ kāryyaṃ, tayoḥ samakālatvakathanarūpaḥ paurvāparyaviparyayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5364: evaṃ ca yadyapi śobhanatva eva paryavasānaṃ tathāpyaśobhanatvābhāvamukhena śobhanavacanasyāyamabhiprāyo yatkasyacidvarṇanīyasyāśobhanatvaṃ tatparasannidhereva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5374: (lo, a) śobhana eva paryavasānam “abhāvasya tu yo 'bhāvo bhāva evāvaśiṣyate'; iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5383: atra jaladakālādeva candro malino grīṣmarttau ca vanarājiramañjuriti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5391: kā dinaśrīrvinārkeṇa kā niśā śaśinā vinā” //
GK16visa10cu:5400: “nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yayā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
GK16visa10cu:5401: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva dṛṣṭā vinidrā nalinī na yena” //
GK16visa10cu:5407: evaṃ sahoktirapi sahaśabdaprayogābhāve 'pi sahārthavivakṣāyāṃ bhavatīti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5420: kāntayā śūnyamālokya kasya ceto na dūyate” //
GK16visa10cu:5428: anyasya aprastutasya vastuno vyavahārasya arthād vyaṅgyasya prastute vastuni samāropa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5429: tad vyañjanaṃ ca samaiḥ prastutāprastutasamānaiḥ kāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇairityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5432: samaistulyairvyavahārasya kṛtasya na tu rūpakavat svātmanaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5446: yathā vā mama---“ullāsya lāsyanilayaṃ vipuloruyugmaṃ protkṣipya bāhulatikāmatikāntagātryaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5447: yaṃ sābhilāṣamanasaḥ pramadā bhajante puṇyātmane śiśirapāvana te namo 'stu //
GK16visa10cu:5453: kāryyaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ kvacid dvayoḥ kvacitttrayāṇāṃ vā samāveśe 'pi bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:5457: anākramya jagatkṛtsnaṃ no sandhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5469: viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ tu śliṣṭatayā, sādhāraṇyena, aupamyagarbhatvena ca tridhā /
GK16visa10cu:5486: jaraṭhalavalīpāṇḍucchāyo bhṛśaṃ kaluṣāntaraḥ śrayati haritaṃ hanta ! prācetasīṃ tuhinadyutiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:5493_0: aindrīṃ diśaṃ dinakarakaraspṛṣṭāṃ puraḥ sammukhe nirīkṣya jaraṭhasya kaṭhinasya lavalīphalasyeva
GK16visa10cu:5493_1: pāṇḍucchāyaḥ san tuhinadyutiḥ kaluṣāntaraḥ kalaṅkamalināntaraḥ prāyetasīṃ pratīcīṃ haritaṃ śrayati /
GK16visa10cu:5494: lavalīphalasya paktatve sati kāṭhinyaṃ pāṇḍuratvaṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:5499: svākrāntāṃ diśaṃ virodhinā'krāntāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥ khena pāṇḍuraḥsan digantaramāśrayatīti vākyārthabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5501_0: tathā hi---svanāyikāṃ smeramukhīm anurāgeṇa galitāṅgāvaraṇāṃ kareṇa spṛśantaṃ paranāyakaṃ
GK16visa10cu:5501_1: dṛṣṭvā duḥ khāt pāṇḍuracchāyo nāyakastāṃ tyaktvā nāyikāntaramāśrayatītyevaṃ vyavahārasya
GK16visa10cu:5510: atraiva hi “timirāvṛtim” ityatra “timirāśukam” iti pāṭhe etadeśasya rūpaṇe 'pi samāsoktireva,
GK16visa10cu:5512: tatra hi timirāṃśukayo rūpyarūpakabhāvo dvayorāvarakatvena sphuṭasādṛśyatayā parasācivyamanapekṣyāpi svamātraviśrānta iti na samāsoktibuddhiṃ vyāhantumīśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5515: parasācivyaṃ, parasya śabdārthasya vā ropaṇasya sācivyaṃ sāhāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:5518: yatra tu rūpyarūpakayoḥ sādṛśyamasphuṭaṃ tatraikadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ vinā tadasaṅgataṃ syādityaśābdamapyekadeśāntararūpaṇamārthamapekṣata eveti tatraikadeśavivartirūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5526: na tu svasya sphuṭasādṛśyāttatraiva vācyarūpakāntarasya ākṣepatvena ekadeśavivarttirūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:5528: prakṛte tu aṃśukatimirayoḥ sphuṭasādṛśyādārtharūpakanirapekṣaḥ svato rūpyarūpakābhāva ityato naikadeśavivarttitetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5535: ragasaṃmuhī vi sahasā parammuhī hoi riuseṇā” //
GK16visa10cu:5546: bhītyaḥ parāṅmukhī, tayaiva lajjayā parāṅmukhatā mukhasya parāśrayatvena /
GK16visa10cu:5547: raṇa eva antaḥ puraṃ tatra strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena maṇḍalāgralatayā rūpyamāṇanāyikāvyañjanāt /
GK16visa10cu:5549: tadbhraṣṭāyāṃ ripusenāyāmapi strīliṅgaśabdārthatvena rūpyamāṇa pratināyikā vyaṅgyā atra raṇe 'ntaḥ--purarūpaṇamekadeśavivartti /
GK16visa10cu:5551: (lo, ai) tarhi kaḥ punarekadeśavivarttirūpakasya viṣaya ityāśaṅkyāha---tatra tviti /
GK16visa10cu:5553: ityādau raṇāntaḥ purādikayo rūpyarūpakayorekadeśāntararūpaṇaṃ maṇḍalāgralatādiṣu rājanāyikātvādyāropaṃ vināsphuṭameva /
GK16visa10cu:5559: kvacicca yatra sphuṭasādṛśyānāmapi bahūnāṃ rūpaṇaṃ śābdamekadeśasya cārthaṃ tatraikadeśavivarti rūpakameva /
GK16visa10cu:5567: tatra lāvaṇyamadhuno mādhuryasya upādeyatvaparyyavasannasya sādṛśyasya locanabhramarayośca cāñcalyarūpasādṛśyasya sphuṭatvādityata āha---yatreti /
GK16visa10cu:5576: nanu sphuṭasādṛśyādīnāṃ vahutve ekadeśavivarttitvamityatra kā yuktirityatra āha---rūpakapratīteriti /
GK16visa10cu:5577: vyāpitayā bahutvena tasyāśca bahutvavaśāt prathamotpannatvo samāsoktivirodhakatvam /
GK16visa10cu:5581: nanvasti raṇāntaḥ purayorapi sukhasaṃcāratayā sphuṭaṃ sādṛśyamiti cet?
GK16visa10cu:5593: nṛpadarśanād ripusenāparāṅmukhatvaṃ pratyarthatātparyyālocanena rājñaḥ śūratvasya tato raṇe 'bhītatvasya ca lābhena tata eva sukhasañcāralābha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5595: nahi mukhacandrayormanoharatvamiva rājño raṇe bhītatvabuddhiṃ vinā pratyakṣādinā sukhasañcāratvaṃ gamyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5596: atra raṇāntaḥ purayoriti sañcārālābhādityatra sañcāratvābhāvāditi kvacit prāmādika eva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5605: tatpakṣe ca nisargasiddhamukhasaurabheṇodbhrānto bhṛṅgo yasyāstādṛśī cāsau saṅgītaśālinī ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5607: vāsaraṃ gṛhaṃ tadadhīśe gṛhapatau udite ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5612: atra nisargetyādiviśeṣaṇasāmyātsarojinyāṃ nāyikāvyavahārapratītau strīmātragāminaḥ smeratvadharmasya samāropaḥ kāraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:5645: anantaraṃ ca dantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiścitetyādisamāsāntarāśrayeṇa samānaviśeṣaṇamahātmyāddhariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāvyavahārapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5649: atra dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīva ityādirītyā sarvatra puruṣavyāghrāditvādupamāsamāsaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5652: tathā hi---“upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti pāṇinyanuśāsanenasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge rūpakasamāsabādhād upamāsamāsasyaiva vyavasthāpanādityekaṃ bādhakam /
GK16visa10cu:5658: puṣpādibhinnaiḥ taiḥ suveṣapratītirna ghaṭate ityataḥ prathamaṃ dantaprabhādiviśeṣyake vyāghrādisamāsa evetyāha---upamāgarbhatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:5659: nanu tathāpi saivānupapattiḥ, svīyadharmaiḥ suveṣatvāsambhavādityata āha---anantaraṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5660: ayamarthaḥ---sakṛduccaritaiḥ śabdairasakṛcchaktilakṣaṇābhyāṃ bodhāsambhavāddarśito 'yaṃ puṣpādiviśeṣyaka upamāsamāsārtho vyaṅgya eva /
GK16visa10cu:5662: suveṣatvopapattikatvaṃ ca samāsadvayatātparyagrāhakaṃ tena ca suveṣatvepapattau upapattimāha---samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāditi /
GK16visa10cu:5668: taddhi nāyikāyāṃ mukhyaṃ natu latāyāmiti nāyikādharmiṇāmeva dantaprabhādīnāmupameyaprayojakaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5671: anyathā dāse kṛtāgasītyādāvapi prācīnaprasiddhe 'pi rūpakasamāsaviṣaye upāttanāyikānuguṇyena pulakāṅkurakaṇṭakāgrairityatra upamāsamāsa eva syāt /
GK16visa10cu:5682: yatra viśeṣe tu na svīkāra ityagre vyaktirbhaviṣyati /
GK16visa10cu:5686: āsyasyaivātra pānamuktaṃ tasya cobhayathāpi pānāsambhava iti na vācyam,
GK16visa10cu:5697: suveṣatvasya nijadharmeṇāsambhavāttatsattve kramaśaḥ samāsadvayenaivopapattirdarśitetyatastatra na rūpakopamāyāḥ sandehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5698: parīteti pāṭhe tu parītatvaṃ vyāptiḥ puṣpairlāvaṇyaiḥ sambhavatītyatra samāsadvayenopamārūpakayorbhavatyeva sandeha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5699: naca sāmānyadharmāprayogavaśādupamā rūpakaṃ bādhata iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5707: tadvattve lāvaṇyamadhubhiḥ pūrṇamityekadeśavivarttirūpakodāharaṇe 'pi samāsoktitvamidaṃ darśitaṃ sāmpradāyikamatānusāreṇaiva /
GK16visa10cu:5710: parītatvasya hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ latāyāṃ ca sādhāraṇyenaiva pravṛtteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5717: eṣu ca yaṣāṃ mate upamāsaṅkarayorekadeśavivartitā nāsti tanmate ādyatṛtīyayoḥ samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5724: tatra prathamaṃ rūpakasamāsabādhasyādarśitatvātteṣāṃ mataṃ darśayati---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5727: tadevaṃ dvitīyo lāvaṇyamadhubhairityādyukto rūpakaviṣaya eva na samāsoktiviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5728: vyaṅgyarūpakaṃ mukhasya padmatvaṃ taddharmalāvaṇyādau madhvādirūpakaṃ vācyamityekadeśavivarttisuveṣatvaviśeṣaṇavati dantaprabhetyādau /
GK16visa10cu:5734: paryālocane tu na samāsoktirnāpyekadeśavivarttirūpakaṃ kintvekadeśavivarttyupamaiva iti svamataṃ granthakṛdāha---paryālocane tviti /
GK16visa10cu:5738: viśeṣaṇasāmye yatsamāsoktirityuktaṃ tatra viśeṣaṇasya sādhāraṇatvaṃ śliṣṭatvaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5741: tatra dantaprabhāpuṣpamivetyupamāsamāsabodhe hariṇekṣaṇā late veti bodhasya samāsadvayakusṛṣṭikalpanaṃ vinaivopapattirityevaṃ paryālocanā /
GK16visa10cu:5746: iha caupamyagarbhasyaivaṃ traividhyasambhave 'pi dvitīyodāharaṇam ekadeśavivarttirūpakaviṣaya eveti na pūrvottaravirodha ityāha---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5751: paryālocane tattvato vivecane ucitā hariṇekṣaṇa lateveti pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5765: pāṇḍunā payodhareṇa aupamyenārdranakhakṣatābham aindraṃ dhanuḥ dadhānā sakalaṅkaminduṃ prasādayantī prasannaṃ nirmalaṃ kurvatī śaradraveratyadhikaṃ tāpaṃ tatānetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5767_0: atra pāṇḍupayodhareṇa gaurastanenārdranakhakṣataṃ dadhānāyāḥ paranāyikāyā gantṛtvena
GK16visa10cu:5767_2: samāsoktyā pratītiḥ tadvyavahārasya ca śaradi pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5786: (vi, la) upamāgarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre tadrarbhatve ca samāsadvayaniyame sā kathaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5787_1: ca aindre dhanuṣi ārdranakhakṣatatulyatvāprāptau nāyikāyāṃ ca viśeṣaṇābhāvena tadviśeṣaṇasya
GK16visa10cu:5789: kintvatra payodharasya prasādayantīti padasya sakalaṅkapadasya tāpapadasya ca śliṣṭaviśeṣaṇikā samāsoktireveyam /
GK16visa10cu:5792: nanu “ārdranakhakṣatābham” ityatra sthitamapyupamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi sañcāraṇīyam /
GK16visa10cu:5800: tathā ca tatkṣatadhāraṇaṃ stanasya sambhavatyeva ityata upamāgarbhasamāsoktirevātrāpīti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityāśaṅkate---nanviti /
GK16visa10cu:5809: yathā--“dadhnā juhoti” ityādau havanasyānyathāsiddherdadhni sañcāryate vidhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5814: (vi, śa) śabdenaikatra bodhitārthasyānyatra sañcāre dṛṣṭāntamāha--yathā dadhneti /
GK16visa10cu:5817: iti vākyarūpād anyataḥ siddheḥ siddhasya ca vidheyatvāsambhavaparyālocanayā tadeva vidheyatvaṃ yattvasiddham /
GK16visa10cu:5820: tathā caivaṃ rītyā dhanurupameyanakhakṣatadhāraṇaṃ payodhare sambhavati,
GK16visa10cu:5829_0: atra hi hotavyamityarthe juhotinā yadyapi homavidhānopadeśaḥ pratīyate tathāpi vākyāntaralabhye
GK16visa10cu:5829_1: tasmin “aprāpte hi śāstramarthavadi” ti nayena piṣṭapeṣaṇavadupadeśavaiyarthyādatrānukta
GK16visa10cu:5836: ārdranakhakṣatābhamityatrārdranakhakṣatasambandhād ābhāśabdasyārthasya aupamyasya ca tatparityāgena sambaddhe indradhanuṣi sañcāraṇe dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyamityanirvāhāt;
GK16visa10cu:5837: yathā kathañcinnarvāhe vā na svārasikīti kaṣṭā yā sañcāraṇasṛṣṭiḥ tasyāḥ kalpanādasyotpādānād jyāyastvādanāyasasiddhatvena /
GK16visa10cu:5839: aindraṃ dhanurityādau mukhyatayā varttamānasya upamāmātre viśeṣeṇa samāsoktyuddīpakasya prasādanakriyādeḥ sadbhāvaḥ; tasyānubhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5846: ekadeśavivartyupamā tu prācīnairanuktāpyudāharaṇe 'dṛṣṭā nāṅgīkarttavyetyata udāharaṇe dṛṣṭatvaṃ darśayitumāha--astu veti /
GK16visa10cu:5849: pade pade vibhānti sma cakravākaiḥ stanairiva //
GK16visa10cu:5853: na cātrāpyutpalairiva netrairityupamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyaṃ sañcāryyatāṃ kathaṃ gatyantarabhāva iti vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:5854: tadā saraḥ śrīṣu netrādibodhāt saraḥ śriya iva nāyikā iti paryavasāne prakrāntasaraḥ śrīvarṇanābhāvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5856: kiṃ copamāyāṃ vyavahārapratīterabhāvātkathaṃ tadupajīvikāyāḥ samāsokteḥ praveśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5861: nanvevaṃ “dantaprabhe” tyatra upamāgarbhasamāsoktirnetrairivotpalairityatraikadeśavivartyupamā iti kathamupamāgarbhasamāsoktivilopa ityata āha---kiñceti /
GK16visa10cu:5864: yatpunaruktaṃ rāghavānandaiḥ saraḥ śrīniṣṭhaṃ liṅgasāmyaṃ samāsoktiprayojakamiti;
GK16visa10cu:5867: kintu prastutamapekṣyaiva samāsoktiḥ kriyate iti svayamanantaramevoktam /
GK16visa10cu:5869: samanakāryaliṅgaviśeṣaṇānāṃ lakṣyeṣu dvayoḥ trayāṇaāṃ vā sadbhāve prādhānyena vyavahāra iti /
GK16visa10cu:5873: kiñcaivaṃ “mukhena kamaleneva vibhāti hariṇekṣaṇā“ityādāvapi hariṇekṣaṇāyāṃ nalinīvyavahārasamāropeṇa samāsoktyutprekṣayoḥ samaveśaḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:5881: aindraṃ dhanurityādau upamānopameyabhāvavaiparītyasañcāraṇokteḥ kaṣṭasṛṣṭikakalpanārūpaṃ dūṣaṇamuktvā aupamyagarbhasamāsoktyaṅgīkāre dūṣaṇāntaraṃ dadata itīyaṃ kārikā /
GK16visa10cu:5883: yad yasmāt kāvyaliṅgādisāmyahetukasamāsoktau yathāvyavahārasamāropaḥ pratīyate tadvadaupamyagarbhatvamamuṣmānna pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:5885: kintu tādṛśe sthale ekadeśopamā ekadeśavivartyupamaiva sphuṭetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5888: (lo, e) yadyasmād vyavahāraḥ samāsoktivattattvaṃ rūpakavad aupamyena pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:5891: netrairivotpalairityādau saraḥ śriyā nāyikātvapratītirna samāsoktyā viśeṣaṇasāmyābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5892: tasmānnāyikātra upamānatvena pratīyate, natu saraḥ śrīdharmatvena nāyikātvapratītiriti /
GK16visa10cu:5894_1: viśeṣaṇatve sambhavatyapi aindraṃ dhanurityādau ca kaṣṭakalpitoktayuktisadbhāve 'pi
GK16visa10cu:5895: tathāca bhāṣaṇam-- “arke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet” iti /
GK16visa10cu:5902: upamāyā rūpakasya ekadeśavivartitve tulyanyāyādubhayatraiva samāsoktyapraveśe tadubhayasandehasaṅkarasthale 'pi samāsoktirnāstītyāha----evaṃ ceti /
GK16visa10cu:5906: (lo, ai) tanmūlasaṅkare dantaprabhetyādau parīteti pāṭhe yatpunaruktaṃ kaiścit /
GK16visa10cu:5908: dvayorapi sādhakabādhakābhāvena paryyante 'pyanyūnānatiriktatvena vṛttau hi sandehasaṅkarāṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5909: natu sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti asaṃśayavartitvajñānadaśāyāṃ kvacit kasyacinmithyātvaṃ kvacid dvayorapi /
GK16visa10cu:5911: naca sandehasaṅkarasya nirvāhaḥ śakyakriya iti vaktuṃ na yuktaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5913: kiñca kṣīranīranyāyena miśraṇena saṅkara iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5920: kāryaliṅgayostulyatve ca dvividheti catuḥ prakārā samāsoktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5925: aupamyagarbhatvaṃ samāsokternirasya caturvidhameva samāsokte rūpaṃ saṃhṛtya vyavasthāpayati---viśeṣaṇasāmye śliṣṭetyādi /
GK16visa10cu:5938: diṅmātraṃ yathā--“vyādhūya yadvasanam-” ityādau laukike vastuni laukikasya haṭhakāmukavyavahārādeḥ samāropaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5948: akhilāsu vṛttiṣu saṃsāreṣu ekarūpamadvitīyaṃ tvāṃ paśyadbhiryairjanaiḥ paratvajuṣo bhinnatvaviṣayāyā vibhaktervibhāgasya lopaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5950: taireva tasya ca dhruvaṃ dhruvatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtamityahaṃ manye /
GK16visa10cu:5952: tvāṃ kīdṛśam avyayam akṣayam, asaṃkhyatayā saṃkhyātumaśakyatayā pravṛttam asaṃkhyapadānuvṛttitvāt /
GK16visa10cu:5954: teṣāmapi hi akhilapadasāhityena vṛttiṣu sthiteṣvekarūpaṃ vikārāhityāttadarthe saṃkhyārāhityam /
GK16visa10cu:5955: parasyāḥ subvibhakterlopaśca kṛtaḥ iti dhruvaṃ niścitaṃ manye /
GK16visa10cu:5956: īdṛśaṃ tvāṃ paśyadbhirvibhaktilopaṃ kurvadbhiḥ cādīnāmīdṛśatvaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cihnaṃ kṛtamityevaṃ bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:5963: tatra cānyaśāstravyavahārasamāropo vedaśāstraprasiddhe vastuni īśvare yathā mama /
GK16visa10cu:5964: “yasyaujjvalyaṃ dyutibhiradhikaṃ vigraheralaṅkṛtīnāṃ yatpādānte laghurapi patat gauravaṃ samprayāti /
GK16visa10cu:5966: siddhākṣaratanurasau sadruṇaḥ śabdamūrttiḥ puṇyaśloko manasi satataṃ sannidhiṃ me prayātu” //
GK16visa10cu:5967: ityatra vākye prastutor'tho yathāsau puṇyaślokaḥ parameśvaro me manasi satataṃ sannidhiṃ prayātu /
GK16visa10cu:5968: yasya vigrahe śarīre 'laṅkṛtīnāṃ kaustubhabhūṣaṇaānāṃ dyutibhiradhikam aujjvalyaṃ,
GK16visa10cu:5969: yatpādānte laghurnikṛṣṭo 'pi patan gauravaṃ gurutvam uttamatvaṃ samprayāti /

GK16visa10cu:6482_1: idaṃ tu te mahatstotraṃ dharmarājasya tulyakarma lokamāraṇakāritvena māhātmyādhikyāttadviruddhajagajjīvakāritve,
GK16visa10cu:6485: atra stutervācyatve 'pi stutiprayojakārthaparatayā yatstutipadaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tadudāharaṇāntarasaṃgrahāya /
GK16visa10cu:6486: yathā “dānāt praśaṃsāṃ prāpto 'si karṇedānīṃ tu saṃgarāt /
GK16visa10cu:6487: apakramya yaśo dattvāraye prāptastato 'dhikā“miti karṇaṃ prati aśvatthāmna uktau stuteravācyatā /
GK16visa10cu:6497: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tacca prastutasya kāraṇarūpaṃ bodhyam bhaṅgyā prastutamapi kāryakathanarūpaṃ bhaṅgyabhidhīyate pratipādyate /
GK16visa10cu:6500: prastutakāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ yadā vyajyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6501: kāraṇavyañjakakāryarūpāyāmaprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ tu aprastutena kāryeṇa prastutaṃ kāraṇaṃ vyajyate iti bhedo vakṣyate yathā “indurlipta ivāñjanena” ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:6504: bhaṅgyā camatkāranipuṇavicchittyantarāśrayeṇa vyaṅgyam abhidhīyate bodhyate kāryādidvāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6509: atra hayagrīveṇa svargo vijita iti prastutameva gamyaṃ kāraṇaṃ vaicitryaviśeṣapratipattaye sainyasya pārijātamañjarīsāvajñasparśanarūpakāryadvāreṇābhihitam /
GK16visa10cu:6513: śacyāḥ keśasambhogalālitāstāḥ prasiddhāḥ pārijātasya mañjaryo yasya iyagrīvasya nṛpasya sainikairnandane vane sāvajñaṃ spṛṣṭā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6515: gamyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ kāraṇarūpaṃ sāvatramañjarīsparśasya abhihitaṃ vyañjanayā pratipāditam /
GK16visa10cu:6525: ityatra madamānayorvināśa eva tayornivāsaprītiparityāga iti paryāyoktam /
GK16visa10cu:6526: evaṃ ca yadeva gamyate tasyaivābhidhāne paryāyoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6527: taduktaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā “yadevocyate tadeva vyaṅgyaṃ yathā tu vyaṅgyaṃ na tathā ucyate” iti paryāyoktalakṣaṇavyākhyāne /
GK16visa10cu:6528: ayaṃ ca kvacitkāraṇena vācyena kāryasya gamyatve 'pi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:6532: iha tu varṇanīyasya prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena kāryamiti kāraṇavatprastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6541_0: anena rājñā śatruvilāsinīnāṃ staneṣu muktāphalavat sthūlatamān aśrubindūn paryāsayatā
GK16visa10cu:6541_1: pātayatā ākṣepasūtreṇa grathanasūtreṇavinaiva hārāḥ pratyarpitāḥ aśrubindava eva
GK16visa10cu:6543: atra varṇanīyasya rājño gamyabhūtaśatrumāraṇarūpakāraṇavatkāryabhūtaṃ tathāvidhaśatrustrīkrandanajalamapi prabhāvātiśayabodhakatvena varṇanārhamiti paryāyoktameva /
GK16visa10cu:6544: “rājan rājasutā na pāṭhayati māṃ devyo 'pi tūṣṇīṃ sthitāḥ kubje bhojaya māṃ kumārasacivairnādyāpi kiṃ bhujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6545: itthaṃ rājaśukastavāribhavane mukto 'dhvagaiḥ pañjarā- ccitrasthānavalokya śūnyavalabhāvekaikamābhāṣate” //
GK16visa10cu:6549: aprastutakāryeṇa prastutakāraṇavyañjanarūpāyā aprastutapraśaṃsāyā udāharaṇaṃ “rājan rājasutā ityādika “kāvyaprakāśakṛtā dattam;
GK16visa10cu:6554: atau'dhvagaiḥ pañjarānmukto rājaśukastadīyaśūnyavacbhau citralikhitān rājādīnavalokya ekaikamitthamābhāṣata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6556: devya iti sambodhanaṃ yūyamapi tūṣṇīṃ sthitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6564: atra prasthānedyataṃ bhavantaṃ śrutvā sahasaivārayaḥ palāyitā iti kāraṇaṃ prastutam /
GK16visa10cu:6566: anye tu--“rājaśukavṛttāntena ko 'pi prastutaprabhāvo bodhyata ityaprastutapraśaṃsaiva” ityāhuḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6578: sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣaṇa viśeṣastena vā yadi /
GK16visa10cu:6579: kāryaṃ ca kāraṇenedaṃ kāryeṇa ca samarthyate // VisSd_10.61 //
GK16visa10cu:6587: evaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇena kāraṇaṃ vā kāryeṇa samarthyate ucitatvena pratipādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6588: uktaṃ yat sāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣe tathātvadarśanāducitamiti bodhanaṃ samarthanarītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6589: iti caturvidhaṃ samarthanaṃ samarthyasamarthakayoḥ sādharmyeṇa tayoḥ parasparavaidharmyarūpeṇetareṇa vetyāto 'ṣṭadhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6594: atra dvitīyārdhagatena viśeṣarūpeṇārthena prathamārdhagataḥ sāmānyor'thaḥ sopapattikaḥ kriyate /
GK16visa10cu:6597: (vi, ha) tatra sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa samarthanaṃ sādharmyeṇāha---bṛhaditi /
GK16visa10cu:6608_0: yadyapi kṣudrasāmānyasya nedṛśaṃ samarthanamucitamityapratīteḥ tathāpi kāryāntagamanaviśiṣṭasya
GK16visa10cu:6608_1: tasya tat samarthanaṃ viśeṣaṇāṃśamādāyeti bodhyaṃ saviśeṣaṇe vidhiniṣedhāviti nyāyāt /
GK16visa10cu:6610: atra ca kṣudraviśeṣasya nagāpagāyāḥ kāryāntagāmitvadarśanāt kṣudrasāmānyasya kāryāntagāmitvamaucityena sambhavatīti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6626: “pṛthvi ! sthirā bhava bhujaṅgam ! dhārayaināṃ tvaṃ kūrmarāja ! tadidaṃ dvitayaṃ dadhīthāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6627: dikkuñjarāḥ ! kuruta tatnitaye didhīrṣāṃ āryaḥ karoti harakārmukamātatajyam” //
GK16visa10cu:6628: atra kāraṇabhūtaṃ harakārmukātatajyīkaraṇaṃ pṛthivīsthairyādeḥ kāryasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6635: āryo rāmo harakārbhukamātatajyaṃ yataḥ karoti tataḥ kāraṇāt pṛthvyādikaṃ sthirādikaṃ bhavetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6639: anyathā tu ātatajyīkaraṇe yāvān bharaḥ syāttena sarveṣāmasthairyaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6641: naca pṛthvīsthairyādeḥ kathamātatajyīkaraṇasya kāryatvamasthairyādereva tatkāryatvāditi vācyam /
GK16visa10cu:6643: nacaivamātatajyīkaraṇātpūrvabhūtasya viśeṣasthairyādestatrāpi kathaṃ kāryatvamiti vācyamtajjñānakāryatve ca tatkāryatvopacārāt nāndīmukhasya vivāhanimittakatvavat /
GK16visa10cu:6645: tādṛśāt krāraṇāt pṛthvyādeḥ sthirībhavanādikamucitamityevaṃ samarthanaṃ sthirībhāvādyupadeśa eka kāryam /
GK16visa10cu:6647: kāryādisamarthanacatuṣkaṃ hetvalaṅkārarūpasyaivetyataḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā tadupekṣya cāturvidhyamevārthāntaranyāsoktaṃ kāraṇasya janakahetutvāt kāryasya ca jñāpakahetutvāt,
GK16visa10cu:6650: “sahasā vidadhīta na kriyām” ityādau sampadvaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvasya vimṛśyakāritvarūpasya kāraṇasya samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6655: sahasā vimarṣaṇaṃ vinā kriyāṃ na vidadhīta, yato 'viveko 'vimṛsyakāritā paramāpadāṃ padaṃ sthānam /
GK16visa10cu:6656: vimṛśyakāritve tu na kevalaṃ nāpadaḥ kintu sampadaścetyāha---vṛṇate hīti /
GK16visa10cu:6667: (vi, gha) viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya samarthanaṃ vaidharmyaiṇetyasyodāharaṇamūhyamiti vakṣyate /
GK16visa10cu:6677: “sahasā vidadhīta-” ityatra sahasā vidhānābhāvasyāpatpradatvaṃ viruddhaṃ kāryaṃ samarthakam /
GK16visa10cu:6682: atastadanuktvā kāryeṇa kāraṇasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇetyasyāpyudāharaṇaṃ sahas vidadhītetyatraivetyāha---sahaseti /
GK16visa10cu:6685: āpatpadatvaṃ samarthakaṃ kāryam, sampadā viruddhamiti viruddhadharmavadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6687: atra hi vimṛṣyakāriṇa eva sampadāvaraṇāt kāryāt sahasā vidhānābhāva ucita iti pratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6689: viśeṣaṇasāmānyasamarthanaṃ kāraṇena kāryasamarthanañca vaidharmyeṇa yadanudāhṛtaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6690: tatra viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “guṇaānābheva daurātmyāddhuri dhūryo na yujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6693: asyārthaḥ--dhūryaḥ āropyamāṇabhāravahanasamarthaśca prāṇī dhuri bhāravahane niyujyate /
GK16visa10cu:6694: tacca guṇānāmeva daurātmyād daurjanyād dhūryatvaguṇasya bhāravahanaduḥ khaprayojakatvāttasya daurjanyam /
GK16visa10cu:6695: guṇābhāve tu tādṛśaṃ duḥ khaṃ na bhavatītyāha--asaṃjāteti /
GK16visa10cu:6697: asaṃjātatatskandho galiralaso gauḥ sukhaṃ svapiti, natu dhuri niyujyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6699: aniyujyamānaprāṇiviśeṣeṇa galigavādiyujyamānatvaviruddhadharmeṇa sukhasvāpena dhūryaviruddhadharmeṇa galitvena ca samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6700: alasasya sukhasvapanaśīlasya dhūryasya dhuri niyujyamānatvamucitamiti pratīteḥ niyogasamarthanameva niyujyamānadhūryasamarthanaṃ;
GK16visa10cu:6702: kāraṇena kāryasamarthanaṃ vaidharmyeṇa yathā--- “sa vijigye raṇe sarvān rākṣasendro baloddhataḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6705: atra hi rāvaṇasya vijayaḥ kāryaṃ rāmabāṇakaṭusvādānāsvādena kāraṇena samarthitam /
GK16visa10cu:6706: tadanāsvādena tasya vijaya ucitastadāsvāde sati tadasambhavāditi pratiteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6716: “yattvannetrasamānakānti salile magnaṃ tadindīvaraṃ meghairantaritaḥ priye ! tava mukhacchāyānukārī śaśī /
GK16visa10cu:6717: ye 'pi tvadramanānukārigatayaste rājahaṃsā gatā- stvatsādṛśyavinodamātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate” //
GK16visa10cu:6722: varṣāsu bhāvanopanītāṃ rāvaṇopahṛtāṃ sītāṃ sambodhya rāmasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6723: he priye ! tvatsādṛśyenārthād dṛśyamānena yo vinodastanmātramapi me daivena na kṣamyate /
GK16visa10cu:6726: varṣākālaṃvaśāt nīlotpalaṃ jalamagnaṃ, candro meghāntaritaḥ, rājahaṃsāśca mānasaṃ gatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6728: vākyatrayasyaiva kriyākārakabhāvena samāptatvād hetava ityatra hetvarthakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6732: na dhatte śirasā gaṅgāṃ bhūribhārabhiyā haraḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:6749: atra paśyantītyasaṃkhyapathgāmiti tvaddānajalavāhinīmiti ca padādeva kriyānanvayenāsamāptatvāt pathatrayagamanāpekṣayā asaṃkhyāpathagamanoktarṣeṇa taddarśanaṃ gopanahetuḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6751: iha kecid vākyārthagatena kāvyaliṅgenaiva gatārthatayā kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaṃ nādriyante /
GK16visa10cu:6752: tadayuktam, tathā hyatra hetustridhā bhavati--jñāpako niṣpādakaḥ samarthakaśceti /
GK16visa10cu:6761: kāryakaraṇasamarthena yānyudāharaṇāni darśitāni tatra hetūnāṃ vākyārthamātragatatvāj jñāpako 'numānasya viṣaya iti /
GK16visa10cu:6762: idaṃ tu kāvyaprakāśakṛdviṣayavibhāgamanādṛtyaiva likhitaṃ tanmate hi praśrasyaiva jñāpako heturna hetvalaṅkāraḥ,
GK16visa10cu:6764: anyatra tu janako jñāpakaśca heturhetvalaṅkāra eva /
GK16visa10cu:6765: ata eva--- “bhasmoddhūlana bhadramastu bhavate rudrākṣamāle śubhaṃ hā sopānaparamparāṃ girisutākāntālayālaṅkṛtim /
GK16visa10cu:6766: adyārādhanatoṣitena vibhunā yuṣmatsaparyāsukhā- llokocchedini mokṣanāmani mahāmohe nidhīyāmahe” //
GK16visa10cu:6767: iti śloke sukhālokaccheditvaṃ mokṣasya mahāmohatve heturityuktyā hetvalaṅkārodāharaṇatayā udāhṛtam /
GK16visa10cu:6768: tatra mokṣasya mahāmohatāyā alīkatvena sukhālokaccheditvasya janakahetutvāsambhavena jñāpakahetutvādeva /
GK16visa10cu:6769: anumānaṃ tu sādhyasādhanayorekadharmigatatvena nirdeśe sati hetorhetutvena nirdeśe satyeva /
GK16visa10cu:6770: iha tu sukhālokācchedinītyanena hetoreva nirdeśo natu hetutvena /
GK16visa10cu:6771: bhavatāpyanumānodāharaṇatayā vakṣyamāṇeṣu ślokeṣu hetūnāṃ hetutvenaiva nirdeśāt nahi “parvāto vahnimān dhūmāt '; ityukte 'numānam /
GK16visa10cu:6772: tasmād jñāpakahetumātraṃ nānumānālaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ, kintu darśitahetureva /
GK16visa10cu:6779: anyathā sākāṅkṣatayāsamañjasameva syāt iti pādatrayagatavākyaṃ niṣpādakatvenāpekṣate /
GK16visa10cu:6783: yattvannaitrasamānakāntītyuktahetvalaṅkārodāharaṇe daivākṣamāṃ prati nīlotpalādīnāṃ salilamagnatvāderjanakahetutvāsambhavāt kaṣṭasṛṣṭyā janakatvamupapādayitumāha /
GK16visa10cu:6798: ityādivadupadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā svato 'pi gatārthaṃ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ sopapattikameva karotīti pṛthageva kāryakāraṇabhāver'thāntaranyāsaḥ kāvyaliṅgāt /
GK16visa10cu:6804: ityādipadārdhaṃ vinā pūrvārdhavākyaṃ sākāṅkṣamityata uktarityā tatrāpi kāvyaliṅgameva syānnārthantaranyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6806: upadeśamātreṇāpi nirākāṅkṣatayā vṛṇate hi ityādāvākāṅkṣārāhityenāpi gatārthaṃ caritārthamityataḥ sahasā vidhānābhāvaṃ karmabhūtaṃ sampadvaraṇaṃ karttṛ sopapatikameva kurute /
GK16visa10cu:6812: parāpakāretyādau samarthanīyānirdeśāt nāstyeva tatrārthāntaranyāsa iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6814: pṛthvi sthirā bhavetyādau siddhe sthairye upadeśasambhavāt kārmukajyātatīkaraṇaṃ hetumapekṣate eveti tatra hetvalaṅkāraprasaktirdurvāraiva /
GK16visa10cu:6823: yatra janakahetorhetutvenaiva nirdeśastatra vaicitryābhāvānna hetvalaṅkāra ityāha--ni dhatta ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:6827: atra hetustridhā bhavati, traividhyena alaṅkāraṇāṃ viṣayavibhāgasthāpanāt kathaṃ tridhetyāha /
GK16visa10cu:6830: yathā “yatra patatyabalānā” mityādau śarāpātena madanadhāvanasyāniṣpādakaḥ sākāṅkṣatvena siddhasya sādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6832: anyathā yattvannetra ityādi pādatrayaṃ vināsamañjasaṃ syāt tadaivāsya virahiṇo nāyikāsādṛśyavinodāsahatvasya svato 'pratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6837: idañca kāvyaliṅgasya heturvaicitaryāvahanena na nivarttata iti kāvyaliṅgākhyamalaṅkaraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:6839: anumānaṃ tu vicchittyā jñānaṃ sādhyasya sādhanāt /
GK16visa10cu:6844: bhaṅgī cāhāryāroparūpā; vahnimān dhūmādityasya vāraṇāya tat /
GK16visa10cu:6845: atra sādhyasādhanayoreva dharmigatatvaṃ kāvyaprakāśakṛduktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ deyameva /
GK16visa10cu:6886: evañca darśitodāharaṇadvaye “jānīmahe” “manye” iti padayorutprekṣāvācakatve taddvaye utprekṣā naiveti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6887: tatpadadvayābhāve tu dvayoḥ sandehasaṅkara iti ca bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:6891: anyorudāharaṇayorhṛdaye prayasadbhāvasya smaradhāvanasya ca kāraṇarūpasya sādhyasyāpi padmakuḍmalatā śarapatanañca sādhanaṃ yathā parvato 'yaṃ vahnimān dhūmavattvādityādau /
GK16visa10cu:6895: atra svacchānāṃ patitaparihārarūpasāmānyasya jalānāmasitotpale nirasanarūpo viśeṣarūpaḥ sādhanam /
GK16visa10cu:6908: hetumatā kāryeṇa saha hetorabhedenābhidhābhidhānaṃ hetunāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6913: atra ca śuddhasāropā lakṣaṇaiva, nahyayamalaṅkāra iti kāvyaprakāśakṛt /
GK16visa10cu:6935: asya ca vicchittiviśeṣasya sarvālaṅkāravilakṣaṇatvena sphuraṇātpṛthagalaṅkāratvameva nyāyyam /
GK16visa10cu:6940: he tanvi ! yadi kupitāsi tadā karajakṣataṃ vidhāya bhujapāśābhyāmasya nāyakasya kaṇṭhaṃ dṛḍhaṃ badhāna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6954: vaktumiṣṭasya vastuno niṣedhābhāso 'niṣedhābhiprāyatvena niṣedhābhāsa ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6957: vakṣyamāṇasya uktasya vā vaktumiṣṭasya niṣedhābhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6961: ayamarthaḥ-vivakṣitasya vastunaḥ prākaraṇikatvādayukto niṣedhaḥ kutaḥ san bādhitasvarūpo yatrābhāsatāmavagamayati sa ākṣepo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6965: kvacid vakṣyamāṇaviṣayaḥ kvaciduktaviṣaya iti dvividha ākṣepo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6967: tatra vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye kvacitsarvasyāpi sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya niṣedhaḥ kvacidaṃśoktāvaṃśāntare niṣadha iti dvau bhedau /
GK16visa10cu:6973: kṣaṇamiha viśramya sakhe ! nirdayahṛdayasya kiṃ vadāmyathavā” //
GK16visa10cu:6974: atra sakhyā virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcitasya vakṣyamāṇaviṣaye niṣedhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:6984: virahasya virahāvasthāyāḥvakṣyamāṇe viśeṣe pāṇḍutvakṛśatvādau nirdayahṛdayatvena tu sāmānyataḥ sūcanam /
GK16visa10cu:6987: (lo, u) sarvatrāpi vakṣyamāṇasya virahasya sāmānyataḥ sūcanaṃ smaraśaravidhurāyā iti pratipādanāt /
GK16visa10cu:7002: “bālaa ! ṇāhaṃ dūtī tua piosi tti ṇa maha vāvāro /
GK16visa10cu:7003: sā marai tujjha aaso etnaṃ dhammakkharaṃ bhaṇimo” //
GK16visa10cu:7007: (vi, ba) uktaniṣedhaviṣaye vaktumityasya vastusvarūpasya niṣedhamāha---bālaa iti /
GK16visa10cu:7008: “bālaka nāhaṃ dūtī tiṣṭha priyo 'sīti na mama vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7009: sā mriyate tavāyaśaḥ etad dharmākṣaraṃ bhaṇāmaḥ //
GK16visa10cu:7014: tathā prāṇimātradharmo vaktavyastatra svapriyatvamanyajanapriyatvaṃ vā na prayojakamityetatsūcanāya priyo 'sītyuktam /
GK16visa10cu:7016: atra sā mriyate ityuktaviṣaye vaktumiṣṭasyātmano dūtītvasya vastunā eva niṣedho natu tadukteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7018: maraṇavyāvarttakadūtītvaviṣayatvena paramparayā tadviṣayatvāt atrādharmato nivṛttaye yathārthavāditvasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7029: atra tad vyaṅgyaduḥ khātiśayasya viśeṣasya pratipattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7032: dvitīye 'śakyavaktavyatvādi, tṛtīye dūtītve yathārthavāditvam, caturthe duḥ khasyātiśayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7039: nanu “karttavyaṃ pratyahaṃ strānaṃ natu rātrau kadācana';
GK16visa10cu:7040: ityatra vihitasya pratyahasnānasya rātrau niṣedhavad vidhiniṣedha evāyam /
GK16visa10cu:7041: sa ca nālaṅkāratāṃ bhajata ityāśaṅkate--na ceti /
GK16visa10cu:7046: atra ca vihitaniṣedhena vicchitterabhāvāt kṣudratvādyalaṅkāramadhye kāvyaprakāśakārādibhirlākṣitena sāṅkaryabhramaṃ nirasyati--na cāyamiti /
GK16visa10cu:7051: “yadvā mṛṣā tiṣṭhatu dainyameta- nnaicchanti vairaṃ marutā kirātāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7053: iha hi prathamapadyoktasya dvitīyapadena niṣedhastāttvika eva /
GK16visa10cu:7054: evañca niṣiddhavidhināpi nāsya sāṅkaryaṃ, sa hi yathā---
GK16visa10cu:7060: maṇau vajrasamutkīrṇo sūtrasthe vāsti me gatiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7061: atra padyadvayoktaniṣedhasya tṛtīyapadyena vidhāne niṣedhasyābhāsatā eva /
GK16visa10cu:7063: aniṣṭasya tathārthasya vidhyābhāsaḥ paro mataḥ // VisSd_10.65 //
GK16visa10cu:7067: aniṣṭasyārthasya vidhyābhāso niṣedhabodhako vidhistathā pūrvoktavat viśeṣapratipattaye cettadāpara ākṣepālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7072: yatheṣṭasya niṣedhastathaniṣṭasya nidhiranupapadyamāna ābhāse paryavasāyī dvitīyākṣepālaṅkārabījamiti /
GK16visa10cu:7076: “gaccha gacchasi cet kānta ! panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7077: mamāpi. janma tatraiva bhūyādyatra gato bhavān” //
GK16visa10cu:7082: (vi, ra) “gaccha gacchasi cetkānta'; ityatra janmakathanānmaraṇaṃ vyaṅgyam /
GK16visa10cu:7087: yatatra--- yātu yātu kimanena tiṣṭhatā muñca muñca sakhi sādaraṃ vacaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7090: atrodāharaṇavat sarvathā na yātviti tathāvidhāparādhakāle nāyikāyā niṣedhābhāsasya mūḍhānāmapi buddhyanārohāt /
GK16visa10cu:7103: asya cākṣepasya virodhāśrayatvena tadanantaraṃ virodhamūlālaṅkārapradarśanaṃ prakriyate---vibhāvaneti /
GK16visa10cu:7104: ucyate camatkārapratipattaye kavinā nibadhyate yasya kasyacitkāraṇasyābhāvaṃ darśayitvetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7110: vinā kāraṇamupanibadhyamāno 'pi kāryodayaḥ kiñcidanyatkāraṇamapekṣyaiva bhavituṃ yuktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7138: iyañca kāraṇābhāvena paratantratayā kāryetpatterviśiṣṭatayā bhāvanādanvarthā vibhāvanā /
GK16visa10cu:7141: atraiva caturthapāde “kiyantaḥ santi bhūtale” iti pāṭhe tvanuktam /
GK16visa10cu:7145: haratāpi tanuṃ yasya śambhunā na hṛtaṃ balam” //
GK16visa10cu:7150: acintyanimittodāharaṇaṃ taduktaṃ darśayati---yathā sa eka iti /
GK16visa10cu:7157: “yaḥ kaumāra-” ityādeḥ kāraṇasya ca kāryaviruddhāyā utkaṇṭhāyā nibandhanādviśeṣoktiḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7172: bhūṣaṇaviruddhasya'bhūṣaṇatvasya ca pratītāvapi na viśeṣoktiḥ pratīyate /
GK16visa10cu:7173: na hi tāralyābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya manohāritvābhāvarūpasya phalābhāvasya ca pratītyā viśeṣoktiḥ syāt /
GK16visa10cu:7174: tathā dhanino 'pītyādāvadhanitvāviruddhasya dhanitvasya pratītāvapi na vibhāvanāpratītiḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7175: nahi adhanitvādeḥ phalānyanunmādādīni yenādhanitvaviruddhadhanitvapratītāvapi tādṛśaphalābhāvapratītyā vibhāvanā syāt /
GK16visa10cu:7177: (lo, ai) iha ca kāryābhāva ityādigranthaḥ prathamapariccheda eva viśadīkṛtaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7180: natu “sa ekastrīṇi” ityādivat kāryaviruddhamukhena vibhāvanāyāśca kāraṇaviruddhasadbhāvamukhena śuddhodāharaṇaṃ tu anyānyasāṅkaryābhāvayuktam /
GK16visa10cu:7182: “karpūra iva dagdho 'pi śaktimān yo jane jane namo 'stvavāryavīryāya tasmai makaraketave” //
GK16visa10cu:7183: atra dāhakāryaṃtayā śakterabhāvo 'śaktiviruddhaśaktisadbhāvamukhena upanibaddha iti viśeṣoktiḥ suphuṭā /
GK16visa10cu:7187: kriyā kriyādravyābhyāṃ yaddravyaṃ dravyeṇa vā mithaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7195: tasya jātyā saha virodhastu jāterguṇena saha virodharūpa eveti pūrvagaṇanāpraviṣṭatvānnoktaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7201: paryavasāne tu āvirodha eva anyathā doṣāvahatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7202: guṇasya jātyā saha jāterguṇena saha virodha eveti guṇaviruddhasya traividhyameva /
GK16visa10cu:7210: (vi, ka) tatra jāteścaturbhiśca saha virodhamekaśloke eva darśayati---tava viraha iti /
GK16visa10cu:7216: nalinīdalamapītyatra nalinīdalatvajāternidāgharaviṇā dravyeṇa saha tādātmyena virodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7217: atrāpi viruddhadharmavyāpyatvād virodhasyaiva puraḥ sphūrttikatvādapikāreṇa virodhabodhanācca na rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:7223: dvijapatnīnāṃ kaṭhināḥ sati bhavati karāḥ sarojasukumārāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7227: he nṛpa ! te pūrvaṃ santatetyādinā kaṭhinā dvijapatnīnāṃ karā bhavanti sarojasukumārāḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7251: rūpamidaṃ madirākṣyā madayati hṛdayaṃ dunoti ca me //
GK16visa10cu:7255: āsecanakaṃ sekena tāpanāśakam amṛtena secanakaṃ vā /
GK16visa10cu:7267: atra haro dravyaṃ, tādātmyena tasya nañarthaviśiṣṭadhāraṇakriyāvirodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7268: vastutastu nedamudāharaṇamucitaṃ gaṅgāṃ dadhato 'sya dhāraṇakriyābhārarūpaguṇasyaiva viruddhatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7269: kintu “mokṣyate śiraso gaṅgāṃ bhuribhārakarīṃ hara'; ityevaṃ pāṭhaviśiṣṭamevedamudāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:7271: candrasūryayorviruddhaśītoṣṇaguṇavattvena virodhasya puraḥ sphurttikatvād atrāpi na rūpakam /
GK16visa10cu:7272: dinādipaścaika eva sūryo nāpare ekādeśā iti na jātivirodhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7274: atra “tava viraha-” ityādau pavanādīnāṃ bahuvyaktivācakatvājjātiśabdānāṃ davānaloṣmahṛdayabhedanasūryairjātiguṇakriyādravyarūpairanyonyaṃ virodho mukhata ābhāsate,
GK16visa10cu:7278: (vi, cha) atra prathamaśloke jāteścaturbhiḥ saha virodhaṃ grāhayati--atra tava viraha ityādāviti /
GK16visa10cu:7291: “tvadvāji-” ityādau “haro 'pi śirasā gaṅgāṃ na dhatte” iti virodhaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:7295: viśoṣoktau ca kāryābhāvena kāraṇameva; iha tvanyonyaṃ dvayorapi bādhyatvamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7299: vibhāvanāviśeṣoktyorapi kāraṇābhāve kāryasattvayoḥ kāryābhāvakāraṇasattvayośca viruddhatvena bhāsamānatvād virodhābhāsatvaprasaktau tata enaṃ viśeṣayitumāha---vibhāvanāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:7301: viśeṣoktāviti kāraṇamātrasāmagrī, tasyā eva phalabhāvakāle bādhyatvapratīteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7302: viśeṣoktyudāharaṇeṣu yadyatkāraṇaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ tasyaiva sāmagrītvenādhyāse evaṃ vaicitryāt /
GK16visa10cu:7313: tenānyadā bhinnadeśayordaṇḍaghaṭayoḥ sarvadaiva bhinnadeśayoḥ kāryayośca bhinnadeśatve 'pi nāyamalaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7316: “sā bālā vayamapragalbhamanasaḥ sā strī vayaṃ kātarā sā pīnonnatimatpayodharayugaṃ dhatte sakhedā vayam /
GK16visa10cu:7317: sākrāntā jaghanasthalena guruṇā gantuṃ na śaktā vayaṃ doṣairanyajanāśrayairapaṭavo jātāḥ sma ityadbhutam” //
GK16visa10cu:7323: bālā bālyadharmamṛdutvavatī tatkāryaṃ tasyā eva vaco 'prāgalbhyaṃ taccāsmākaṃ virahadaurbalyāt /
GK16visa10cu:7331: (lo, ā) bhinnadeśasthatvamāptatāyāṃ yaddeśameva kāraṇaṃ taddeśameva kāryamityevameva niyamaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7334: guṇau kriye vā cetsyātāṃ viruddhe hetukāryayoḥ // VisSd_10.69 //
GK16visa10cu:7336: virūpayoḥ saṃghaṭanā yā ca tadviṣamaṃ matam // VisSd_10.70 //
GK16visa10cu:7340: hutukāryayorguṇau kriye vā yad yadi viruddhe parasparaviparīte syātāṃ tadā etau dve ca viṣame /
GK16visa10cu:7350: “sadyaḥ karasparśamavāpya citraṃ raṇe raṇe yasya kṛpāṇalekhā /
GK16visa10cu:7352: atra kāraṇarūpāsilatāyāḥ “kāraṇaguṇā hi kāryaguṇamārabhante” iti sthaterviruddhā śuklayaśasa utpattiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7356: tamālavannīlā kṛpāṇalekhā lekhākāraḥ kṛpāṇo khaḍgo raṇe raṇe yasya rājñaḥ karasparśamavāpya śaradinduvatpāṇḍu yaśaḥ sadyaḥ prasūte idaṃ citram /
GK16visa10cu:7362: nanu viruddhatve kiṃ vaicitryamityata āha--kāraṇaguṇā iti /
GK16visa10cu:7365: yadyapyayaṃ niyamaḥ samāvāyikāraṇakāryayoreva tathāpi taddarśanātkavinā anyatrāpi tannayamamadhyāsyedaṃ varṇitam /
GK16visa10cu:7376: tathā ca strītajjanyavirahayoḥ kāraṇakāryayorānandadānatāpakriye ca viruddhe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7384: ayamambhodhiḥ ratnākara iti kṛtvā mayā dhānāśayā asevi sevitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7388: atra kevalaṃ kāṅkṣitadhanalābho nābhūt, pratyata kṣāravāribhirvadanapūraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:7390: niyataṃ pratikūlavatino bata dhātuścaritaṃ suduḥ saham” //
GK16visa10cu:7397: taruvalkalameva bhūṣaṇaṃ yatra tādṛśāṃ vanaṃ kva nṛpetyādikaṃ kka /
GK16visa10cu:7402: “vipulena sāgaraśayasya kukṣiṇā bhuvanāni yasya papire yugakṣaye /
GK16visa10cu:7403: madavibhramāsakalayā pape punaḥ sa purastriyaikatamayaikayā dṛśā” //
GK16visa10cu:7407: sāgaraśayasya viṣṇorvipulena kukṣiṇā udareṇa yugakṣayakāle bhuvanāni papire /
GK16visa10cu:7408: sa punarviṣṇuḥ śrīkṛṣṇaḥ ekatamayā purastriyā kartryā madavibhrameṇāsakalayā ekadeśarūpayā ekayā dṛśā pape ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7409: atra bhuvanapānasamarthakukṣimata ekastrīkaṭākṣeṇa peyatvayogo viruddha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7410: kāvyaprakāśakṛnmate tukkadvayena vinaivātra viruddhatayāpratīteḥ kenāpyanuktatayā nedaṃ caturthaviṣamālaṅkārodāharaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:7417: viṣamālaṅkāraṇāmeṣāṃ sūtroktaprakāraṇāmupalakṣaṇatayā sambandhinorananurūpatayā takṣyānusāreṇānye 'pi prakārā udāhartavyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7425: yogyayoḥ parasparocitayoḥ vastunorānurūpyeṇaucityena yā ślāghā sā samanāmālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7431: atra vyatirekayoge 'pi dvayoḥ saṅkaro, natu viṣamālaṅkārābhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7435: iti samaguṇayogaprītayastatra paurāḥ śravaṇakaṭu nṛpāṇāmekavākyaṃ vibavruḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7440: rasaguṇayoryogena prītiryeṣāṃ tādṛśāḥ paurā ityekavākyamekasya janasya prāthamikaṃ vākyaṃ vivavruḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7446: kaumudī tu śaśino na pṛthak siddhā, ataḥ pṛthaksiddhasampādanāy meghamuktatvaviśeṣaṇam /
GK16visa10cu:7456: duḥ khīyati sukhahetoḥ ko mūḍhaḥ sevakādanyaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7462: yadyapi prāṇavimoko na jīvitasya hetustathāpi prāṇavimokakriyāparamatra vimuñcatipadam /
GK16visa10cu:7463: duḥ khīyati duḥ khamiccati, duḥ khajanakakriyāpravṛttatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7466: iṣṭaphalasya prakṛtodāharaṇādau unnatyādeḥ prāptyarthaṃ tadviruddhasya praṇāmādeḥ karaṇaṃ vicitrālaṅkārabījaphalam /
GK16visa10cu:7471: yat punaḥ kaiściduktaṃ vastutaḥ tanutve 'pi yadekasyādhikyaṃ tadadhikamucyate iti tanna /
GK16visa10cu:7472: “dyauratra kvacidāśritā pravitataṃ pātālamatra kvacit kvāpyatraiva dharādharādharajalā dhārāvalirvarttate /
GK16visa10cu:7473: sphītasphītamaho nabhaḥ kiyadidaṃ yasyetthamevaṃvidhair- dūre pūraṇamastu śūnyamiti yannāmāpi nāstaṃ gatam” //
GK16visa10cu:7480: ajñāta eva śete kukṣau nikṣipya bhuvanāni” //
GK16visa10cu:7486: bhuvanāni kukṣau nikṣipya hariryatrājñāta eva śete /
GK16visa10cu:7487: jalanidheḥ kiñcidavacchedenaiva śayanājjalanidhidraṣṭṛbhirajñāta eva śeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7489: atra kukṣinikṣiptabhuvanasyāpi harestu kiñcidavacchedenaiva śayanādāśrayasya jalanidherādhikyaṃ varṇitam /
GK16visa10cu:7498_0: yugāntakāle pratisaṃhṛtāḥ svakukṣau praveśitā ātmānaḥ prāṇino yena tādṛśasya kaiṭabhadviṣo
GK16visa10cu:7498_1: viṣṇoryasyāṃ tanau jaganti savikāśamayantraṇamāsata tatra tasyāṃ tanau tapodhanasya
GK16visa10cu:7498_2: nāradasyābhyāgamasambhavā bhudo na mamuḥ na sthātumavakāśaṃ lebhire ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7503: “tvayā sā śobhate tanvī tayā tvamapi śobhase /
GK16visa10cu:7521: anekagocaramityatra ekadeti śeṣaḥ, kramikasthitau tu paryāyālaṅkārasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7522: kiñcitprakurvataḥ kartturdaivāditarasyāśakyasya kāryasya karaṇaṃ vā yadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7526: ramayanti jaganti giraḥ kathamiva kavayo na te vandyāḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7530: divamupayātānāmapi yeṣāṃ kavīnāmanalpaguṇagaṇā giraḥ jaganti ramayanti te kavayaḥ kathamiha na vandyā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7531: atra karttṛtāsambandhenādhāraṇāṃ kavīnāmasattve 'pi tadādheyānāṃ girāṃ sthitiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7541: “gṛhiṇī sacivaḥ sakhī mithaḥ priyaśiṣyā lalite kalāvidhau /
GK16visa10cu:7542: karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā haratā tvāṃ vada kiṃ na me hṛtam” //
GK16visa10cu:7547: tvāṃ haratā karuṇāvimukhena mṛtyunā mama kiṃ na hṛtaṃ vada /
GK16visa10cu:7552: vyāghātaḥ sa tu kenāpi vastu yena yathākṛtam // VisSd_10.74 //
GK16visa10cu:7558: kenāpi kartrā yad vastu yenopāyena yathākṛtaṃ tenaivopāyenānyaścettadanyathā kurute tadā tadanyathākaraṇaṃ sa vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7562: dṛśā harasyā yāḥ kaṭākṣarūpayā dṛśā jīvayantītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7564: na kevalaṃ kriyayā jayaḥ, kintu rūpeṇapītyāha---virūpākṣasyeti /
GK16visa10cu:7566: jetrīṇāmakṣiṣu manojñatvarūpaṃ vāmatvamityeva tatrāpi jaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7567: atra yena dṛgupāyena dāhastenaiva dṛgupāyena jīvanarūpaṃ dāhānyathākaraṇaṃ strībhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7569: saukaryeṇa ca kāryasya viruddhaṃ kriyate yadi // VisSd_10.75 //
GK16visa10cu:7575: anyoktakāryasya viruddhaṃ kāryamanyena yadi taduktakāraṇasya saukaryeṇa viśiṣṭaṃ kriyate pratipādyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7578: “ihaiva tvaṃ tiṣṭha drutamahamahobhiḥ katipayaiḥ samāgantā kānte ! mṛdurasi na cāyāsasahanā /
GK16visa10cu:7579: mṛdutvaṃ me hetuḥ subhaga ! bhavatā gantumadhikaṃ na mṛdvī soḍhā yadvirahakṛtamāyāsamasamam” //
GK16visa10cu:7581: nāyikayā ca pratyuta sahagamane tato 'pi saukaryeṇa hetutayopanyastam /

GK16visa10cu:7601: ihaiva tvamityudāharaṇe nahi mṛdutvasya nāyakasahagamanasya kāryatvaṃ pratīyate kintu sahagamanasya nirvāhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7604: evaṃ virodhamūlālaṅkārān nirṇoya śṛṅvalābandhena vicitratā alaṅkārā lakṣyante /

GK16visa10cu:7633: tena pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ yadyuttarottarasya uttarottarābhāvasya vā viśeṣyaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7645: “na tajjalaṃ yanna sucārupaṅkajaṃ na paṅkajaṃ tadyadalīnaṣaṭpadam //

GK16visa10cu:7650: atra sarojarāje yāni vikasitāmbhojādīni tadekadeśānāmambhojādīnāṃ viśeṣaṇāni paraṃparaṇi /
GK16visa10cu:7656: (lo, o) ambhojaṃ saraso, bhṛṅgā ambhojasya; saṃgītāni bhṛṅgāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇatvena /

GK16visa10cu:7672: saṅgītaṃ kartṛ, aliṣu padaṃ susambandharūpatayā vyavasāyaṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7673: atra vimalatvādau viśeṣyabhūtā vāpyādayaḥ sphuṭatkamalādau bhedena viśeṣaṇāni /
GK16visa10cu:7675: yathā---“na tā vāpyaḥ sphuṭanti yāsu padmāni samprati /
GK16visa10cu:7684: “rājye sāraṃ vasudhā vasudhāyāmapi puraṃ pure saudham /
GK16visa10cu:7691: tat kiṃ tribhuvanasārā bālā'rādhitā bhavatetyatra tu jahalliṅgatā /

GK16visa10cu:7695: puruṣeṣu kṣatriyaḥ śūra ityādiṣu sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvasattve eva nirdhāraṇāt /

GK16visa10cu:7704: prathamoddiṣṭānāṃ yaḥ prathamadvitīyādikramastena krameṇa tadanvitānāmanu paścād uddeśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7712: “unmīlanti nakhairlunīhi vahati kṣaumāñcalenāvṛṇu krīḍākānanamāviśanti valayakvāṇaiḥ samutnāsaya /
GK16visa10cu:7713: itthaṃ vañjuladakṣiṇānilakuhūkaṇṭheṣu sāṅketika- vyāhārāḥ subhaga ! tvadīyavirahe tasyāḥ sakhīnāṃ mithaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7717: nāyake nāyikāvirahakālīnān tatsakhīnāṃ sāṅketikavyavahārān kathayantyāḥ kasyāściduktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:7718: he subhaga ! tvadīyavirahe tasyāḥ sakhīnāṃ tattatkriyayā vañjulāditraye saṅketitā mithaḥ itthaṃ vāyavahārā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7722: iyamekasyāḥ sakhyāḥ prathamoktavañjulapuṣpakartṛke unmīlane saṅketitā prāthamikī uktiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7724: vahatīti dvitīyoktadakṣiṇānilakartṛke vahane saṅketitā iyaṃ sakhyā dvitīyoktiḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7738: valīṣu tasyāḥ skhalitāḥ prapedire krameṇa nābhiṃ prathamodabindhavaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7745: pakṣmaṇāṃ nibiḍatvena tatra kṣaṇaṃ sthitāḥ tataste tāḍitādhāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7749: tayoḥ kaṭhinatvena tatra nipātena tataḥ cūrṇitāḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7753: (lo, ā) sthitāḥ kṣaṇamityādāveke prathamodabindavo 'vo 'nekeṣu pakṣmādiṣu krameṇābhavan /
GK16visa10cu:7774: yato visṛṣṭarāgād adhare rāgadānārthameva prāgadhare karadānād kandukakrīḍābhāvācca tato nivartanam /
GK16visa10cu:7776: stane 'ṅgarāgopīdānīṃ ca na dīyate ityetatsūcanārthaṃ vā /
GK16visa10cu:7803: eṣvādhārā'dheyānāṃ saṃhatatvāsaṃhatatve sambhavatastad bhedābhedo na vivakṣitaḥ ityabhiprāyeṇa taddarśayati---eṣviti /
GK16visa10cu:7808: yeṣāmanekatvaghaṭitoyamalaṅkārasteṣāmeva saṃhatatvāsaṃhatatvāyorviśeṣakatvād bindūnāṃ tvanekāśrayeṣu ekasyaiva ghaṭitatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7809: ādhārāṇāṃ saṃhatatvaṃ yathā “svayaṃvare sāmiliteṣu rājasu krameṇa cakṣurnidadhe patiṃvarā” iti /
GK16visa10cu:7815: vṛkādayāḥ saṃhatarūpā iti bahuvacanena milanabodhanāt kramastu vilāsinīcaraṇāpekṣayā /
GK16visa10cu:7824: nanu kvacidekamanekasminnityuktarūpasya paryāyasyaikaṃ cānekagocaramityuktarūpād viśeṣālaṅkārāt ko viśeṣa ityata āha--atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:7835: nyūnādhikavinimayaśca nyūnaṃ dattvādhikagrahaṇamadhikaṃ dattvā nyūnagrahaṇamiti dvidhā /

GK16visa10cu:7843: tatra samābhyāmadhikaṃ dattvā nyūnagrahaṇācca vinimaye ekamudāharaṇamāha---dattvā kaṭākṣamiti /
GK16visa10cu:7847: “tasya ca pravayaso jaṭāyuṣaḥ svargiṇaḥ kimiva śocyate 'dhunā /
GK16visa10cu:7856: yena jarjarasya jarājīrṇasya kalevarasya śarīrasya vyayād indukiraṇojjvalaṃ candrakiraṇavat śubhraṃ yaśaḥ krītam /
GK16visa10cu:7857: atra jarjarasya śarīrasya dānena ujjvalasya yaśāsaḥ krayaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7867_1: vastu pareṇa kathitāt tasmād hetoḥ kathitasadṛśasyānyasya praṣṭavyaviśeṣaṇānvayavyavacchedaḥ
GK16visa10cu:7867_2: śābda ārtho vā pratīyate cettadā savyavacchedaḥ parisaṃkhyālaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7870: “kiṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ sudṛḍhamatra yaśo na ratnaṃ kiṃ kāryamāryacaritaṃ sukṛtaṃ na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7871: kiṃ cakṣurapratihataṃ dhiṣaṇā na netraṃ jānāti kastvadaparaḥ sadasadvivekam” //

GK16visa10cu:7884: jānātīti tvadapara iti pāṭhe pratyuttaraparituṣṭasya praṣṭuruttarakartṛjanapraśaṃsāvākyamidam /
GK16visa10cu:7892: ko dhyeyo bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kiṃ kāmyaṃ paramaṃ padam” //
GK16visa10cu:7898: yadyapi ārādhyatvamārādhanāviṣayatvamārādhanā ca devatāprītihetuḥ kriyā tathāpi ārādhyatvamatra puruṣapravṛttiviṣayatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7899: tena ārādhyamupārjanīyaṃ puṇyamiti uttarasya nānyaditi vyavacchedaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7907: (vi, tha) apraśnapūrvakatve vyavacchedasya śābdatve āha---bhaktirbhava iti yuvatirūpe kāmāstre /
GK16visa10cu:7908: bhaktirityādau sarvatra prāyo mahatāṃ paridṛśyata ityāsyānvayaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:7913: “yasmiṃśca rājani “jitajagati pālayati mahīṃ citrakarmasu varṇasaṅkaraścāpeṣu guṇacchedaḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visa10cu:7917: balaṃ vikramaḥ ārtānāṃ pīḍitānāṃ bhayanāśāya, sammataye prītaye ityarthaḥ, śrutaṃ vidyā /

GK16visa10cu:7923: anayorvarṇaguṇapadaśleṣaḥ na brāhmaṇaādiṣu na prajāsu iti vyapohapratītiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7936: asakṛdityanena praśrapūrvasyāsambhavottarasya sakṛd nirdeśe na cārutvam /

GK16visa10cu:7949: “kā visamā devyagaī kiṃ laddhavvaṃ jaṇo guṇaggāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7950: kiṃ sokkhaṃ sukalattaṃ kiṃ duggojjhaṃ khalo loo” //
GK16visa10cu:7954: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7955: ki saukhyaṃ, sukalatraṃ, ki durgrāhyaṃ khalo lokaḥ //
GK16visa10cu:7960: “kā viṣamā daivagatiḥ kiṃ labdhavyaṃ jano guṇagrāhī /
GK16visa10cu:7961: ki saukhyaṃ sukalatraṃ kiṃ durgrahyaṃ khalo lokaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:7965: na ca kāvyaliṅgam, uttarasya praśnaṃ pratyajanakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:7969: idaṃ ca jñāpakahetīḥ kāvyaliṅgatvābhāvatvakathanaṃ prāgevārthāntaranyāsavicāre smartavyam /
GK16visa10cu:7970: paraṃ praśnajñāpakatve uttarālaṅkāreṇa bādhanānna tatra kāvyaliṅgatvāvakāśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7986: “mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita” ityanena tatsahacaritamapūpabhakṣaṇamarthādāyātaṃ bhavatīti niyatasamānanyāyādarthāntaramāpatatītyeṣa nyāyo daṇḍāpūpikā /
GK16visa10cu:7993: tathā tat sahacaritapiṣṭakabhakṣaṇamāvaśyakamato mūṣikeṇa daṇḍo bhakṣita ityanenārthāt kenāpyukteneti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7995: iti yat niyataṃ tasya samānanyāyādarthāntaramuktabhinnortha āpatati pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:7998: (lo, ḷ) kan pratyayena daṇḍāpūpavat daṇḍāpūpikā, tathāvidhanyāyopi daṇḍāpūpikā /
GK16visa10cu:7999: yena kena vidhinā ca vastvantarasyāgamor'thādāpatanaṃ siddhiriti yāvat /
GK16visa10cu:8002: tathāhi yena khalu mūṣikeṇāpūpasahacarito daṇḍo bhakṣitastena kathamapūpaḥ parityakta iti tathehāpi boddhavyam /
GK16visa10cu:8022: evaṃ muktānāṃ nārīṇāṃ stanamaṇaaḍalaluṭhanena pūrvanyāyāt smarakiṅkarāṇāmapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8025: atitaptamayo 'pi mārdavaṃ bhajate kaiva kathā śarīriṇām” //
GK16visa10cu:8029: sa rājā ajaḥ sahajāṃ svābhāvikīm, atrāyo 'prākaraṇikam /
GK16visa10cu:8033: atra ca samānanyāyasya śleṣamūlatve vaicitryaviśeṣo yathodāhṛte-“hāro 'yam-” ityādau na cedamanumānam,
GK16visa10cu:8038: hāroyamityādau muktāpadaṃ smarasyākiṅgaramuktarūper'the mauktike ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8039: luṭhatīti padaṃ ca sāvajñasthitirūpe āliṅgane cārthe śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8040: vilalāpetyādau ca taptapadamagnisaṃyoge virahaduḥ khe ca śliṣṭam /
GK16visa10cu:8044: hāroyamityatra stanasaṅgihāraluṭhanena stanasaṅgikāmukaluṭhanasya vilalāpetyādau cābhitāpena mārdavasyānumeyatvaprasakteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8049: tathā nyāyasya puraḥ sphūrtikatvāt sādhyahetubhāvena nirdeśābhāvācca nānumānamityābhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8053: tasya hi pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte pīnatvabhojanādikayoravinābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8061: ata eva asyāḥ sargavidhau ityatra candramadanayoḥ prajāpatitvavikalpe 'pyalaṅkārāntarāghaṭitatvānna vikalpālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8064: “namayantu śirāṃsi dhanūṃṣi vā karṇapūrīkriyantāmājñā maurvyo vā” /
GK16visa10cu:8065: atra śirasāṃ dhanuṣāṃ ca namanayoḥ sandhivigrahopalakṣaṇatvāt sandhivigrahayoścaikadā kartumaśakyatvādvirodhaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8067: tulyabalatvaṃ cātra dhanuḥ śironamanayordūyorapi spardhayā sambhāvyamānatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8072: (vi, va) namayantvityādikaṃ na ślokaḥ, kintu jetṛnṛpaterjetavyanṛpatiṣu jijñāsāvākyamātramidam /
GK16visa10cu:8073: praṇipātārthaṃ te rājānaḥ śirāṃsi vā namayantu yuddhārthaṃ dhanurvā namayantu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8074: tathā ca bhamājñā cākarṇapūrīkriyatāṃ karṇaṃ pūrayitvā śrūyatāṃ yuddhārthaṃ maurvo vākarṇaparyantaṃ nīyatāmityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8088: (lo, o) tulyabalayorekasmin kārye niyojitumarhayoḥ, virodhaḥ ekadā nirvāhayitumaśakyatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8102: atra virodhaprasaktiranavadhānamūlikaiveti manyāmahe---ekadaiva devabrāhmaṇebhyo vittadānasambhavena virodhābhāvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8103: davāyovetyādiniyamagarbhatvena ekavyaktikavittābhiprāyeṇa vā virodho darśita iti vā /
GK16visa10cu:8108: guṇau kriye vā yugapatsyātāṃ yadvā guṇakriye /
GK16visa10cu:8114: guṇadvayaṃ vā kriyādvayaṃ vā guṇakriyādvayaṃ vā yadi yugapad varṇitaṃ syādityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8122: “haṃho dhīrasamira ! hanta jananaṃ te candanakṣmābhṛto dākṣiṇyaṃ jagaduttaraṃ paricayo godāvarīvāribhiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8123: pratyaṅgaṃ dahasīti me tvamapi ceduddāmadāvāgniva- nmattoyaṃ malinātmako vanacaraḥ kiṃ vakṣyate kokilaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8126: (vi, sa) haṃho dhīreti . mandasyaiva dhairyavattvenākāryanivṛttirūpeṇa sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8133: īdṛśastvamiti virahe me mama pratyaṅgaṃ dāvāgnivad dahasi cet tadā matta unmatto malinātmakaḥ kuṣṇavarṇa eva kuṭilasvabhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8134: vanacaratvena ca lokavyavahārānabhijñaḥ kokilaḥ kiṃ vakṣyate ? sa sutarāṃ dhakṣyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8136: (lo, ā) dhīraḥ vaṃśena vidhinā pāṇḍityacca, kṣmābhṛtparvataḥ bhūdharaṇakṣamaḥ kaścit mahāpuruṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8141: atra dāhe ekasmiṃścandanakṣmābhṛjjanmarūpe kāraṇe satyapi dākṣiṇyādīnāṃ hetvantarāṇāmupādānam /
GK16visa10cu:8155: “śaśī divasadhūsaro galitayauvanā kāminī saro vigatavārijaṃ mukhamanakṣaraṃ svākṛteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8156: prabhūrdhanaparāyaṇaḥ satatadurgataḥ sajjano nṛpāṅganagataḥ khalo manasi sapta śalyāni me” //
GK16visa10cu:8160: ete sapta dhūsaratvaviśiṣṭaśayyādayaḥ sapta manasi śalyānītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8164: evaṃ galitayauvanāyāḥ kāmavattvaṃ kāminyā galitayauvanatvaṃ vā anucitam /
GK16visa10cu:8172: tatra daivādhānadoṣeṇa śocyasya sattvaṃ svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyasyāsattvam /
GK16visa10cu:8177: sajjanasya durgatatvaṃ tadaiva doṣāt śocyatvena śobhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8178: galitayauvanāyāṃ kāmavattvasya vidheyatvapakṣe vidheyasya tasya prabhordhanaparāyaṇasya dhanaparāyaṇe prabhutvasya vā,
GK16visa10cu:8179: vidheyasya khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatatvasya nṛpāṅgaṇagate khalatvasya vā bidheyasya svādhīnadoṣeṇa śocyatvāda śobhanatvamiti vidheyānāmeva sadasattvam /
GK16visa10cu:8181_0: iha kecidāhuḥ--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ śobhanatvaṃ khalasyāśobhanatvaṃ ceti sadasadyogaḥ”
GK16visa10cu:8181_1: iti anye tu--“śaśiprabhṛtīnāṃ svataḥ śobhanatvaṃ dhūsaratvādīnāṃ tvaśobhanatvamiti sadasadyogaḥ” /
GK16visa10cu:8182: atra hi śaśiprabhṛtiṣu dhūsaratvāderatyantacitatvamiti vicchittiviśeṣasyaiva camatkāravidhāyitvam /
GK16visa10cu:8184: “nṛpāṅganagataḥ khala” iti tu kramabhedādduṣṭatvamāvahati sarvatra viśeṣyasyaiva śobhanatvena prakramāditi /
GK16visa10cu:8186: samādhyalaṅkāre tvekakāryaṃ prati sādhake samagre 'pyanyasya kākatālīyanyāyenāpatanamiti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8190: pūrvoktaślokepi vidheyānāmeva tathātvād bhinnābhiprāya granthakṛnmanasi kṛtvāparoktaṃ sadasadyogaṃ darśayati---iha keciditi /
GK16visa10cu:8195: uddeśye sattvāsattvābhyāṃ tu teṣāṃ matena camatkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8201: khale nṛpāṅgaṇagatvasya vidheyatā gatatvasya vidheyatāpakṣa eva nṛpāṅgaṇagatade khalatvasya vidhayatā pakṣetūddeśyaḥ śobhana eveti naiṣa doṣa iti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8202: ekakāraṇādeva sukare kārye daivāt kāraṇāntarā'gamanarūpāt samādhyalaṅkārādasya bhedamāha---iha ca khaleti /
GK16visa10cu:8204: kāryaṃ prati ekasyaiva samagre sādhakatve 'samagrakāraṇavṛttirna sādhakatve ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8207: viśeṣyasya śaśikāminīprabhṛteḥ sūtrasya tṛtīyapādaṃ viśadayati--iha ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8210: “aruṇe ca taruṇi nayane tava malinaṃ ca priyasya mukham /
GK16visa10cu:8211: mukhamānataṃ ca sakhi te jvalitaścāsyāntare smarajvalanaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8215: (vi, ga) guṇayoḥ kriyayośca yogapadyarūpaṃ samuccayamāha---aruṇe ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8217: tau ca yayoruttarabhūtau tayoryaugapadyabodhakau ityata āhaatrādye iti /
GK16visa10cu:8221: patitaṃ ca mahīpatīndra ! teṣāṃ vapuṣi prasphuṭamāpadāṃ kaṭākṣaiḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8226: atra pūrvārdhe guṇottaraṃ cakāraḥ, pārardhe tu kriyāttaramityanayoryaugapadyam /
GK16visa10cu:8229: vyadhikaraṇyepyeṣa dṛśyate iti kāvyaprakāśakṛt, yathā--- “kṛpāṇapāṇiśca bhavān raṇakṣitau /
GK16visa10cu:8243: ete guṇākriyāyaugapadye ye samuccayaprakārāste kāryakāraṇayoryaḥ paurvāparyyarūpaḥ kālaniyamaḥ tadviparyyayarūpātiśayoktimūlā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8244: darśitodāharaṇeṣu sarvatraiva guṇayoḥ kriyayorvā kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvepi yaugapadyokteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8247: tathā cet taddvayābhāve satīti viśeṣaṇaṃ deyamityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8265: ripoḥ pratīkāre pratyapakāre 'śaktena kenāpi yadi tatsambandhino 'nyasya tiraskāraḥ tasyaiva riporevotkarṣatāsādhakaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8268: (lo, ī) evaṃ vākyanyāyāśrayiṇo 'laṅkārān darśayitvā, lokanyāyāśrayiṇo darśayati---pratyanīkamiti /
GK16visa10cu:8270: tenābhiyojyatayā pratinidhibhūtortho ripoḥ sambandhī varṇyate iti pratyanīkaṃ nāmālaṅkaraṇam /
GK16visa10cu:8281: atra madhyena svamadhyajayāt nāyikā siṃhasya ripuḥ, tatkucasādṛśyāt karikumbhau tadīyau /
GK16visa10cu:8284: svasambandhaḥ kucakumbhasambandhaḥ sādṛśyasambandhādidaṃ ca kvacidanukūlasya vāñchitācaraṇepi sambhavati /
GK16visa10cu:8285: yathā viraha vidhurāpi satataṃ bhavataḥ śvāsānuhāriṇī patati ityādau /
GK16visa10cu:8292: prasiddhasyopamānasya upameyatvakalpanaṃ vā niṣphalatvakathanaṃ veti dvividhaṃ pratīpamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8304: “tadvaktraṃ yadi mudritā śaśikathā hā hema sā ceddyutiḥ;
GK16visa10cu:8306: dhikkandarpadhanurbhruvau yadi ca te kiṃ vā bahu brūmahe yatsatyaṃ punaruktavastuvimukhaḥ sargakramo vedhasaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8311: tad vaktrādisattve śaśikathādīnāṃ mudritatvādikaṃ vaiphalyaṃ paryavasitaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8329: atyutkṛṣṭasya vastuno 'tyantamutkarṣamuktvāpi upamānatve 'pi kalpite nirdiṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8335: “ahameva guruḥ sudāruṇānāmiti hālāhala ! tāta ! mā sma dṛpyaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8336: nanu santi bhavādṛśāni bhuvane 'smin vacanāni durjanānām” //
GK16visa10cu:8340: he hālāhala, he tāta, ahameva sudāruṇānāṃ guruḥ pradhānam /
GK16visa10cu:8341: ityevaṃ dṛpyo mā sma, evaṃ darpaṃ mā kuru ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8343: nanu bho asmin bhuvane durjanānāṃ bhūyo bahūni vacanāni api bhavādṛśāni bhavattulyāni santītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8353: (vi, ḍha) atra bhavadiva dṛśyante yānītyanena halāhalasyopamānatvenaiva nirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8359: brahmā yathā vedaṃ vadati tathā brāhmaṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8383: kopoparaktānyapi kāminīnāṃ mukhāni śaṅkāṃ vidadhurna yūnām” //
GK16visa10cu:8387: śoṇa upalo maṇiḥ khacito yatra tādṛśakuṇḍalasya mayūkhaiḥ sadaivāruṇīkṛtāni yasyāṃ puri kāminīnāṃ kopoparaktānyapi mukhāni yūnāṃ kopaśaṅkāṃ na vidadhurityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8406: mīlite utkṛṣṭaguṇena nikṛśṭaguṇasya tirodhānam, iha tūbhayostulyaguṇatayā bhedāgrahaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8416: balabhadravadanacchadmano vadanavyājasya padmasya paryantapātino mudhuliho bhramarān udaṃśūnām udratāṃśūnāṃ daśānānāṃ dantānāmaṃśubhiḥ śvaityaṃ nayan jagādetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8420: iha tu vastvantaraguṇenākrāntatā pratīyata iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8437: guṇagaura ! niṣaṇṇo 'pi kathaṃ nāma na rajyasi” //
GK16visa10cu:8441: ananuraktaṃ nāyakaṃ prati anuraktāyā nāyikāyā utkiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:8443: guṇena gaura iti, guṇo gauro yasyeti samāsena ca sambodhanam /
GK16visa10cu:8450: rājahaṃsa ! tava saiva śubhratā cīyate na ca na cāpacīyate” //
GK16visa10cu:8451: pūrvatrātiraktahṛdayasaṃparkāt prāptavadapi guṇagauraśabdavācyasya nāyakasya raktatvaṃ na niṣpinnam,
GK16visa10cu:8452: uttaratrāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ vidyamānāyāmapi gaṅgāyamunāpekṣayā prakṛtasya haṃsasya gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃparke 'pi na tadrūpatā /
GK16visa10cu:8457: atiriktahṛdayaṃ rāgabhṛtatvenātiriktaguṇaṃ hṛdayaṃ prāptavat prāptaprāyaṃ raktatvaṃ na niṣpannam,
GK16visa10cu:8459: itthamatra prakṛtena nāyakasya prakṛtasya hṛdayasya guṇāgrahaṇaṃ darśayitvā prakṛtato 'prakṛtaguṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvamuttaraśloke darśayati---uttaratreti /
GK16visa10cu:8460: yadyapi rājahaṃsopyaprakṛtastathāpi sambodhyatvenā'pekṣikaṃ tasya prakṛtatvaṃ darśayannāha---aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmiti /
GK16visa10cu:8461: sati hetau phalābhāvarūpāyā viśeṣokterasya bhedamāha--atra ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8462: viśeṣoktausāmānyata eva phalābhāvaḥ iha tu guṇagrahaṇarūpaphalābhāvarūpo bhaṅgiviśeṣa iti bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8463_0: nanu kāryasya kāraṇavirodhiguṇavaśāt kāryasya kāraṇaguṇāgrahaṇaṃ viṣamālaṅkārepyasti
GK16visa10cu:8463_1: ced yadyapi darśitodāharaṇadvaye kāryakāraṇabhāvasattvāt tādṛśasyātadruṇasya viṣamālaṅkāratvāviśeṣa
GK16visa10cu:8467: kayāpi sūcyate bhahgyā yatra sūkṣmaṃ taducyate // VisSd_10.91 //
GK16visa10cu:8477: puṃstvaṃ tanvyā vyañjantī vayasyā smitvā pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekha” //
GK16visa10cu:8478: atra kayācitkuṅkumabhedena saṃlakṣitaṃ kasyāścitpuruṣāyitaṃ pāṇau puruṣacihnakhaḍgalekhālikhanena sūcitam /
GK16visa10cu:8482_0: kācid vayasyā sakhī kasyāścinnāyikāyāḥ kaṇṭhe vaktrasyandibhiḥ svedabindupravāhaiḥ
GK16visa10cu:8482_1: bhinnaṃ dvidhākṛtaṃ kuṅkumaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāḥ nāyikāyāḥ pustvaṃ ratau puruṣāyitatvaṃ
GK16visa10cu:8482_2: vyañjayantī smitvā hasitvā tasyāḥ pāṇau khaḍgalekhāṃ lilekhetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8490: atra viṭasya bhrūvikṣepādinā lakṣitaḥ saṅketakālābhiprāyo rajanīkālabhāvinā padmanimīlanena prakāśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8494: viṭaṃ dhūrtam upanāyakaṃ tadjijñāsārthaṃ saṃketakālamanasaṃ jñātvā vidagdhayā nāyikayā hasatā netrārpitākūtaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8505: āḥ śaityaṃ tuhinācalasya karayorityūcivān sasmitaṃ śailāntaḥ puramātṛmaṇḍalagaṇairdṛṣṭo 'vatādvaḥ śivaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8511_0: śailendreṇa pratipādyamānāyā utsṛjyamānāyā girijāyā hastasya upagūḍhane upagūhanena
GK16visa10cu:8511_1: svarśeṇa ullasaddhiḥ romāñcādibhiḥ romāñcavepathusvedaiḥ visaṃṣṭhulasya vyastasya
GK16visa10cu:8511_2: akhilavaivāhikavidheḥ vyāsaṅgasya vyāpārasya bhaṅgenākulaḥ san āḥ āścarthaṃ tuhinasambandhino
GK16visa10cu:8511_3: 'calasya karayoḥ śaityam ityūcivān san śailāntaḥ pureṇa tadratastrībhiḥ gauryyādimātṛmaṇḍalena
GK16visa10cu:8519: prakṛtāpahnavakārī yo viṣayo vastu sthāpyamānamaprakṛtaṃ vastu, tasyānabhidhānādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8525: yadi śleṣeṇānyathā vānyathayet sāpyapahnutiḥ“ityuktalakṣaṇāt“kāle vāridharāṇām” ityudāharaṇād dvitīyāpahnavādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8527: gopanīyārthasya mopanakṛtā prathamamabhihitatvācca vyājokteriti likhanena darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8528: iha tu gopanīyārthasya romāñcādeḥ śivena prathamamanabhidhānāt /
GK16visa10cu:8547: “lāṅgūlenābhihatya kṣititalamasakṛddārayannagrapadbhyā- mātmanyevāvalīya drutamatha gaganaṃ protpatan vikrameṇa /
GK16visa10cu:8548: sphūrjaddhuṅkāradhoṣaḥ pratidiśamakhilān drāvayanneṣa jantūna kopāviṣṭaḥ praviṣṭaḥ prativanamaruṇocchūnacakṣūstarakṣuḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8552: aruṇe ucchūne sphārite cakṣuṣī yasyā tādṛśaḥ eṣa tarakṣuḥ vyāghraḥ pratibalaṃ pratipakṣasamūhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8553: kīdṛśaḥ kṣititalamasakṛd lāṅgūlenābhihatya agrapadbhyāṃ dāhayan vilikhan /
GK16visa10cu:8554_0: athānantaraṃ ātmanyevāvalīya kuñcitāṅgo bhūtvā drutaṃ gaganaṃ vikrameṇa ca protpatan
GK16visa10cu:8554_1: tathā sphūrjatā visphuratā phūtkāreṇa ghoraḥ tathāsvilān jantūn pratidiśaṃ drāvayan
GK16visa10cu:8563: bhūtasya bhaviṣyato vā adbhutasya padārthasya yat pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ pratyakṣeṇa dṛśyamānatvaṃ varṇitaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8571: ekacaluke pīyamānasamudrarūpe gaṇḍuṣe matsyakacchapāvīśvārāvatārau bhūtabhāvinau yogabalena dṛṣṭau /
GK16visa10cu:8581: bhūṣaṇena bhaviṣyantyāḥ śobhāyā tadvināpi darśanād bhāvibhūṣaṇeti /
GK16visa10cu:8583: na cāyaṃ prasādākhyo guṇaḥ, bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyamāṇatve tasyāhetutvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8586: (vi, ga) nanu bhūtabhāvinoḥ pratyakṣāyogyayorapi pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ śīghrapratītiviṣayatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8587: tathācedṛśārthasya viṣayatvena śabdabodhitopi sortho viśada eva /
GK16visa10cu:8588: tathā cārthavaimalyaṃ prasādo yaḥ paroktaḥ prasādaguṇaḥ sa evāyaṃ tadbhinnavaicitryaviśeṣābhāvād bhāvikanāmālaṅkāro nāstītyāśaṅkate---na cāyamiti /
GK16visa10cu:8593: na cādbhuto rasaḥ, vismayaṃ pratyasya hetutvāt /
GK16visa10cu:8601: tasya vismayaṃ prati hetutvādeva, natu vismayarūpatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8613: bhūte bhāvini rūpe bhūtabhāvitvena jñāpanāt bhrāntimattvamāśaṅkate--na ca bhrāntīti /
GK16visa10cu:8615: prakṛtasyānyatādātmyabhrama eva bhrāntimānna cātrābhūtabhāvipadārthāḥ prakṛtāstatra bhūtabhāvitāvibhramaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8622: yadi punarvastunaḥ kvacitsvabhāvoktāvapyasyā vicchitteḥ sambhavastadobhayoḥ saṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8627: laukikaṃ vastu ḍimbhavyāghrādi tadgatasya sūkṣmadharmātmakasvabhāvasya kavibhinnajanāvedyatanmātravṛttidharmarūpasya tatra yathā varṇitaṃ tasya svarūpamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8632: ityatra ḍimbhamātrakriyāderbhāvibhūtasya ko 'laṅkāraḥ syāditi manasikṛtya samādhatte--yadi punariti /
GK16visa10cu:8640: yatra bhūtabhāvivastunorna pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ kintu tadvastuna eva pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ varṇita tatra nāyamalaṅkāra ityudāhṛtya darśayati---anātapatro 'pīti /
GK16visa10cu:8641: ātapatrarahitopyayaṃ rājā sarvadikṣu sitātapatraiḥ sarvato veṣṭita iva lakṣyate,
GK16visa10cu:8642: vilāsahetukavyajanena vījyamāna iva lakṣyate iti pūrvato 'nuṣaṅgaḥ, śītalāṅkatvāta /
GK16visa10cu:8646: yatpunarapratyakṣāyamāṇasyāpi varṇane pratyakṣāyamāṇatvaṃ tatrāyamalaṅkāro bhavituṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16visa10cu:8660: tathā cātra virodhālaṅkāra eva iti bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8663: yadvāpi prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhavet // VisSd_10.94 //
GK16visa10cu:8668: mahatāṃ caritaṃ vā prastutasyāṅgaṃ prakarṣakaṃ yadā bhavedityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8676_0: yasyā puri adhaḥ kṛtamambhodharāṇāṃ meghānāṃ maṇḍalaṃ yaistādṛsmānāṃ candrajyotsnānipātāt
GK16visa10cu:8676_1: kṣaratāṃ śaśāṅkopalakuṭṭimānāṃ candrakāntamaṇiyamagṛhāṇāṃ payobhiḥ kelīvanaṃ vṛddhimurarīkaroti prāprotītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8680: kuṭṭimairadhaḥ karaṇameva puryā adhaḥ karaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa10cu:8689: yugānte ucitā yoganidrā yasya sāḥ puruṣo viṣṇurlokān saṃhṛtya amuṃ samudram adhiśete /
GK16visa10cu:8693: lokasaṃhārāt sūryābhāve 'pi nayanaraviṇa padmavikāśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8694: atra varṇanīyo 'mbhodhiḥ prakṛstasya prakarṣakamīdṛśaṃ brahma stūyamānedṛśaviṣṇuśayanarūpaṃ taccaritam /
GK16visa10cu:8718: (vi, ḍa) priyaśabdātprakarṣārthe iyasunpratyayena sādhitasya preyaḥ śabdārthamāha /
GK16visa10cu:8721: nāyikāyā ratyuttarāvasthaāṃ smṛtvā cintayato virahiṇa uktiriyam /
GK16visa10cu:8722: tāṃ ratyuttarāvasthāṃ priyāṃ saṃsmṛtya tiṣṭhato mamāntarmānasamaniśameva na śāntimeti /
GK16visa10cu:8723: kaudṛśāvasthāṃ ratipraśamādāmīliti alasād vivartitā ca tārakā yatra tat tādṛśamakṣi yasyāḥ tādṛśīm /
GK16visa10cu:8724: matkaṇṭhabandhane daraślathā cālpaśithilā bāhuvallī yasyāḥ tādṛśī,
GK16visa10cu:8750: tena balātkāraṃ vinā paroḍhāpravṛttau tadabhāvipi saṃjñāśabdasyāsya prāyikī vyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16visa10cu:8759: (vi, ta) vane tvadvairivanitādavṛnde pulindā nijastriyaḥ parihatya ratiṃ kurvate /
GK16visa10cu:8763: vairistrīviḍambanena rājñaḥ prakarṣāt tata eva tadviṣayabhāvaprakarṣāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8764: evaṃ bhāvābhāsepīti yathā--- “kiṃ brūmaste mahārāja māhātmyamanyadurlabham /
GK16visa10cu:8771: dadṛśe tava vairiṇāṃ madaḥ sa gataḥ kvāpi tavekṣaṇe kṣaṇāt” //
GK16visa10cu:8777: tavekṣaṇe tavadarśane sati kṣaṇāt sa madaḥ kvāpi gato na dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa10cu:8803: prathamajñātasya kṣāsasya ślokamadhye udayapratītya udayaḥ sarājaviṣayabhāvaprakarṣakamaṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:8806: salajjā cāntike sakhyāḥ pātu naḥ pārvatī sadā” //
GK16visa10cu:8813: “asauḍhā tatkālollasadasahabhāvasya tapasaḥ kathānāṃ viśrambheṣvatha ca rasikaḥ śailaduhituḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8814: pramodaṃ vā diśyātkapaṭavaṭuveśāpanayena tvarāśauthilyābhāyāṃ yugapadabhiyuktaḥ smaraharaḥ” //
GK16visa10cu:8817: “paśyetkaściccala capala ! re ! kā tvārahaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ kvāsi yāsi /
GK16visa10cu:8823: he pṛthvīparivṛḍha ! araṇyaparivṛtterbhavadvidviṣaḥ bhakṣaṇārthaṃ phalakiśalayāni ādadānā kañcidarthādākṛṣṭakāmā itthamabhidhatte /
GK16visa10cu:8832: anyeṣu tu pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ pratyuttarottarasya bādhakatvena balavattayā śabalatā /
GK16visa10cu:8836: rasādayastu vācyavācakābhyāmupakāryā eveti na teṣāmaṅkāratā bhavituṃ yuktā” iti /
GK16visa10cu:8845: aparāṅgānāṃ rasādīnāmalaṅkāratvaṃ svīkurvatāmanyeṣāṃ tu matamāha---anye tviti /
GK16visa10cu:8851: apare ca--“rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkāratvaṃ mukhyato rūpakādau tu vācyādyupadhānam,
GK16visa10cu:8855: (vi, bha) aparāṅgarasādāvapi alaṅkārapadaṃ śaktameva na bhāktamiti vadatāṃ matamāha--apare ceti /
GK16visa10cu:8867: etanmate tu upamāderivāṅgabhūtarasoderapi śabdārthomayopakārakadvāraiva rasopakārakatayālaṅkārapadavācyateti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8870: aṅgabhūtarasādīnāṃ śabdārthabhyāmupakāro vyañjanāvaśādeva taiḥ śabdārthayorupakārastadvyaṅgyatvavaiśiṣṭyeneti parasparamupakāro darśitaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8889: yatra kāvye pradhāne aṅgini anyatra rasādirūpe rasādayo 'ṅgamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8891: smin kāvye rasādiralaṅkāro 'laṅkārapadavācya iti me matirityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8893: yadi ca rasādyupakāramātreṇālaṅkṛtitvaṃ tadā vācakadiṣvapi tathā prasajyeta /
GK16visa10cu:8895: aṅgatve tu dvitīyodāttālaṅkāraḥ” iti tadapi parāstam /
GK16visa10cu:8905: kecittu aṅgirasasyaiva rasavadalaṅkārāditvamaṅgabhūtarasādestu “yad vyaṅgayaṃ prastutasyāṅgaṃ mahatāṃ caritaṃ bhave';
GK16visa10cu:8908: “āmīlitālasavivartitatārakākṣī” ityatra yaḥ smaraṇākhyabhāvo vipralambhāṅgatvenoktastasya kasyāpi mahataścaritatvābhāvenodāttālaṅkāratvasya tatrāvyāpteḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8915: idānīmanekālaṅkāraṇāmekapadasthitirūpamiśraṇe kvacit saṃsṛṣṭināmā kvacicca saṅkaranāmā pṛthagalaṅkāro bhavatītyāha--yadyeta eveti /
GK16visa10cu:8921: yathā laukikālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśraṇe pṛthakcārutvena pṛthagalaṅkāratvaṃ tathoktarūpāṇāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi parasparamiśratve saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkārākhyau pṛthagalaṅkārau /
GK16visa10cu:8928: atra pāyādapāyāditi yamakam, saṃsāretyādau cānuprāsa iti śabdālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8929: dvitīye pāde upamā, dvitīyārdhe ca rūpakamityarthālaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8950: saṃdigdhatve ca bhavati saṅkarastrividhaḥ punaḥ // VisSd_10.98 //
GK16visa10cu:8953: (vi, ṣa) saṅkaraśca trividho bhavatītyāha---aṅgāṅgitve iti alaḍkṛtīnāmaṅgāṅgitve evavidhaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8962: yadyapyaṅgāṅgibhāvo janyajanakabhāvaḥ prakṛṣyaprakarṣakabhāvo jñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśceti trividhastathāpi jñāpyajñāpakabhāvarūpamevodāharati /
GK16visa10cu:8969: yasya mandaraparvatasya gadamūle 'dhobhāgarūpamūle eva śleṣaṇa caraṇasya mūle prānte mandākinī aceṣṭata sevārūpāṃ ceṣṭāmakarodityartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8971: mama patyuramburāśera#manthajanyāyā vyathāyā āśu śīghraṃ vyupaśamāya ityeva tadarthamivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8972: manthato nivṛttasya tenaiva pūrvaṃ janitā manthavyathā āśu naṃkṣyatītyevaṃrūpā prārthanā /
GK16visa10cu:8973: nanu mandākinī manthanātpūrvamapi mandarasya pādamūle vartate /
GK16visa10cu:8975_0: bhāvaktāntatvād ākarṣaṇavegena vigalan yo rajjubhūtasya bhujagendrasya vāsukerbhogāt
GK16visa10cu:8975_1: kāyānnirmokaścarmakañcukaṃ tadrūpasya paṭṭasya vastraviśeṣasya pariveṣṭanayā udveṣṭanaprakāreṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8977: kintu mandākinyeva paritaḥ pādamūlaṃ sevar#athaṃ veṣṭitavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:8980: sā ca mandā kinyā vastuvṛttena yatpādamūlaveṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūlaveṣṭanamiti śleṣamutthāpayatīti tasyāṅgam /
GK16visa10cu:8998: iyaṃ tu prakarṣakamaṅgaṃ sevājñānaṃ vinā manthavyathopaśamanārthatāyāḥ veṣṭanamātrasyāsambhavenātprekṣāyāstathā prakarṣaṇaāt /
GK16visa10cu:9013: anu divasasya paścādrāgavatī raktimavatī sandhyā, divasaśca tasyāḥ puraḥ saraḥ pūrvavarto /

GK16visa10cu:9023: ttu yathā-- “pulindāste ripustrīṇāṃ vane hāraṃ haranti no /

GK16visa10cu:9035: kīdṛśaṃ santataṃ vistṛtaṃ tamaḥ andhākāram ajñānaṃ ca bhindānamamandanayanānandakaraṃ ca /
GK16visa10cu:9039: athavā idamiti mukhasya candramaṇḍalasya ca dvayorapi prakṛtayorekadharmābhisaṃbandhāttulyayogitā,
GK16visa10cu:9043: yadvā manmathoddīpanaḥ kālaḥ svakāryabhūtacandravarṇanāmukhena vaṇita iti paryāyoktiriti bahūnāmalaṅkarāṇāṃ saṃdehātsaṃdehasaṅkaraḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9047: atrālaṅkārāṇāṃ saṃśayakoṭitāṃ darśayati--atreti . idaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalamarthānnāyikāyāmābhātītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9049: mukhasyedaṃ padena nirdeśe tu rūpakamityāha uteti /
GK16visa10cu:9051: tathāṃ ca idaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ mukhaṃ gagane aindavaṃ maṇḍalaṃ cābhātītyartaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9054: mukhasyaiva prakrāntatve tadupamānatayaiva candranirdeśe tu tasyāprakṛtatvāt prakṛtāprakṛtayorekadharmānvayarūpaṃ dīpakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9060: yathā vā--“mukhacandraṃ paśyāmi” ityatra kiṃ mukhaṃ candra iva ityupamā ?
GK16visa10cu:9066: “mukhacandraḥ prakāśate” ityatra prakāśākhyo dharmo rūpakasya sādhako mukhe upacaritatvena saṃbhavatīti nopamābādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9070: mukhacandraṃ cumbatīti mukhasyānukūlaṃ candratulyamukha eva sākṣādanvitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9076: saca dharmaścandre eva sākṣāstītyato viśeṣyatvena pratīyamāne candre sākṣādanvitatvādrūpakasya sādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9077: upamāyāstu na bādhaka ityata āhamukhe upacaritatveneti /
GK16visa10cu:9081: atra yoṣita āliṅganaṃ nāyakasya sādṛśye nocitamiti lakṣmyāliṅganasya rājanyāsaṃbhavādupamābādhakam,
GK16visa10cu:9093: atra vadane locanasya sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatā, ambuje cāsaṃbhavādrūpakasya bādhakatā /
GK16visa10cu:9097: cañcalaṃ locanaṃ yatreti vigraheṇa cañcalalocanavattvasyāmbujatulye vadane eva sambhavādupamāyāḥ sādhakatetyāha--atreti /
GK16visa10cu:9099: evaṃ--“sundaraṃ vadanāmbujam” ityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge “upamitaṃ vyāghrādibhiḥ sāmānyāprayoge” iti vacanādupamāsamāso na saṃbhavatītyupamāyā bādhakaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9104: sundaraṃ vadanāmbujamityādau sādhāraṇadharmaprayoge upamāsamāso na sambhavatītyatra upamāyā bādhaka ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9105: sa ca dharmotra sundaratvam, tasya upamābādhakatāgrāhakapāṇinyanuśāsanaṃ darśayati---upamitamiti /
GK16visa10cu:9108: atrahīti vacanāt sundaraṃ vahanāmbujamiti prayoge upamāsamāse sati na sambhavatītyataḥ sundaratvarūpasādhāraṇadharmāprayoge upamāyā bodha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9110: ityādyārthe vyaṃsakatvādibhāvād yatropamānasya pūrvanirdeśastatraiva mayūravyaṃsakaditvamupamānasya paranirdeśe tu netyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9113: “kaṭākṣeṇāpīṣatkṣaṇamapi nirīkṣeta yadi sā tadānandaḥ sāndraḥ sphurati pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9123: sā nāyikā kṣaṇamarthānmāmīṣadalpaṃ yadi nirīkṣeta tadā pihitāśeṣaviṣayaḥ sāndra ānandaḥ sphurati /
GK16visa10cu:9124: tadā tasyā ambujākṣyāḥ parīrambhārambhaḥ ka iva bhavitā,
GK16visa10cu:9129: saromāñcābhyāmata evodañcadbhyāṃ kucakalaśābhyāṃ nirbhinnaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ vasanaṃ yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9136: atra vākyārūpaikāśrayasattvaṃ dvividhānuprāsayordarśayati---atreti chekātuprāso 'nekasya vyañjanasya svarūpataḥ sāmye sati tacchekānuprāsoktatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9137: saṃyuktānevarṇasya tu ānupūrvyasambhavāttādṛśe 'nekasya kṣakāramātrasya sakṛcchekānuprāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9142: kaṭākṣapātenāpi sāndrandasphuraṇād daṇḍāpūpikayā siddhe stanaparirambhe 'nirvacanīyānanda ityevamarthāpattyalaṅkāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9146: yathā vā--“kurabakāravakāraṇatāṃ yayuḥ” ityatra rabakā ravakā ityekaṃ bakāravakāra ityekamiti yamakayoḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9156: evaṃ “kalakalolakaloladṛśe'; tyatrāpi lakalo lakalo kalola kalola iti yamakadvayam /
GK16visa10cu:9167: prasāritaṃ gītaṃ yatreti tādṛśaṃ mayūravṛndānāmānartitakaṃ nṛtyayuktaviśeṣaṇakeṣu divaseṣu mahati pūjyaṃ bhavati śobhate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9170: abhinavapayoda eva rasikā rasavanta eka nṛtyadarśanārthaṃ rasavanto yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9171: tathā pathikāḥ sāmājikā iva nṛtyādididṛkṣisamājapradhānānīva yatra tādṛśeṣu /
GK16visa10cu:9172: atra rasikasāmājikānāṃ samājapradhānatulyānāṃ ca tṛtyadarśināmāśrayatvena divasānāṃ nṛtyasattārūpakaṃ vyaṅgyamavadheyam /
GK16visa10cu:9186: sāhityadarpaṇamamuṃ sudhiyo vilokya sāhityatattvamakhilaṃ sukhameva vitta // VisSd_10.99 //
GK16visa10cu:9193: śrīcandretyādikṛtamamuṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṃ pustakaṃ vilokya akhilaṃ sāhityatattvaṃ sukhameva sukhaviśiṣṭameva yathā syāttathā vitta jānītetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9198: “āḥ kiṃ kampamurīkaroṣi vasudhe dhūrardite vā bhava- drovindena tu nandamandirakṛtakrīḍāvatāreṇa te /
GK16visa10cu:9199: vikhyātaḥ kavirājirāja iti yaḥ śrīviśvanāthaḥ kṛtī tasyākarṇya giraḥ śirāṃsi bhujagādhīśo dhunīte 'dhunā” //
GK16visa10cu:9203: tāvanmanaḥ saṃmadayan kavīnāmeṣa prabandhaḥ prathito 'stu loke // VisSd_10.100 //
GK16visa10cu:9208: tāvatkavīnāṃ manaḥ sammadayannayaṃ prabandho loke prathitostu ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa10cu:9210: (lo, ṛ) samprati granthasya samāptau svābhīṣṭapūrvakaṃ śubhāśaṃsanaṃ karoti--- yāvaditi /
GK16visa10cu:9211: sammadayan samyak prīṇayan--- āstāmanantakṛtinā kṛta eṣa dhīre- ṇāsādya tātaśaraṇāmburuhaprasādam /
GK16visa10cu:9218: akhilabhāṣaiva vilāsinī nāyikā tasyāḥ bhujaṅgaḥ kāmukastadanuśīlakatvāt /
GK16visa10cu:9219: iti maheśvaratarkālaṅkāraviracitāyāṃ sāhityadarpaṇaṭīkāyāṃ daśamaparicchedavivaraṇam suśliṣṭasaṃskṛtavaśena sukhādhirohā vaiṣamyadustarataraṅgavibhedadakṣā /
